choices: Asuna, wondering what Negi was talking about the night before
Konoka, wondering what Negi was up to with his magic training
1.content:
Before we begin, you will need to choose a girl from Negi's class to, well, grow. Below is a link to descriptions of the girls for those who do not know much about them:

http://negima.wikia.com/wiki/Mahora_Girl...

With that, let's start the story!

Negi Springfield was up late one night in his school dorm room, a room he shared with two of his students: the hot-tempered but well-meaning Asuna, and her happy, cheerful friend Konoka. Still practicing hard to one day become a master of magic much like his father, the Thousand Master (who makes magic pacts with 1,000 girls, hence his title), Negi had a long way to go to achieve his father's success. Unlike his father, Negi has made only a few pacts to date, all of which involved his students, including the two he lived with. As he continued reading up on magic spells on the bedroom floor, with nary any light but a small lamp to see, he woke up Asuna, who slept on a bunk bed with Konoka, with her bed on top. The light, however was still enough to light up a fairly large amount of the room, one which annoyed Asuna fairly much.

"Negi", Asuna sighed in a groggily tone. "It's almost 2:00 a.m. You've been reading those magic books all week. Why don't you go to sleep, already?"

"But Asuna-san, I think I might have finally found an unique spell, one that may never been done by my own father", Negi smiled as he continued reading the book. "I bet it could be useful for the future."

"Oh really", smirked Asuna. "And what could POSSIBLY be so important that you have to stay up so late in the night with it?"

"It's a rare and hard to use spell - a growth spell by the name of "Incresco Tantus". It's said to make any object, alive or inanimate, grow several times its own size. Doesn't that sound cool?"

"Yeah..whatever", Asuna said half-asleep, already proceeding to go back to sleep.

So cool.. Negi thought to himself. He usually got excited upon reading magic books, but never quite this much. As he finally turned off the light and proceeded to his own bed (one on the ground level much like Konoka's, though with a little stair case leading from it), Negi thought to himself of trying out the spell on something like a rock or a pebble the next day.

The next morning, around 9 or 10 a.m., Negi had already dressed himself in his usual teacher attire, despite being a Sunday and not teaching any classes. As he thought to himself the night before, he had placed a small pebble in a magic circle he had made by moving his stick on the ground to create said circle. Right before he says the magic words to expand the rock in size, one of his students shows up. But who was it...?
1.title: The beginning.

choices: Find a way back to normal any way
11.content:
Unsurprisingly, it was Asuna, the first student in Negi's class to find out about his being a magic user, as well as his closest ally. He also lived with her in the dorms as well. Though instead of greeting him with a friendly "Hello", Asuna looked at the magic circle in the distance and walked right up to Negi, staring him at the face. Her expression on said face was that of an annoyed one

"You were serious about it, weren't you?" questioned Asuna, who then stepped back and sighed. "You always like to go head first into things, typical of a runt."

"But Asuna-san, this magic could come in very handy in the future", Negi defended himself. "What if I were able to make your, as well as everyone else's, Pactios stronger by augmenting your size in the process? Surely that would be of help in the future."

"But the thought of a 'magic growth spell' sounds like something out of a science fiction story, not a magic book", replied back Asuna, still fairly disappointed that her own teacher would try such a thing. "I can't believe you would try such a thing."

"At least let me try it on this pebble", asked Negi, staring at Asuna somewhat with a puppy-dog eyed expression. Asuna tried to resist it as best she could, but found out she couldn't last for long. She eventually caved in to the younger boy's request.

"Sigh...all right. But I want to stay here in case anything happens, Negi."

"Alright then, Asuna-san. Stand behind me and watch me make this rock grow to a the size of a boulder."

"I suppose if it DOES work, it would be fairly neat", said Asuna, now stepping back about 10 feet from the circle, but still within talking distance to Negi. "All right then, Negi, let 'er go!"

Negi then lifted his staff vertically in his hands, the staff facing directly in front of the circle. He then began the chant:

"Incresco Tantus!"

And with that, a light flashed from his staff, successfully causing the pebble to grow. Unfortunately, Negi's aim with the spell was off, and in addition to the pebble's growth, he made a much wider radius of objects grow around him grow, including a buried can of soda in the dirt, several other assorted rocks, and even Asuna herself! As soon as the circle engulfed the teenage girl in the lightly colored light, it disappeared completely.

"Asuna-san!!!" Negi exclaimed, running to his student. "Are you feeling all right?"

Asuna looked at her body, wondering if anything happened to her. She was relieved to find out nothing was different than it was a minute ago, "I feel fine, Negi. But I wonder if the circle did make all those things grow..."

Asuna then proceeded to pause, and gulped, continuing with "I wonder how big I'M going to get."

"Well, if you were to grow, you would've done so by now, would you know?" wondered Negi, looking at Asuna for any differences in height.

"Yeah, you're right", smiled Asuna. "I don't feel any different at al...hmm? What did I just fell right now?"

"Asuna-san, your...chest. It got bigger."

"Negi, you're only 10 years old", grumbled Asuna, annoyed at Negi's gawking at her breasts. "You're too young to talk about bre..oh hey, you're right!"

That wasn't the only thing that grew. So did Asuna's hair, arms, legs, and backside. Even the bells in her were starting t grow. And all the while Asuna looked worried, as if she heard a bear rustling in the middle of the woods. Thankfully her clothes grew with her, unlike some of Negi's other spells in the past, but this was still a big shock to the girl. Only a couple minutes later did she finally growing.

"Well I guess it did work. See?" grinned Negi. Asuna would normally at this point yell back at him, but she felt so confused and scared by her height that she could barley talk. Negi noticed this too, walking up closer to Asuna to try to talk to her. Asuna herself proceeded to sit down on the ground, kneeling, noticing the much greater size of scope between her and her teacher. It was almost like comparing an adult to a baby.

"Negi", a worried Asuna said outloud, unsure of whether to cry or yell at Negi. "This is...really weird. We have to fix this NOW before you get caught!"

"You're right, Asuna-san", Negi said in an attempt to comfort Asuna. "I can fix it. I've done it before." His energetic spirit helped made the 20 foot-tall Asuna feel a little better, and with it she then proceeded to stand back up.

"Who knows?" asked Asuna non-rhetorically, attempting to smilee. "This could be like the age pills and wear off in a while. Maybe I should do something to celebrate this temporary mini-giantess spell."

"Like what, Asuna-san?" Negi asked his student.

"Well.....um....I have no idea", Asuna laughed in a somewhat nervous tone.
11.title: A New Day, A New Height for Asuna

111.content:
"Negi", Asuna said, ducking down to stare at her teahcer. "I think we would try to find a way to return me to normal before anything else."

"I agree", he said in reply. "But who should we ask for help?"
111.title: Find a way back to normal any way

1111.content:
"I think we should get help from Takamichi-sensei", Asuna told Negi. "He's very smart and knowledgeable about most anything. Perhaps he can guide us to a source." "You're right", he said, nodding in agreement. "Takamichi might not be able to use magic the way I can, but he can still help us." However, Negi and Asuna couldn't go wandering around Mahora Academy looking for him: the sight of a 20-foot tall girl would scare the school. So the two retreated to the woods.

Fortunately, Asuna's new height made it 4 times faster than usual to get away from the school, with Negi not too far behind, flying on his stick. Negi then decided to telepathically contact Takamichi via a card placed upon his forehand, in much the same manner he's communicated to his own students in the past.

"Takamichi, can you hear me?" asked Negi, hoping for a response. "It's me, Negi. We have a bit of a situation he.."

"I hear you, Negi-kun", Takamichi replied. "What seems to be the manner?"

"Well....have you ever heard of a spell that makes objects, as well as people, grow big?"

"Hmm...I vaguely remember it, but I don't remember it being widely used. Why?"

"Well, I was trying it the other day, and.."

"I suppose it backfired and hit one of your students?"

"Yes", Negi sighed, Asuna sighing simultaneously with him. "It hit Asuna-san, and now she's 20 feet tall! I don't know how to reverse it!"

"Please help us, Takahata-sensei!", Asuna said right in front of Negi's face, hoping he would hear her. "If word caught out about this, Negi would be turned into an ermine for sure!"

"Well, thankfully for you two I know of a way to resolve this, but it's fairly dangerous", explained Takamichi, a worried tone in his voice. "The only known copy of a spell that reverse spells of that magnitude is guarded by a monster in the library underground."

"You mean like the one Negi and I went to when we were studying for the exams a few months ago?" asked Asuna.

"Yep", replied Takamichi. "The very same. You'll have to retrace your steps down there and find him. Once you get past him, you can find a whole array of books with various spells. But for your sake, only use the shrinking spell."

"Why is that?" asked Negi.

"The other spells are so powerful, and I don't mean anything harsh by this, but someone of your experience level may not be able to handle the spells without disasterous results."

"We understand", said Negi and Asuna in unison. And with that, Negi caught off his connection with Takamichi.

"Well Negi, I guess we're going on another strange adventure", Asuna told her teacher, rubbing his head playfully with her left hand.

"Seems so", he said in reply. "But do you think we should go alone?"
1111.title: Getting help from Takamichi

choices: "No way! I already feel like a freak."
11111.content:
"Let's no worry anyone, Negi", Asuna told her teacher. "We'll simply go alone. But let's go back to Mahora Academy at night before doing so." Asuna then paused, and then continued in a slight comical tone, "After all, if word got out there was a 20 foot-tall girl staying at Mahora, the news would be all over us."

"And I'd get turned into an ermine", Negi added worringly. "This is no laughing manner, Asuna-san! I could get fired for this!"

"I'm sorry", sadly sighed Asuna, who then proceeded to stand on her legs and scooch up to her teacher, staring him straight in the eye. She then continued, annoyed: "But you have to chill out sometimes, you know? You can't worry about every little thing that happens to you. I'm here to help you, and so are Setsuna-san, Honya-chan, Konoka, and even Eva-chan."

"You're right. But still...since we're going down by ourselves, do you think I should make you taller?" asked Negi. Asuna then replied to him,
11111.title: The duo stand alone

111112.content: Negi proceeded to enchant the same cantation he did beforehand, and within minutes Asuna found herself growing ever taller, beginning with her hair and then the rest of her body downwards to her feet. At the end the already tall girl grew to..
111112.title: Asuna gets another shot of growth

choices: Asuna keeps growing to 60 feet tall
1111122.content:
Asuna watched as the environment around her got smaller and smaller as the already tall 15 year-old ballooned ever higher into the air. If Negi looked like a baby at her height before, then he looked shorter than most Barbie dolls at her even taller height. Within a few minutes Asuna noticed the now smaller environment, now exactly 45 feet tall.

"This is getting too much", said Asuna to herself, as she watched Negi back up from her little by little as she grew ever bigger. Surely she was done growing at this point, right? Negi couldn't possibly make her grow any bigger after all? He was but a novice in growth magic.

"I hope you don't get any taller, Asuna-san."

"Me too, Negi. Me too..."
1111122.title: The 45 foot tall junior high schooler

choices: Asuna shoots up to 100 feet (final growth)
11111221.content:
"Don't worry, Asuna-san", Negi told his student, who was worrying about stepping on something and afraid to move from her standing up position. "You're probably done growing now."

"Yeah. I can't get any larger than I am now", sighed Asuna in relief, until she looked down at her hands again and noticed they were now bigger than her head.

"Not again", she moaned unemotionally, noticing she was getting taller still. Asuna decided to plop her butt on the ground to prevent banging her head into something, watching as she slowly grew to 60 feet tall. As she looked down at her small teacher, her expression changed from sad to cheerful.

"From here you look like a figurine from one of those gumball machines", Asuna giggled to her teacher, the first time she laughed since she grew. She then carefully picked up her teacher and placed him on her left shoulder.

"And here I thought one day you'd be the one shrinking or growing", Asuna teased Negi, sticking her tongue out playfully at him. "Guess I was wrong."

Perhaps now Asuna stops growing...?
11111221.title: 60 feet and counting

111112211.content:
As Asuna continued to look at the tiny teacher on her shoulder, she felt another bit of pain in her stomach. Could it be the time for her to grow again?

"Uh-oh....", whispered Negi, Asuna unable to hear him. The tiny teacher watched as the already tall girl's head and face grew further and further away from him, her long, beautiful hair covering up his body as Asuna shot up into the air. By this time Asuna was used to growing and just let it go with the flow, while Negi latched onto his student's shoulder to stay on the increasingly taller student of his. Within a minute or so Asuna was now 100 feet tall! Her ear alone was almost half his size, much less the rest of her body. Her head alone towered over her teacher, not to mention the rest of her body, with arms longer than most of the buildings at Mahora Academy, and legs as tall as some skyscrapers.

"Shouldn't be too hard to best that monster now. Right, Negi?" Asuna happily told her teacher in a whispering voice, hoping to not rattle his ears.

"You're right", a worried Negi replied.

"What's wrong?" Asuna asked, looking depressed. "You seem worried."

"I'm just confused what you're so assured about all this. Weren't you panicking about this a little while ago?"

"That's the funny thing", Asuna explained to her teacher, far more cheerful now. "I don't feel scared anymore. If anything, I feel HAPPY being big. When I was little I was kind of short for my height and wished to be taller. Never thought one day I'd be 100 or so feet tall, though."

"Neither did I", Negi nodded in agreement. "But how are we going to get to the library at your height?"

"Maybe you can make the hallways bigger", suggested Asuna, giggling a little afterwards. "It worked on me, so it may work on them."

"I can try, Asuna-san, but we should wait until night, when it's less busy."

"Agreed. But what do we do until then?"
111112211.title: Asuna's final upgrade

choices: The two are attacked in their sleep
The two sleep with no problems
1111122112.content:
Negi decided to check his giantess student's 100 foot stature, curious as to whether or not Asuna evenly grew everywhere. A ruler was far too small to do such a thing, so Negi pulled out from his pocket a mini-roster, which gave basic information on all the girls in his class, including measurements (which he didn't share with anyone but his own students, though some were more annoyed by this than others), and decided he had to base his observations on it alone.

As the child teacher examined Asuna's body, Asuna herself looked confused as she watched her teacher.

"You seem to be looking at me pretty long and hard, Negi", Asuna smirked as she watched her teacher walk up to her very long legs. "What exactly are you doing?"

"I-I-I'm trying to see if your measurements are all evenly p-p-placed", the nervous teacher replied, looking quite red in the face.

"Aw, you're so cute", smiled Asuna as she proceeded to stand up straight on her feet. The difference between the two's height now was quite staggering. Within a manner of minutes, Asuna went from being less than a foot taller than Negi to being big enough to hold him in one hand. Negi nervously continued his observing, but when he got too close to his student's knees, Asuna started to look a little annoyed.

"You better not be looking where I think you are", Asuna grumbled. "I may be nicer at my newfound height, but I won't be afraid to smack you for glancing at my panties."

"Asuna-san, I'm not interested in that kind of thing at all", an annoyed Negi said in his defense, blushing quite a bit. Asuna giggled at her teacher's red face, who was unaware that his student was merely teasing him.

"Could you please sit down on your knees now?" Negi requested.

"Sure", Asuna complied happily, sitting down on her knees in Negi's direction. The boy tried to climb up his student's knees to take a better look, but found himself falling off her skirt quite easily when he tried to climb up on her legs to do so. Asuna simply smiled and scooped up Negi in her right hand, placing him on her left shoulder.

"Does this help, Negi?" Asuna asked cheerfully after putting him down.

"Thank you. It does", Negi replied, bowing to Asuna in gratitude. So far he hadn't notice any difference in size in comparison to the rest of her body. It seemed as if Asuna's body grew evenly, right down to the bells in her hair. The only areas Negi hadn't examined were Asuna's butt and chest, which he decided not to look at for obvious reasons.

"See anything different about my body, Negi?" an inquisitive Asuna asked him.

"Nope. It seems as if everything grew the same amount, from your toes to your hair", Negi told his student.

"You seemed to be blushing a lot during the whole thing, Negi", teased Asuna, giggling a little as she placed Negi right up to her lips. He thought he was going to get kissed by her gigantic lips, which were almost, if not bigger than, his head. It was all for fun, though, as Asuna quickly put Negi back down on her chest.

"Comfy?" Asuna giggled as she placed her teacher on her chest, which to Negi looked big enough to sleep on, like two really big pillows.

"It feels kind of nice", a shy Negi admitted, feeling a little sleepy on top of his student. Asuna quickly moved him to right beneath above her chest, his feet facing her face.

"You've been looking pretty tired lately, Negi. Why don't you rest a little before we head off, okay?"

"Oka..." Negi responded, already proceeding to fall asleep on Asuna's chest. Asuna herself proceeded to slowly place herself down on the ground as well, who was tired herself from extra work on her paper route recently as well. Within minutes the two were sleeping like babies. But is their sleep a peaceful one, or are they disturbed..?
1111122112.title: Negi's giantess observation

choices: Far, far away from Mahora Academy
11111221122.content:
Negi woke up hours later on top of his still giantess student. However, it felt odd...like the area around him was much wider. He remembered being on Asuna's left breast before he slept, but now he was sitting in the middle of it! A look down the area below revelaed a fairly high jump for him just to get down!

"Oh no! Asuna-san's growth didn't stop!" said a panicked Negi as he twirled his arms around in typical worrywart fashion like he did in the past.

That's when he heard the giant yawn of his student, which sounded incredibly loud to him. When she raised her right hand to rub her eyes, Negi could actually feel each movement on his student's body as she did so.

Once she was done yawning, Asuna slowly picked up her teacher inbetween her thumb and pinky, lifting the boy up closer to her face and smiling.

"Good evening, Negi", the giantess whispered to her teacher, then proceeding to stand up on her two feet.

"Asuna-san! You're...you're...!"

"Don't be scared", Asuna said in a very soothing voice to the boy teacher. "As long as I'm around, no one will hurt you."

Negi was confused by Asuna's gentle, sweet voice; it reminded him of his older cousin Nekane. Asuna even had the same, soothing smile on her face that she typically did, placing the teacher slowly in her left skirt pocket. Before that, though, she gently kissed the boy on the face with her giantess lips.

Upon closer expection, though, he noticed Asuna had changed in more ways than one. Her hair now went straight down her back, for one. But most noticeable was her attire; instead of her casual attire from earlier, Asuna was now in a beautiful, light blue dress that went down to her toes. Her lips were aligned with pink lipstick, and her chest seemed to be a little bigger as well.

"Asuna-san...how tall are you now?" the worried Negi asked his student.

"Around 300 feet tall, I suppose", she politely answered, the boy now in shock.

"300!? Oh my, this is bad..!"

"Don't threat, Negi. We will have this fixed soon", Asuna comforted her teacher as she walked closer to her destination point. But...what WAS that destination point?
11111221122.title: Negi's rude awakening

choices: Negi has a nice, peaceful swim
Konoka and Setsuna show up, wondering where Asuna and Negi were the whole time
111112211222.content:
Asuna walked for what seemed like a very long time to Negi. It certainly felt that way as he kept bumping around as he felt his giantess student's movement every inch of the way while inside her pocket. In fact, it was about an hour before Asuna took him out again, showing Negi a beautiful waterfall in front of him.

"Negi, look! Doesn't that look nice?" his cheerful student asked of him, placing him gently down on the ground.

"Why, yes it does!" he agreed, sitting on the nice, cool summer grass beneath him. Asuna joined him on the ground, sitting with her legs in an Indian position.

"You're going to get grass stains on your clothes!" Asuna giggled as she watched Negi get up and noticed his brown butt, trying to get the grass off.

"Oh, Negi~", Asuna sighed as she looked at the waterfall some more.

After another minute of getting grass stains off his clothes, the worried boy walked ever closer to his student as he tugged on her dress, hoping to get her attention.

"What's the matter, Negi? You look unhappy."

"Asuna-san, do you know you're acting a little..odd?"

"Hm? Odd?"

"Look a mother, or an older sibling, or..?"

"..a goddess?" Asuna finished.

"Well, it's just that I've never seen you like this before.."

"Well, it's like you noticed before, right? The taller I get, the happier I am. And right now I'm very happy just being with you!

..I know I can be mean, even bossy at times to you. But I don't do it because I hate you; I do it because I care for you. You and Konoka are two of the most important people in my life, and I would do anything for you two!"

Asuna picked up her teacher and embraced him with a soft, gentle, giantess hug.

"Negi, I care for you. I'll always be there for you."

"Asuna-san..."

The touching moment was then interrupted by Asuna splashing some water on her teacher and placing him back on the ground, soaked almost from head to toe.

"What was that for, Asuna-san!?"

"To lighten things up", Asuna said with a smile. "Why don't you go swimming? It's a nice day!"

"But I don't have my swim trunks.."

"You do now!" Asuna said to her teacher, pulling her his swim trunks from her other pocket.

"Wait! You KNEW you would take me here?"

"Sure did! Today you're going to relax and have fun, Negi! I'll make sure of it!"

"I'm confused...but what the heck?!"
111112211222.title: Oh My Giantess!

choices: "Remember that I love you and will always protect you."
1111122112221.content:
Negi's swim in the lake below the waterfall was a nice one. The water was clean, beautiful, and free of other people. Asuna had even brought him a little innertube to float on, which she followed up with with gently patting the water to make "waves" for her teacher.

The hours passed like minutes as Negi enjoyed himself, all while the 300 foot tall Asuna watched over him. Now that he was further away from her, he could how mature she looked in her long, light blue dress and her bell-free hair. She looked more like an adult woman than a teenager, and her voice was as soothing as that of any mother's.

"Negi, it's getting dark! You better come out!" Asuna said to her teacher as she picked him up from the water with her cupped hands. She then placed the boy back on the grass and dried him off by blowing on the boy with her big mouth, which was surprisingly effective.

Asuna then handed the boy some casual clothes he could change himself with. He went behind some trees to change himself, and when he came back he was wearing a plain, white t-shirt and a pair of blue shorts. He also wore sneakers on his feet, which were exactly the right size for him.

"Negi, did you enjoy your day?" Asuna asked her teacher as she held him in her hands once again, placing him on her lap.

"I did, Asuna-san! Thank you for the wonderful day!"

"I'm glad you enjoyed it!" she said in reply, looking a little red in the face. "I just wish we could do this every day. But with exams, classes, and magical stuff abounding..."

"I too wish we could do this kind of thing, Asuna-san! I just wish there was some way I could repay you for this wonderful day."

"Well...there is one way you can repay me, Negi."

"How's that, Asuna-san?"
1111122112221.title: A nice swim, and....?

11111221122211.content:
Asuna paused as she held up Negi one final time and hugged him close to her chest.

"Negi, remember that I love you and will always protect you", she told Negi in the most soothing voice she ever talked to him in, slowly kissing the boy with her lips. When she finished, she placed the small teacher on the ground and began to stand up in front of him.

"Asuna-san! What are you doing!?"

"Returning myself to my original size", she explained to her teacher as her body shrunk down in size before him.

"I hope we can do this again some time", Asuna said to her teacher, still in a kind, motherly tone as she shrunk down to 270 feet.

"Let's bring Konoka and Setsuna-san next time, too", she energetically chirped a little more as she shrunk down to 250 feet. Her hair reverted back to its original form, bells and all.

"This sure beats fighting monsters any day", she added as she shrunk down even further to 200 feet. Her light blue dress reverted back into the casual clothes she had before, as did her chest.

"Though now that I remember it now, I never did my homework today", she sighed as she shrunk down to 150 feet.

"You'll help me though, right Negi?" she continued to talk to him, now down to 100 feet.

"I hope so. You're so kind and smart..."

Asuna shrunk down to 70 feet as she paused for a brief moment before continuing.

"...even if you do jump to conclusions and try to play hero all by yourself at times."

Asuna started to sound more and more like her original self as she was now at 30 feet in height.

"Still, I'll admit I liked spending time with you today", she said with a red face, now back to her original size.

"Asuna-san! You're back to normal!" Negi greeted his student as he ran up to her and smiled.

"I guess I am...though how are we getting back? We're fairly far from Mahora now.."

"Well, if I recall, there's a bus stop about a mile or two from here. I guess we'll have to take that to the train to get back to Mahora", Negi said to his student as the two started to walk away from the beautiful waterfall and back to the academy.

Before they did, though, Asuna gave Negi one last token of affection; one last hug.

"Thank you once again", she told her teacher, looking embarrassed.
11111221122211.title: Negi's Eternal Protector

12.content:
Konoka walked up to Negi right from behind him, moments before he started his spell.

"Good morning, Negi-kun!" she smiled, waving her left hand to her teacher. "What're you doing?"

"Oh, Konoka-san. Good morning to you, too", Negi replied. "I'm about to use a new magic technique I found out. It's a spell that's said to make any object grow to many times its normal size."

"That sounds neat", said Konoka. "What were you planning to test it on?"

"I was going to try it on this pebble in the middle of this magic circle I had just made", Negi replied back to his student.

"I have a better idea, Negi-kun", Konoka grinned. "What not try it out on me?"

Negi gasped in shock at the idea. "I don't think that's a good idea, Konoka-san! What happens if I can't fix it?"

"Negi-kun", started Konoka, walking up closer to her teacher until the two almost met eye to eye, then proceeding to hug the boy. "I've been on several magic adventures with you, Asuna, and the rest of our class before, and we've always found a way around things. How will this be any different?"

"Well...if that's how you feel, Konoka-san, I'll do it. Move the pebble out of the way and step into the magic circle."

"Got it", smiled Konoka, taking the pebble in the dirt and flicking it away. "Alright, Negi-kun, I'm ready!" Upon Konoka's confirmation, Negi proceeded to take his staff and held it with both his hands vertically. He then began to chant the incantation.

"Okay then. Incresco Tantus!"

A flashing light came from the magic circle, and with it, Negi's stick. Konoka soon felt the glow from the circle, and slowly but assuringly gained in height. First her hair, then the rest of her body, grew in height, up to a point of around 20 feet tall. Afterwards, the magic circle disappeared, as did the light from Negi's staff.

"Negi-kuuunnn", chirped Konoka, bending her head down to Negi's eye level. "You're soooo cute!" With that, Konoka grabbed Negi in her hands like a toy on the ground of a little child's room. "This is so cool", she continued. "M-maybe to you, but I'm scared of heights", panicked Negi. "Hey, I know", Konoka then said, winking one of her eyes. "Let's show Asuna or Setchan this. Won't they be surprised?"

"Definitely", sighed Negi.

You now have the next two choices...
12.title: Giantess Konoka

121.content:
Before the two tried to meet up with Asuna, she came running from out of the campus, having watched the whole scene.


"Negi-bozu, what do you think you're doing?!" she yelled. "What if someone sees Konoka in this state?! You'll be turned into an ermine for sure!"

Negi began fumbling on his words, trying to find the words to say, but then Konoka said,

"I wanted Negi-kun to try the spell on me."

"Wait", Asuna sighed, "You mean that spell you were telling me about last night?"

"That's the one...", Negi replied hesitantly.

"Well, you have to turn her back quick before anyone from outside of the class sees her!"

"But I don't know how! I never looked at any reverse spells!"

"Then do something, and do it fast!" Asuna screamed.
121.title: No need to find Asuna...

1211.content:
Almost immediately, Negi pulled out a book from his pack and started flipping through the pages with haste.

"Did you find anything?" Asuna asked.

Negi continued flipping through the book until he saw a shrinking spell: Decresco Tantus.

"Yes, I think I found it, Asuna-san," Negi replied. "Please stand back."

"Awww, fun time is over...", Konoka pouted, looking annoyed more so than sad.

"Konoka, I can't even believe you had Negi try that spell on you. You know what'll happen if he's found out!!

"Asuna-san, please stand back," Negi told Asuna as he placed his arm in front of her.

Asuna stood a few steps back while Negi held out his staff. Then he chanted,

"Decresco Tantus!"

The wind picked up, then a light flickered from his staff. When the spell was near completion, a leaf blew past Konoka's nose, causing her to sneeze. To her, it was nothing more than a mere sneeze, but to Negi and Asuna, it was a split second hurricane. Negi flew back and slammed into Asuna, the light from Negi's staff engulfed the three. The spell was complete.
Negi and Asuna then both got up and looked up at Konoka.

"...It didn't work..." Negi sighed.

"Negi-bozu!" Asuna said, hitting him on the head, "I knew this was a bad idea! It didn't even work. Now we got to hide Konoka somewhere!"

"But Asuna-san-"

"Negi-kun," Konoka interrupted, "It worked."

"What do you mean? You're still enormous", Negi noted.

"Uhh, look around Negi-kun..." Konoka said as she pointed to all the nearby scenario with her hands.

Negi and Asuna both looked around; it worked alright. All of Mahora was large! Even the dirt on the walkways were larger.

"Eh heh heh..." Asuna laughed very softly. She sat down in a veetle position. "Negi, please turn us back now..."

"Asuna-san, are you alright?" Negi asked.

Asuna went wide eyed, still laughing awkwardly. Obviously, Asuna was freaked out.

"Konoka-san, please stand back! I'm going to undo this spell on me and Asuna-san!"

Konoka took five large steps back. Negi held out his staff and chanted "Incresco Tantus!" again. However, nothing happened.

"Eh? Maybe I did something wrong?"

Negi took out his book and went back to the growth spell. He read down the description of the spell, and saw the one line that made his heart sink.

This spell may only be used once in a twenty-four hour period.

"Negi, why didn't it work?!" Asuna asked, still a little scared by the size change.

"I can't do it again until 9am tomorrow," Negi replied hesitantly.

"EEHH!!!" Asuna screamed. She stood tall, hovering over Negi with her hair sticking straight into the air. "You idiot! Isn't that something you oughta know before you test out these new spells?!"

Negi just sighed, and fell down.

"What are we supposed to do in the meantime?" Asuna asked.

The ground shook, and a shadow loomed over the two as Konoka walked back over, and bent down.

"Why are you two still small," the confused "giantess" asked.

"There's a 24 hour waiting period. That's why!" Asuna yelled up at her.

Konoka's face then bloomed a smile as she picked both of her friends up. Where does she take them?
1211.title: Partially the same...

12111.content:
Konoka picked up Negi and Asuna, placed them in her shirt pocket, and began to walk of back to their dorm room. The both of them were bouncing around as their friend carelessly walked. They had no idea where she was taking them. After a few minutes, they heard a door open and close, then Konoka's hand came into her pocket and lifted them out. As their eyes readjusted to the light, they saw they were in their dorm room.

"Very good idea, Konoka-san," Negi exclaimed. "It's best if we just stay here until 9 a.m. tomorrow."

A smile grew from Konoka's face as she sat them on the table.

"What about class tomorrow?" Asuna asked.

"Oh no! I didn't even think about that!" Negi cried.

"Don't worry, Negi-kun," Konoka said comfortably, "We'll think of something."

"Yes," Negi said standing tall, "You are right, Konoka-san. We've been through far more complications than this."


Sometime later...


Negi was thinking furiously about what to do about class tomorrow. He was getting no help from his dorm mates : Konoka was lying in her bunk reading a manga, while Asuna was sleeping on the edge of the table they were placed on. When Negi thought he had a perfect plan, his thought was interrupted when he heard Asuna yell,

"I'm hungry!"

"Wah! Asuna-san, I almost had a perfect plan..."

"So? If you thought of it once, you can think of it again."

Konoka overheard Asuna's outburst for food. She got out of her bunk, and looked in one of the cupboards, only to see them barren of snacks.

"We all out of snacks", Konoka sighed.

"Eeh?! Didn't we get some the other night?" Asuna asked.

"Hmm...I don't think so. Well, I'll just go get some!"

Does Konoka take them along?
12111.title: What's the plan?

choices: A theif is nabbing the bag
121111.content:
As Konoka grabbed her shopping bag, she asked, "Do you want to come with me?"

Negi and Asuna looked at eachother and shrugged. "Sure," they said is unison.

Konoka opened up a small pocket on the side of her bag, gently picked her friends, and put them in. The size of the pocket was perfect enough that they could stand and rest their arms and head at the top.

Konoka giggled while looking at their heads poking out of the pocket. "Just be sure that you hide when someone is nearby."

"Konoka, please be careful with us. Try not to drop it or swing it." Negi said.

"Okay, Negi-kun!" Konoka said cheerfully.

As Konoka walked down the hallways of the dorm, and the streets, Negi and Asuna had to hide quite a few times. Konoka stopped and talked a couple times, while the other two had to sit in the pocket in the blistering hot sun.

As she walked into the store, she was swinging the bag. Negi and Asuna felt sick.

"Well... atleast she didin't drop i-" Asuna managed to say before Konoka dropped the bag to the floor. "Eehh.... Nevermind. I think she's fogotten about us."

"Asuna-san, don't say something like that. Konoka-san would never forget us."

As they looked out of the pocket, they saw Konoka walked away into one the isles.

"Nevermind. She DID forget about us..."

The two of them sat in the bag for a few minutes when the bag suddenly shot upward.

What happened?
121111.title: Shopping bag

121112.content:
"Do you want to come along," Konoka asked as she picked up her purse.

"No," Negi said, "It's probably best for Asuna-san and I to stay here in case someone saw us in this state."

"Okay!" Konoka said enthusiastically, although she's sad that they want to stay here.

As Konoka exits the dorm, Negi sits back down, trying to think about what to do about tomorrow. But, his thoughts were yet again interrupted when his stomach growled for food. He fell flat on his back and stared at the ceiling.

"Ohh... What am I going to do?" Negi cried. "I can't go to class in this state... And Takamichi isn't here to cover for class because he is off doing business..."

"Eh! What about Takamichi?!" Asuna asked, who wasn't paying attention at all.

Sometime has passed. Both Negi and Asuna fell asleep. Asuna woke up due to hearing noises outside the door. She saw Negi, who was still sleeping, cuddling up to her mumbling, "Onee-chan..."

"You idiot, Negi! Wake up," Asuna yelled.

Negi flew into the air, and landed on his butt. "What was that for?" he asked, scrathing the back of his head.

"Somebody is at the door," she informed him.

Just then, the door swung open!

Who came in?
121112.title: Waiting...

12111221.content:
The door swung open and in came Nodoka, the library girl.

"Uhh, Konoka-san, are you here? I need those books back."

While she was looking around, Negi and Asuna were freaking out.

"What are going to do, Negi?!" Asuna asked.

"I-I-I don't know!" Negi yelled.

As they were frantically running around in circles, Nodoka heard something on the table. She walked over to the table to see her teacher and fellow classmate. Both of them stopped running and looked up at her. She had an extremely puzzled look on her face.

"...N-Negi-sensei?!" Nodoka cried.

"Heh heh... hi," Negi replied.

Nodoka blacked out and fell to the floor.

Negi watching in horror at the edge of the table, and Asuna walked up behind him expressionless. She bonked him on the head.

"What now, Negi-bozu?" Asuna asked.

"I don't know. I hope Konoka-san gets back before she wakes up..."
12111221.title: Here comes Nodoka

121112211.content:
There was a clamor outside the door. The door suddenly flung open and in came Nodoka's friends/dorm mates: Yue and Haruna.

"Nodoka, what happened?" Haruna asked. "We heard you scream!"

Asuna backed up, grabbing Negi's arm. "Negi, we need to hide now!"

"I agree," Negi said instantly. Both of them ran to opposite side of the table. "Asuna-san, please hold on tight."

"WHAT?!" she screamed, as Negi pulled her and himself off the table.

Mid-air, he summoned his staff, and it came shooting through the air at lightning speed. Negi grabbed the staff, and hung onto it as they both descended slowly to the ground.

"Negi, you idiot! We could have died!" Asuna yelled.

Negi ignored her complaints, and stealthily looked past the table base to see what was happening with Nodoka, Yue, and Haruna.

"Nodoka, what happened?" Yue asked.

Slowly, Nodoka woke up. "Eeeh... Yue? ... Haruna ...?"

"Yes, it's us. What happened?" Yue asked.

"...I thought I saw Negi-sensei and Asuna-san on the table..."

"Doing what?" Haruna asked with a mischievous tone, and a sly smile on her mouth.

"Not that!" Nodoka cried. "They were small!"

Haruna and Yue looked at each other, then at the table.

"Nodoka, I think you were hallucinating," Yue sighed.

"Ahh! But it seemed so real! Negi-sensei even talked back!"

Haruna and Yue helped Nodoka up, and...
121112211.title: The Library Trio

choices: Another girl walks in on them.
Nothing happens. Just a flicker of the lights.
12113.content:
''Ahh, don't you worry, Negi-kun!'' the ditzy Konoka giggled, holding both him and Asuna - both of whom are only about ten inches tall at most - to her chest, ''Rules are rules after all, huh? We've gotta wait a day before you guys can go back to being normal size, so let's have fun with it!''

''Uhh, 'fun'?'' A cynical Asuna glared at Negi, and then up at Konoka, ''how're we gonna have fun at this size, with you babysitting us all the time? You'd forget your own head if it wasn't attached to your body!''

''Oh, don't be silly, Asuna-chan!'' Konoka giggled, sweatdropping as she walked through a door into the bath house, still with both of them in her hands, ''How could I forget my own head? I mean it's-''

''You're forgetting right now!'' Asuna yelled, slapping a palm to her forehead, ''Konoka, think for a second. WHERE are we, right now?''

''The-the bath house?'' Konoka replied simply, confused by Asuna's outrage.

''Uh-huh... And who do you have with you?''

''You, Asuna-chan!''

''And who else?!''

''Umm...'' Konojka faltered, proving that she had indeed forgotten the quieter member of the trio, ''Oh! Negi-kun?!''

''Yeah, Konoka, you idiot!'' Asuna cried out in frustration, ''He's not allowed in here! I don't even know why we're in here! I mean, why here of all places?!''

''S-so we can have some fun, Asuna-chan!'' Konoka stuttered, but recovered remarkably fast, ''I mean, what could help a stressful day better than a relaxing bath?''

''At this size? C'mon Konoka, think, dammit! It'd be like tidal waves in there at our size! And Negi can't even be in here!''

''I'm sorry...'' Konoka sighed, ''I just... thought it'd be nice, is all. And I wanted to make it up to you Asuna, cause it's my fault that you're in this situation...''

Negi couldn't help but feel sympathetic towards Konoka, situation given. ''It's OK, Konoka. You were just trying your best to help, after all.''

''But I-''

''It's alright, really!'' Negi tried to insist, ''you two can have fun in here, and I'll just-''

But just then:
12113.title: That episode where people ignore their problems.

choices: There's an attack on the trio!
The trio proceed to find a cure for the girls' newfound height
122.content:
"Come on, Negi-kun", Konoka told her teacher, finally placing Negi back down on the
ground. "Let's go meet up with Setchan."

"Don't you think she'll be worried?" wondered Negi.

"Probably, but everything will work out alright. It always does around you, Negi-kun", smiled Konoka. "So let's go walk over and say 'Hi' to her."

"Alright, but please slow down for me", Negi asked Konoka, his head facing hers as if he was looking at a sign on a building three stories above him. "Your legs are much longer than mine now, you know."

"Well, I'd carry you, Negi-kun, but I'm still not tall enough to do so." Thank goodness, thought Negi to himself. The dizzying height from Konoka's lift gave him a head rush most roller coasters could only hope of giving fans.

It wasn't too long a walk until they found Setsuna, who up until a few minutes ago was busy teaching Asuna sparring techniques, a common thing they've done together since they rescued Konoka a few weeks ago. But Asuna had left a while ago, and Setsuna was simply polishing her sword under a tree. But suddenly the shade seemed darker than before, and Setsuna wondered what caused it. She looked straight up and around her, until she noticed a strange sight....a 20-foot tall Konoka!

"O-O-Ojo-sama!?!" exclaimed Setsuna in shock and awe. "What on Earth happened to you!?! Did someone put a curse on you!?"

"It's okay, Setchan", smiled Konoka, who then sat on the ground, her feet in an Indian-style position. "Negi-kun simply case a spell to make me taller." Still in shock, Setsuna looked straight at Negi with a very blank expression.

"YOU did this, Negi-sensei?? Can you return her to normal??"

"Well, the truth is...I don't know a shrinking spell. I guess that's why my magic school told us it was one of the 'forbidden' spells to cause. Apparently it's very hard to refuse."

"I don't mind, Setchan", Konoka smiled to her friend, placing her on my lap, all the while with Setsuna blushing as red as a tomato. "In fact, I think you should grow, too."

"Eh!?!?" gasped Setsuna. "Ojo-sama, I couldn't do that. We would be easily spotted due to our size! In fact, I'm already worried about you being this tall and too big a target!" Konoka simply continued to stare at Konoka with a smile in her face. Setsuna slowly felt less worried about her taller friend, and finally popped Negi the question:

"Negi-sensei, will you please make me taller, so that I may more easily protect Ojo-sama?" she asked of her teacher, clapping her hands together and bowing her head to him.

"Are you sure, Setsuna-san?" asked Negi. "It may be a while before you return to normal."

"I'm sure", Setsuna told her teacher. And with that, Negi did the same magic incantation he did on Konoka, and only a few minutes passed by before Setsuna was around 19 and a half feet tall, a little shorter than Konoka's current height. She was far from excited, though, and was so worried about her height she could barely speak.

"Relax, Setchan", comforted Konoka. "Sit down right next to me." Setsuna listened to her and proceeded to sit down. Just then..
122.title: Meet up with Setsuna

choices: "I guess it couldn't hurt to grow a little."
"I'll think about it and come back later."
Takane comes while Mei makes her decision.
1221.content:
Although they thought they were safe, Negi and his newly grown students were far from it. Suddenly the trio were spotted by someone, who then proceeded to throw circular blasts of energy at them. However, they weren't ones that hurt people: they were merely capture bubbles of some kind. Setsuna proceeded to stand up immediately upon the first wave of attacks, using her sword to fend off the circles (the sword grew with her when she grew in size, as it was on her body at the time). Fairly soon the person who attacked them revealed their presence: it was Mei Sakura!

"Negi-sensei, I'm sorry", the timid girl told the child teacher, looking a little sad. "But I'm afraid I cannot allow you to use such a spell among your students. I was sent by my superiors to stop you before it gets worse, and to capture your students as well."

"Please don't do that, Mei-chan", Konoka begged her, walking up to the girl, who was scared by the girl's incredible size.

"B-B-B-Big-g-g K-K-K-Konoe-s-san.." Mei stuttered, too afraid to move. "Please don't hurt me, Konoe-san!"

"I'm not going to hurt you", Konoka smiled, petting the girl on the head with her left hand. Although Mei wasn't so much afraid of the girl as she was of her size.

"In fact, why don't you become big yourself?" smiled Konoka at the girl, who then began to stutter.

"I-I-I-I couldn't do that. Onee-sama would be really angry at me", Mei explained to Konoka. "Plus...being that tall might be scary."

"I agree", Setsuna added in, Negi nodding in agreement.

"Mei-chan, are you SURE you've never wanted to be big? To have Takane-san look up to YOU for a change, instead of the other way around?" Konoka giggled.

"Well...." Mei thought to herself, contemplating on whether or not to go with Konoka's idea..
1221.title: Mei springs forth

choices: He decided not to grow her
12211.content:
Mei thought for a while. She always did looked up to her older, bigger sister, and she always felt that maybe she would like to be bigger then her. She looked up to Konoka with her final decision.

"I made my mind, Konoka-san."

"What is your answer?"

"I..would like to be bigger."

Konoka was happy to hear that. And even though Setsuna was kind of worried about her decision, she didn't stop her request to be bigger. Konoka then put her down and looked at Negi.

"Will you do the honor, Negi-kun?" Konoka asked.

"Well, if it's okay with her, then I'll do it", the mage replied.

Negi then drew a circle around Mei and chanted a spell. The light surrounded the circle and he pointed the wand towards the worried girl. The tip of the wand glowed a faint light, then Negi spoke the key words.

"Incresco Tantus!"

The light on the tip of the wand glowed and shot at Mei. The light engulfed her and faded away in a few minutes. She didn't know if the magic worked until she felt something tingling around her body. First, her hair grew, then her legs grew larger. The rest of her body then started to grow until she was 20 feet taller. Mei was a little scared about the new height, but also excited by the new surroundings as well.

"Welcome to the group, Mei-chan", Konoka said.

"How do you feel?" Setsuna asked the shy giantess.

"Well....I'm a little scared, but I'm also really astonished by the surroundings", Mei said as she then looked at negi. "Thank you, Negi-sensei."

"No problem at all", he replied, looking a little bit worried by a third giantess.

After Negi and others had a talk, they heard the noise of a dropped object. Negi looked around, and it was Takane!. Her mouth was hung open as she was surprised at Mei's new height. She then looked at Negi with some confusion.

"Negi..wha..what's going on here? What happened to her?!"

"Well..I.." Negi tried to explain.

"Is this your doing?!"

She grabbed Negi's collar and swayed him up and down to get him to spill it out, but Mei stopped her by putting her finger at Negi's back. Takane then looked up at her..

"Mei, what is this?" Takane asked Mei, still feeling taller than her despite the height difference.

"Sis...this was my intention", Mei confessed.

Takane was shocked as Mei continued to talk.

"I always looked up to you, but I wanted to see what it would be like to see if I were bigger than you."

Takane stood there in awe as then looked at Negi.

"I want you to make me bigger", she asked of he young mage.

"Huh?" Negi mumbled.

"Make me bigger Negi, or you will be turned to an ermine!" she warned him.

She looked at Negi with a fairly scary set of eyes. He had to decide now whether or not to make Tekane big..
12211.title: A little growth goes a long way

choices: The four giantesses start fighting right away
12213.content:
"You're too slow", a voice said from the distance. Mei started to worry a little more now than usual, as she was well aware of whose voice that was. It was of Takane Goodman, her superior. The girl jumped out off of a nearby tree, landing pinpoint perfect on the grond. Her clothes were different than usual: while Takane usually wore one specific uniform, today she was dressing more casually, wearing a light blue t-shirt and jeans. However, she still wore boots.

"I'm sorry, Negi-sensei, but we cannot allow such an event to unfold in front of Mahora. You will be prosecuted for your actions and turned into an ermine."

"But no one's even seen us", Setsuna tried to reply, only to be given a loud "Hush" from Takane.

"Sensei, you have one of two choices: come quietly, or I'll be forced to fight you."

"But Takane-san, my students' size..."

"You think I'd forget about that?" smiled Takane, holding a small, label-less bottle in her right hand. "I will make myself grow and fight your students if need be. So, what will it be, sensei?"

Negi was too worried about being turned into an ermine. What was supposed to be a painless experiment ended up being a gigantic disaster.

"Negi-sensei, let me fight", Setsuna told her teacher, kneeling down on the ground and facing him. "I'll make sure you and Ojo-sama are safe."

"Set-chan, be careful", added Konoka, watching her friend pull out her sword and walking towards Takane.

"Takane-san, I'll fight you!" a serious Konoka told the girl "And if I win, Negi-sensei won't get turned into an ermine."

"Of course, but I want both you and your friend to fight", replied Takane. "Oh Mei~.."

"Y-Y-Y-Yes, onee-sama?" a worried Mei asked her superior, running over to her.

"Drink this", commanded Takane, forcing the liquid down Mei's throat. She soon gagged afterwards, the taste of the liquid not leaving a pleasant aftertaste. Soon after Takane also drank the liquid, and both girls felt a powerful surge inside of them. Mei was first, first noticing her tiny feet expanding in height, followed quickly by her hands, forcing her to put down her broomstick lest she snap it in half. The scared girl's head then grew, followed up by her arms, hair, and finally her stomach and chest. Takane's growth started with her hair, then her head, and then worked its way down all the way to her feet. A minute and a half passed between the girls, and they were both roughly 4 times the size they used to be, similar to Konoka and Setsuna.
12213.title: Enter Takane

choices: They were stuck like Setsuna and Konoka.
122132.content:
As the four giantesses took up a fighting stance Negi interrupted.

"WAIT!!" he screamed. "Don't you think a fight would cause more of a commotion here than just walking around?!" Tanake opened her mouth to speak then shut it again.

"You're right, sensei. If we are to fight, we should take it else where", said Setsuna. Negi let out a sigh of relief as Konoka picked him up and they moved to a much more secluded spot on campus. Once there the fight began. Tanake went straight for Konoka, attempting to take out the weakest first. Worst Mistake. Ever. The shadows Tanake used as her weapons were shattered in an instant. Setsuna's blade was soaring gracefully but deadly through the air. From where he was Negi could here its metal ringing with each swing. Despite all of her preconceptions, Tanake was soon defeated.

"Alright. You two win. Negi will not be turned into an ermine."

"Yay! You hear that, sensei?" Konoka yelled in joy to her teacher.

"Yes I did, and it's very good news", Negi said removing his hands he had protectively placed around his ears for the purpose of softening Konoka's extra loud voice. "But I wonder, Takane-san..did you and Mei-san have a plan to return to your normal size?"
122132.title: Negi tries to stop them

choices: The four giantesses start to shrink
The four giantesses grow even higher!
1221321.content:
"Indeed I did have a plan to fix this new height problems of mine", Takane smugly told the child teacher as she pulled out a small bottle from her left pant pocket. "This drink will restore anyone grown to their original size."

"Could you please show it with my students, Takane-san? That is..if you have enough", Negi asked the giant woman with puppy dog eyes. Takane couldn't say no to those eyes, and Mei was in the same trance she was.

"Fine", she said as she poured out 4 equal-sized servings to each of the 4 giantesses, using a bunch of (to them) very small plastic cups to drink from. All four girls quickly drank it down and found themselves glowing.

"I wonder what's going to happen?" Konoka chirped happily to Setsuna.

"I'm hoping it's a way to restore our original sizes", Setsuna replied, a little worried of the outcome that was about to happen.
1221321.title: Takane's Reversal Drink

choices: They get to the dorms without anyone noticing them
12213211.content:
Much to Negi's relief, his friends slowly began to shrink, and little by little their bodies were receding to their original sizes. Negi leaned his head back and closed his eyes for a second, only to feel a tug on his pant leg. Ignoring what he thought was the wind, he continued his relaxation until a much more violent tug startled him enough to make him move his head and look down. There he saw the four former giantesses standing now just up to his ankle. Negi stared at them before he actually realized who they were and quickly sat on the ground on his knees.

"Wha-What happened?! How are you... you were just. AHHH!" Negi rambled.

"Sensei, please calm yoursel.," Setsuna instructed. "In order for us to get through this, we must not lose control."

"You're right, Setsuna-san. Alright then we need to find away to get you all big again. But how? I could use the growth spell again, but I might over shoot it. Tanake-san, do you have anymore of that growth potion?"

"No I don't. Mei and I drank it all", she said, stepping onto his ready palm. Mei, who was to scared to move, was carefully picked up by Negi and cradled in his hand. Setsuna had already taken Konoka and the two now rested on Negi's head.

"Well, what should we do now?" Konoka asked. "If we tell someone, Negi-kun might still be turned into an ermine. But if we don't, we might never be able to be normal again."

"This is quiet the predicament", Setsuna sighed. Just then Negi stood up, and as he did something floated out of his pocket and to the ground. It was Yue's pactio card.

"That's it!" Negi shouted. "Yue-san's artifact! It's an encyclopedia that might have something on reversing the effects of a shrinking potion. But I wonder where she might be? I think I remember her saying something about going on another library expedition but that might have been yesterday." A figure moved through the woods behind Negi and he turned around.

"Wh-who's there?" He asked.

"Stupid Negi!" came the familiar call of Asuna as she charged him head on. "You just seem to cause trouble for everyone don'tcha?!" she said as she screeched to a halt. She the proceeded to calm down and told her teahcer, "If you're for Yue, she and Bookstore are in their dorms. You should hurry and get these four fixed before something happens."

"Ah, thank you Asuna-san", Negi bowed slightly to Asuna, making sure Setsuna and Konoka didn't slip. He then ran off to the dorms, but do they run into anyone along the way?
12213211.title: Backfired solution

12213212.content:
They all thought that the four giantess would shrink but instead they shot up more inches. They all now became 75 foot giantess now. Mei were getting scared by this while setsuna were dumbfounded by this and looked at takane.

"Hey, takane! I thought this would shrink us down!" Setsuna said.

"Huh? I thought this was a right potion." Takane said.

"If you don't mind, can I see the bottle takane san?" Negi asked.

"sure." takane replied.

Takane put the bottle to her palm. Negi carefully floated to her palm and got the bottle to check the bottle. He looked through, then made a shocking face, and takane were kind of worried.

"What? what's wrong?" Takane asked.

"This isn't shrinking medicen...this is very strong growing medicen." negi said.

"What!?" setsuna, takane, and mei shouted.

They all felt tingling sensation and they grew more. Now they were 120 foot and mei cryed as she was getting bigger and konoka hugged her to calm her down. She patted her back and she were calming down.

"Their their, don't cry mei chan." Konoka said.

"Yes, mei chan, don't cry." Negi said, floating next to her. mei looked at negi with tears flowing through her eyes.

"Negi sensei...would...you help...us?" Mei said, sobbing.

"I will, don't worry but now we must hide all of you." Negi said.

They all agreed, as they grew up now to 200 feet. Negi thought hard to hide them.

He thought of..
12213212.title: The four giantesses grow even higher!

choices: Setsuna, taking a walk after morning training
13.content: Usually when Negi does this kind of thing, Asuna or Konoka usually show up. But this time they didn't. Instead it was...
13.title: Nodoka? Setsuna? Neither?

131.content:
As soon as Negi was about to chant the spell, Nodoka Miyazaki showed in front of him. Nodoka was a shy girl, with long purple hair that often covered up her own eyes, and she often spoke in a voice as soft-spoken and shy as she was. However, around Negi she has much more assurance than she typically had, and has had a crush on him since the first day he began teaching, saving her from a fall with his own magic abilities.

"Good morning, Negi-sensei", Nodoka smiled to her teacher, who smiled in reply.

"Good morning to you too, Nodoka-san", Negi smiled back. "What are you up to on this fine day? I notice I don't see Yue-san and Haruna-san with you. Are they busy?"

Nodoka shook her head up and down in reply. "Haruna is busy drawing and Yue is reading some manga she purchased recently." With that, she looked at the circle of dirt on the ground. Upon notice, she walked up closer to her teacher. "What are you doing, Negi-sensei?"

Negi panicked at the thought of telling Nodoka what he was doing. "Well, um, I'm...you see...well...." he tried to say, but was unable to. Instead, Negi told her the truth: pure and simple.

"It's a spell that allows both inanimate and living things to expand in size", Negi eventually told Nodoka. "I was going to test it on this pebble in the middle of the dirt."

"Really? Can I watch you, sensei?" asked Nodoka, with a gleam in her eye. "I've always wanted to see something like this."

"Sure, Nodoka-san. Just stand back from me as I perform the incantation."

As typical of his incantations, Negi lifting up his magic stick in his hands and started recited the spell. He lifted the stick now, holding it vertically, and began the incantation: "Incresco Tantus".

A flash of life illuminates from the magic circle, but instead of aiming at the pebble in the center of the rock, it somehow misses and hits Nodoka instead. After being hit by the light blue beam of light, the light disappears completely, and the scenery looks exactly like it did before.

"Negi-sensei! What will happen to me?!" asked a worried Nodoka, clutching onto Negi with her arms, his face in her chest.

"I dun knoo", muffled Negi, still being hugged by Nodoka. "Boot I can proobably fix it." With that, Nodoka let go of Negi.

"Still, though, I wonder when the growth will take into eff..."

Before Nodoka could finish her sentence, she had already felt a tingling sensation in her body.

"Wh-wh-what's happening to me?!" questioned Nodoka, noticinig the increasing size of her hands, then looking down to seeing her expanding feet.

How long before Nodoka stops growing?
131.title: A Bigger Bookstore

choices: "I'd rather stay this height for now."
"I want you to grow with me!"
1311.content:
Nodoka's growth was not very long, though. Although at first frightened by her increasing size, at the end was only about 2 feet taller than she was before. Her teacher, who she already was taller than by almost a foot, now looked the size of a pre-school kid to her.

"Nodoka-san, are you all right?" the worried teacher asked his student, walking up right up to her face.

"Ah!" Nodoka squeaked as she backed up from Negi, a little scared of her mini-giantess height. She then clenched her left hand to her throat, noticing the slightly lower-pitched voice she had now. "Is this my voice?"

"Well, you are bigger", explained Negi. "I'm not surprised if your voice changed pitch as you grew, Nodoka-san."

"It seems so", Nodoka sighed. Negi once again tried to walk up to her, but Nodoka then hid behind a tree.

"Nodoka-san, what's wrong?" the saddened Negi asked the now 7-foot tall Nodoka.

"I'm scared I'll hurt you", Nodoka nervously told him. "I'm so much bigger than you now and all.."

"Don't worry, Nodoka-san. Even if you were 100 feet tall I wouldn't be scared by such a sweet, gentle girl like yourself."

Nodoka smiled a little at her teacher's comment, as well as blushed. The mini-giantess then came out from behind the tree and faced her backside to her teacher to compare their heights. Negi barely reached Nodoka's chest even while tiptoeing.

"This is kinda awkward, but cute", Nodoka smiled at her teacher as she hugged him, his face going straight into her chest. "Thanks for being so nice to me, sensei."

"Yoor welfomv", Negi muttered in Nodoka's chest, barely able to speak. She noticed this and quickly let go of him, bowing her head in apology.

"I know you like your current height, Nodoka-san, but I think I might know a way to make you smaller again. I read up on a shrinking spell as well in my studies recently. Would you be okay with that? It's your choice."

"Well, sensei, to tell you the truth.." Nodoka began, taking a brief pause before continuing.
1311.title: Mini-giantess Nodoka

choices: She shrinks down smaller than that
13112.content:
"Negi-sensei, could you return me to my normal height?" Nodoka asked her teacher, standing on her knees to get a better look at him.

"Sure thing, Nodoka-san", Negi replied, making another circle in the dirt around the girl. "Now stand still and don't move."

"Y-Yes sir", Nodoka giggled as she saluted Negi like a soldier does his commanding officer. Negi then proceeded to lift his staff up in front of him once again as he performed a different spell this time.

"Minor Tantus!"

With that, a blast of blue light encircled Nodoka from below her, and she watched as she became smaller and the view around her getting bigger as the mini-giantess started to shrink down in size. Before long she was almost her traditional height once again, but does she stop there?
13112.title: Nodoka: back to normal?

131122.content: Negi watched as Nodoka shrunk down smaller than her original height, causing both teacher and student alike to worry about what was happening. But when did the shrinking finally stop?
131122.title: Incredible shrinking Nodoka

choices: They find it kind of cute
They're confused by the whole ordeal
1311221.content:
By the time Nodoka stopped shrinking, she was almost exactly one foot smaller than she used to be. In fact the girl, who once stood over Negi by over six inches, was now six inches shorter than him. It was a very dizzying view for Nodoka, who had to face her head a little upward to see her teacher.

"S-s-sensei.." she shyly blurted out to Negi, tugging on his left shirt. She then looked straight up at him and blushed a little, but also was crying slightly. Negi then reached into his right pant pocket and pulled out a tissue for Nodoka, who quietly whispered "Thanks" as she wiped the slight tears from her eyes.

"Are you okay?" Negi asked his student, looking a little downtrodden. "I'm sorry, Nodoka-san..."

"It's all right", Nodoka replied, slowly showing a smile. "I always wondered what it would be like if you were taller than me. It feels like we're...well...."

"A what?" Negi asked, contemplating the end of Nodoka's sentence.

"...a..coup...le", Nodoka finished. This caused Negi to flush red.

"N-N-N-Nodoka-san, I like you, but I'm not sure if.." Negi began to blurt out as Nodoka laughed at his facial expression.

"Oh, sensei, I was kidding", Nodoka said in a cheerful voice. "Also..out of curiosity, could we please measure each other?"

"Sure", Negi replied as he faced his back to Nodoka's, both a little surprised by the new height difference they had. The 4 foot girl then placed her hands on top of Negi's, noticing how much bigger they were than her's, and how warm they felt.

"Could you please let got of my hands now?" an awkward Negi asked his student, who quickly placed her hands on her backside. "Thanks."

"At this height you look almost like a big brother", Nodoka smiled. "And me your little sister."

"I just hope no one finds out about this, Nodoka-san.."

And then, as if Negi jinxed it, Nodoka's friends came up from the distance: Haruna and Yue. As they walked ever closer to Negi, they noticed the shrunken Nodoka. They at first thought she simply ate one of Chamo's age pills and shrunk down to a 7 year-old's height, but Haruna noticed that her friend's proportions didn't change when she shrunk as the two walked up to Negi and Nodoka, and their reaction to it was...
1311221.title: Child-sized Nodoka

13112211.content:
Haruna's immediate reaction to the the tinier Nodoka was hugging her as soon as she made contact with the girl. It felt so weird to the shrunken girl, like she was being hugged by a mother instead of her best friend. Even Yue was taller than Nodoka now, which creeped both of them out.

"Nodoka, how did you get so small?" a confused, worried Yue asked, measuring herself with Nodoka to see how tall they were in comparison. Yue beat her friend by a couple of inches!

"S-sensei shrunk me..", replied Nodoka, looking brightly at her teacher as she said so.

"Negi-sensei, how could you!?" a stern Yue asked him, her face right up next to his.

"Yue, it was an accident!" defended Nodoka, hugging her friend from behind her. "Please don't be mad at him! He was only trying to help!"

"Help?" wondered Haruna. "Why? What happened?"

"Well...first I grew, and then I shrunk, and then.." Nodoka explained to her friends, who afterwards looked at Negi in a combination of shock and disgust.

"Negi-kun! You didn't tell me you had the power to make things bigger!" Haruna said to her teacher, teasingly batting his nose. "What else have you tried?"

"A-A-Actually, Nodoka-san was the first person I tried it on...", admitted Negi, facing away from his students. "And I have to fix this right away.."

"Awwwww. Do you have to? Look how cute Nodoka is!!" Haruna asked her teacher, hugging her tiny friend in her arms. "She's sooooo cute!"

"Even I have to admit that a smaller Nodoka's kind of cute", Yue added. "Even if it is a little weird that I'm taller than her.."

"Negi-kun! Can you shrink Nodoka some more!? I'll promise to take good care of her", teased Haruna as she hugged her friend once again.

"Nodoka's not a pet, Haruna", snapped Yue, releasing her friend from her bifocal friend's gasp. "Negi-sensei, do you think you could try the spell again?"

"Well, that's really up for Nodoka to deci..." began Negi as Nodoka rushed over to her.

"Negi-sensei, please. If my friends want me to return to normal size, please do so", said Nodoka, looking quite sad in her teacher's arms.

"Okay then. Nodoka-san, stand still as I make a circle in the dirt and reverse this", instructed Negi as he began to make a circle around her feet. But what would the result be this time?
13112211.title: Hugs for Nodoka

choices: She cries, and all three console her
131122111.content:
To Haruna's delight, her friend shrunk bit by bit until she was the size of a large plush toy. She beamed at Nodoka throughout the entire process, waiting impatiently to snatch her little friend up the first chance she got. Unfortunately for her, Yue got to Nodoka first and cradled her (though not for the same reasons as Haruna) to keep her small friend away from Haruna's crushing embrace. She had a very hard time resisting the urge to follow her larger friend in embracing Nodoka as soon as she picked her up, however. Her urge turned to reality when Nodoka reached up and wrapped her arms around Yue's neck. She hugged the figure draped around her and formed a spring board with her hands as Nodoka jumped from her to Haruna, who hugged the little Nodoka and spun in place as she caught her.

"Negi-kun, thank you SOOOOOOO much!" Haruna shouted, causing Nodoka to clap her hands over her ears.

"Negi-sensei!" an extremly frightened Nodoka squealed. "Please try to stop making me shrink!"

"I promise I will, Nodoka-san", Negi said frantically, patting his student on the head IN order to quell her torrent of soon-to-come tears. But do they come, or does Nodoka man-up and go on a date with her seemingly large teacher?!
131122111.title: Down ya go oh Nodoka

choices: Negi tries to cheer her up
Negi just spends some alone time with her
1311221111.content:
Nodoka couldn't take it any more. The world suddenly increasing in size around her startled the girl so much that she could barely breathe. When she finally did calm down, though, she started to whimper as she hugged Negi's right leg. She then cried into it, hiding her face in his pant leg as he, Yue, and Haruna heard her cry (albeit muffled). When Negi sat on the ground to get a better look at her, her face was blood red, and tears still ran down her face.

Her friends tried to cheer up, but it was to no avail. No matter how many times she was told how neat it was to shrink or the jokes about she'll always have room to sit somewhere she heard from Haruna, the feeling didn't change for the upset, crying little girl. Even Negi's patting her head again didn't seem to help much.

"Negi-sensei...!" was all Nodoka could respond with when she finally stopped crying. "I'm scared! I want to go back to my dorm room!"

"I understand", he replied, picking up the girl in his hands, holding her close to his chest. "Let's go then."

Nodoka felt at first scared being pressed against her teacher's chest, but soon she changed her mood. His big, gentle hands felt almost comforting to her, so much that she didn't even care that she was over 3 feet off the ground (which, at her height, would be the equivalent of a story or two from a building). Nodoka then clenched her fingers into his shirt over the next few minutes as he walked into her dorm room and then sat on her bed, Haruna and Yue beside the teacher.

"Here we are, Nodoka-san!" Negi told his student, who felt a little sleepy from the walk. He was just happy that she wasn't crying any more. As he placed her on her pillow, though, he felt another tug from the tiny girl.

"Don't leave me, sensei!" Nodoka demanded, looking scared. "Please stay with me for a little while."

"Nodoka...", Yue sighed in response to her worried friend. She then faced Negi with a serious look on her face. "Negi-sensei, please stay here with Nodoka."

"B-b-but what ab-b-bout f-fixing...?"

"You can do that later! She's really upset!" she barked at her teacher, Haruna nodding in agreement. "Please, sensei! You did this to her! It's your responsibility."

"You're right, Yue-san", Negi nodded. He then took off his shoes and sat down on the bed next to Nodoka. "Nodoka-san, I'll stay here for your sake."

"S-s-sensei...", the timid girl replied, blushing a little at her teacher's "giant" face. She then proceeded over to his stomach and got on top of it. "Thank you very much.."

"Awww. She's like a puppy", Haruna giggled as she opened the door. "We'll leave you two alone, okay?"

"Sensei, be careful", warned Yue as she left the dorm alongside Haruna, closing the door. Negi had a unnerving feeling about her warning, but he hadn't much time to think about it. He had to take care of Nodoka..
1311221111.title: Little Nodoka, big tears

13112211112.content:
Despite her miniature stature, Nodoka got to use this opportunity to talk to Negi for quite a while about whatever was on her mind, as did Negi himself. It was the longest conversation she ever had with the boy, and she was delighted by every minute of it. She even found herself getting used to her smaller stature when Negi picked off food for her to eat and even shrunk little straws for her to drink cans of soda with. They even spend some time outdoors, with Nodoka watching a whole movie safely snugged in her teacher's front shirt pocket. It was one of the best days of her life.

When the two headed back to the dorm later that night, though, something happened to the shrunken girl: she was getting bigger! Nodoka found herself quickly outgrowing Negi's pocket, now up to the 1 foot mark (and growing) as she stood beside her teacher and continue to shoot up in the air. Higher and higher she went until she eventually found herself at her original height once more. Once this happened she hugged her teacher harder than she ever had before, followed by kissing him on the lips in gratitude.

"Thank you for this wonderful day, Negi-sensei!" a euphoric Nodoka told her teacher. "If you ever feel like shrinking me ever again, please tell me!"

"Um....okay", a baffled Negi replied as she left Nodoka's dorm and headed back to his own. Haruna and Yue, meanwhile, looked at the two from about 25 feet down the hall, spying on them the entire time ever since they "left".

"I think I want Negi-sensei to shrink me too", Yue commented. "Riding in his shirt pocket looks kind of fun."

"Not to me", Haruna explained to her friend. "I like to think BIG!"
13112211112.title: From "Worst Day Ever" to "Best Day Ever"

1311222.content:
Noticing that everything around her seemed to be expanding at an alarming rate, indicating that she was indeed shrinking to a tiny size, Nodoka began panicking. Smaller and smaller she shrank, right down until she was, at most, just a foot tall!

''Negiiiiii!'' She squeaked, petrified, ''I'm t-too small now! C-can you try again to fic me, please?!''

''Umm... alright, Nodoka-chan.'' Negi stammered, his confidence shaken by this mistake. He knelt down beside her for sake of better aim, and took in a deep breath. However, before he could try the growing spell again:

''Negi?''

Who is the speaker?
1311222.title: Doll-sized.

choices: Let Haruna find out about Nodoka's height
1312.content:
Nodoka was increasingly worried about her newfound height, as she felt all her body parts, from the tips of her toes, to the cowlicks on the top of her purple hair, growing in size at a rate of several centimers a second. While her clothes indeed grew with her, so did her anxeity. And how would Yue and Haruna react to this? Nodoka already felt awkward concerning her height around Negi, and this didn't help manners.

A few minutes later, however, Nodoka finally stopped growing. Her final height was almost 15 feet tall, a little less than triple her normal height. Too embarassed to move, much less talk, Nodoka simply stood frozen stiff like a statue.

"N-n-n-n-n--negi s-s-s-s-s-sensei..." Nodoka slowly and shyly blurted out. "I'm s-s-so sorry for leaving y-y-you in a position like this." All the poor girl could do right now was feel frustrated at the mess she caused Negi. With that, Nodoka kneeled her long legs onto the ground, and then lowered her head, which was even bigger than Negi's stomach. "Please forgive me."

"It's not your fault, Nodoka-san", Negi assured Nodoka. "I should've been more careful with my spell. If anything, I should be the one apologizing to you." With that, Negi himself bowed his head towards Nodoka, nearly looking at the mini-giantess face-to-face as he told her this.

"Negi-sensei looks so cute", thought Nodoka to herself. "Almost like a doll. I want to hold him in my arms and embrace him in a hug, but..."

Just then, Nodoka and Negi heard a voice in the distance. "Hey, you two lovebirds!" chimed an out-of-distance Haruna.

"Haruna?!" exclaimed Negi and Nodoka. "We can't let her find out!"
