1312.title: Around 10 to 15 feet

choices: Go on a date, but not before Nodoka has an unexpected growth spurt
13121.content:
Knowing how hard it would be to hide a girl 15 feet tall, Negi and Nodoka let Haruna find out about the latter's height. Instead of being scared by the sight like Negi was, Haruna was both delighted and amused by her friend's new height.

"I guess your growth spurt came earlier than you thought it would", giggled Haruna.

"Haruna!", cried Nodoka, tears slightly rolling down her eyes. "I'm really scared! I don't find this neat at all!"

"There there, Nodoka", Haruna told her friend as she stepped closer to her, her attitude now a complete reversal that it was a minute ago. "Have a tissue..er, several tissues." Haruna grabbed many a tissue out of her pocket, and although Nodoka used them, they didn't last long. Nodoka was still thankful for them, though, and thanked Haruna for being more understanding now.

"Hey Nodoka, You know what you should know do before you shrink back to normal size?" asked Haruna.

"Yes?" replied Nodoka, still red in the face and a little sad.

"You and Negi should have a date!" Haruna grinned. "How many people get the opportunity to date a 15 foot-tall girl like yourself?"

"D-d-d-d-date?!" said Negi in shock. "But Haruna-san.."

"Don't worry about it. I won't tell another soul about what I just saw. Now you two lovebirds have fun", grinned Haruna, pushing Negi right up to Nodoka. He and Nodoka then looked at each other face to face, blushing yet again.

"Negi-sensei, if you don't want to do this, you don't have to", reminded Nodoka, blushing.

"Well...I don't often get to see this kind of thing in action. And I was hoping to find a cure.." contemplated Negi.

"Cure, shmure!" yelled Haruna, playfully slapping Negi in the back with her right hand right into Nodoka. "They'll be more time to talk about later. You two go have fun!"

"Well, if you say so", simultaneously replied Negi and Nodoka, who decided to then walk away. After a few minutes of walking, thankfully unseen by the other students or faculty, Negi finally spoke.

"Nodoka-san, do you know why Haruna-san is pressuring us to hang out?" he asked his taller student.

"Well, you see...the reason I met up with you today was no accident. Haruna-san somehow overheard you and Asuna-san talking about the growth spell."

"Eh!?!" Negi exclaimed. "She knew from the beginning!?"

"I-I did too, sensei", Nodoka shyly replied. "The thing is, Yue, Haruna, and me played rock-paper-scissors to see what you were up to..."

"And I suppose you were the winner?" asked Negi. Nodoka shook her head up and down in reply. "Oh, I see", he added. "I guess Haruna-san wanted to see the results, then? But what about Yue-san? She loves magic abilities. I thought you said she was reading manga right now."

"I thought she was as well...", said Nodoka.

"Odds are we're going to bump into her at some point today", Negi told Nodoka. "I hope she doesn't react too awkwardly to this."

"I hope so, too", agreed Nodoka.

Now what should Negi and Nodoka do?
13121.title: Let Haruna find out about Nodoka's height

choices: She didn't, much to Negi's relief
131212.content:
Nodoka felt very awkward walking alongside her teacher, but at the same time she thought it was strangely cute. Now that she was 15 feet tall, Negi couldn't help but notice the augmented cuteness of his student, something he wasn't blind to at her original height, either.

"Despite the circumstances, Negi-sensei, it makes me happy we're going on a date", blushed Nodoka as she giggled to herself. Before she continued, though, she felt a strange feeling in her chest, causing the giantess to collapse on the ground on her legs.

"Nodoka-san!!", screamed a frightened Negi, running up to his student. "Are you all right!?"

"I...don't..think...so..", Nodoka cried as she felt her body tingling all over. The already tall 14 year-old girl was about to get a LOT bigger, as her body shot up in height, starting with the tips of her toes and ending with her head. In a manner of about 2 minutes Nodoka had grown to 30 feet tall, causing the now taller giantess to cuddle up on her butt in a fetal position.

"S-s-sensei....", cried Nodoka. "You must think I'm a freak..."

"Not at all", Negi assured her. "Nodoka-san, I would like you if you were 2 inches tall or 200 feet tall."

"Really?" smiled Nodoka, feeling a little relieved as she grabbed Negi with her hands and placed his head on her chest. "Thank you so much." Negi felt worried and happy at once in the giantess's grasp. He hadn't felt such a warm embrace since Nekane hugged him back in England.

"Let's go for a walk instead, Negi-sensei", the 30 foot-tall Nodoka said as she stood back up. "I'm happy just being with you."

"Me too", Negi nodded in reply. He prayed that Nodoka wouldn't get any bigger, but...
131212.title: Big heart, bigger student

choices: Negi is drawn ever closer to Nodoka's lips
Nodoka places Negi down next to her face
1312121.content:
Nodoka smiled as she walked with her teacher. Even if she was 6 times his size, she couldn't help but be happy just walking beside him. Of course, at her height she purposely had to walk slowly for Negi to catch up to her, but she didn't mind. When Negi reassured Nodoka that he would like her even if she was 200 feet tall, she felt much calmer about her newfound height. She even contemplated getting bigger.

....and at about that instnat, Nodoka felt weird again. Negi noticed it, too: her hair was covering up her entire head, and her arms and hands shot far away from her head. Her cute, long legs grew instantly several feet higher into the air, and her shoes were catching up to, and growing higher than, Negi's knees. Then her stomach and chest grew, the latter surpassing the size of Negi's head and then some. Lastly was her head, which grew in several small spurts until it reached the rest of her body's growth. At the end the alrady 30 foot-tall "bookstore girl" had grown to an even more impressive 75 feet tall!

"Nodoka-san! Are you alright?" Negi panicked, wondering if his student was growing to cry. Suddenly, he was grabbed by Nodoka's now enormous right hand, who proceeded to lift the teacher up to her eye level.

"Negi-sensei's so cute", she smiled, also blushing. Negi proceeded to blush as well: Nodoka's cuteness seemed to grow with her height.

"Nodoka-san, did you WISH to grow bigger?" Negi asked her point blank.

"Yes", the cheerful giantess smiled, placing the teacher on her chest, sitting down on her back on the ground. "I've never been so happy in my life." The 75-foot tall giantess then began to play with Negi's hair with her right pinky finger, giggling all the while.

My growth spell must make whoever grows happier, Negi thought to himself After Nodoka-san grew a second time she seemed much happier. I guess the more they grow, the happier they get? Before Negi could think about it some more, he felt Nodoka's chest increasing in size. The already tall girl grew to an even higher 120 feet tall, and once again proceeded to giggle as she grew.

"Negi-sensei", Nodoka smiled cheerfully, once again lifting Negi, this time to her face. "I love you so very, very much." The girl then proceeded to place Negi even closer to her lips to kiss him, but Negi was afraid of getting eaten.

I can see it now, he thought to himself. "120-foot tall girl swallows kid teacher whole". Oh, what have I done?!
1312121.title: A taller, happier Nodoka

13121212.content:
Concerned with his student inching him ever so closer to her face, Negi was relieved to see Nodoka instead place him right next to her face, putting him feet down on the ground. The cheerful giantess student of his could only help but smile at her teacher, who gulped a large gulp at her intimidating size.

"Nodoka-san, don't you want to be normal sized again?" asked Negi nervously, afraid of Nodoka overreacting to his question. "You can't stay this big forever, you know."

"Negi-sensei, don't worry about it", smiled Nodoka once again, once again patting Negi's head with her right pinky finger. "For the first time in my life I feel safe and happy being taller than you. I would never want that taken away from me." And with that, Nodoka felt her body tingling once again. Perhaps she was growing, or was she shrinking to a smaller height?
13121212.title: Nodoka's revelation

131212121.content:
Nodoka noticed the distance between her and her teacher was getting ever further, and she smiled as she saw herself grow ever taller. Even at 120 feet tall Negi still at least came up to his student's individual fingers in height, but now even they were starting to creep up high above him as the already tall Nodoka felt herself growing ever larger. Nodoka watched as she grew so big she could see halfway up through some of the buildings of Mahora Academy...and she was still sitting down! Negi began to worry some more as he tried to clear the way from Nodoka, but the growing giantess picked up the teacher with two of her left hand and placed the boy on her chest to protect him from harm. Negi found himself looking face to face with his student as she grew, now finally stopping at a height of 300 feet tall!

"Sensei, do you think I'm cute as a giantess?" the 300 foot-tall giggled to herself.

"Y-y-yes", Negi replied bashfully in a combination of both fear and blushing at his student's cuteness. Nodoka smiled in reply, but seemed a little sad at the same time.

"As happy as I am of being a giantess, though, I wish my friends could see me and join me. Say! Why don't we do that, sensei?"

Negi seemed reluctant. The last thing he wanted was several skyscraper-sized students running amock and revealing his magic abilities.

"I don't think we shou..." Negi began before Nodoka stuffed the boy in her right skirt pocket. Nodoka then began to stand up (using a tree as balance) from the ground and proceeded to head to her dorm room, careful to not step on anything.

I wonder who should grow with me... Nodoka wondered to herself. She didn't mean anything bad by it: Nodoka was just lonely at her new height.
131212121.title: Nodoka's even taller view

1312121211.content:
"Nodoka-san! Wait!" Negi cried.

Nodoka continued to look forward as she walked closer to the academy dorms. "Ugh, she can't hear me..." Negi groaned, "We aren't going to the dorms. are we?"

Just then, Haruna and Yue were walking out of the dorm. Haruna held some books in her arms while Yue walked beside her sipping a juice box.

"Where in the world is Nodoka?" Haruna asked her friend.

"Huh? Don't you remember? Nodoka-san is with Negi-sensei", Yue replied.

"Negi-Sensei?" Haruna repeated.

"Yeah, don't you remember the rock-paper-scissors thing?" Yue asked.

"Oh, yeah,"said Haruna, slapping her head after finally remembering. "Poor Nodoka...a girl who can't even win one game of rock-paper-scissors...Oh, well, I hope she's having fun with Negi-kun. If you know what I mean...".

"Don't be such a pervert", Yue remarked.

"Oh, c,mon,"Haruna mocked, "You don't think Nodoka and Negi-kun are.."

"Don't say anymore. Please! "Yue growled as her face lit red.

"Alright, geez, calm down..." said Haruna, "I was only-"

"Being a pervert."

"Hey!"

"Haruna-san! Yue-san!" a voice boomed out of nowhere, giving the two girls quite a shock.

"What the heck was that?" Yue asked.

"It sounds like Nodoka..."Haruna said.

"Up here!" the girl in question smiled to her friend. Haruna and Yue looked up past some trees to see the upper body of the 300 foot tall giantess.

"Whoa..."Yue looked at Haruna, "You don't think Negi-kun's behind this, do you?"

"Huh? Oh, I, uh..." Haruna didn't expect Nodoka to be looking for her.

Nodoka took Negi out of her pocket and placed him gently on the ground.

"Your magic, Negi-sensei?" Yue asked.

"Uh, yes..."Negi uttered silently and slowly. Meanwhile, Yue was observing her giantess friend.

"I didn't expect you to master a growing spell..." she said as she noticed Nodoka walked closer to them.

"Well, actually I didn't master it", Negi told Haruna, "So I need to find a cure for the spell."

"A cure?"Nodoka heard, "Why? I like being so tall... In fact, I want for Haruna-san and Yue-san to be too!"

"What?! Sorry, but I'm not going to be hit by a spell Negi-sensei hasn't mastered yet", Yue told her friend point blank.

"I'll do it!" Haruna said. "Let's get ready, Negi-kun!"

"Alright!" Nodoka cheered at her friend's suggestion.

"No, we can't!" Negi hesitated to say. "I can't have everyone running around and-". "Relax, Sensei," Haruna said to her teacher as she patted his head, "We'll be sure not get anyone's attention." Negi didn't think he was going to change his students' minds so he gave in. "I suppose...", he then sighed. "Oh thank you, Negi-Sensei!" Haruna smiled at the boy as she hugged him tightly. "Haruna-san, that's enough..."the poor child teacher nearly choked.

Negi then drew a circle around Haruna in the dirt, watching the girl continuously smile all throughout.

"I want everyone to stand back", Negi warned Nodoka, Yue, and Haruna as he began to lift his staff in the air. "And Haruna-san..please stand still okay?" Haruna then winked at Negi, confirming his request. Yue and Nodoka stood away from Negi and Haruna as he began to recite the spell.

"Incresco Tantus!"

Negi cast the spell like normal, but instead of hitting Haruna, the spell had hit Yue!

"Oh, no!" Negi gasped as the usually short girl's transformation to a giantess began before his eyes. Yue's legs began growing, following her head, arms, and torso. Yue had became 15 feet tall and continued to grow. Haruna could only stutter as she watched Yue grow 25 feet in size, and then one last spurt up to 40 feet tall.

"Negi-sensei! Please reverse this right now!" the giantess Yue yelled at her teacher. Nodoka panicked and starting "shh"-ing the girl, telling her while in a panic, "Don't shout! Someone might hear you!" "But I don't want to be huge like you, Nodoka! Change me back!"

"I-I-I can't! I don't know how!" Negi told his student. Meanwhile, Haruna looked in awe at Yue and Nodoka as they towered over her and her teacher. "Yue", Haruna then began, "Maybe you should enjoy being very tall. You're so cute!" Haruna's response caused Yue to cock an eyebrow at her, wondering how her tremendous size could be considered cute.
1312121211.title: If He Messed Up Once...

choices: Negi refuses to make Haruna grow
13121212111.content:
Yue decided to look on the bright side of her growth. Now she wouldn't have to worry about being referred to as "shorty" or "small fry", or be mistaken for an elementary school student. Now much calmer than earlier, Yue stand down on her knees and bowed her head to Negi.

"I'm sorry I got angry earlier", apologized Yue. "I won't make any more fuss."

"It's okay, Yue-san. Nodoka-san reacted in much the same manner when she first grew...before she grew again."

"Eh!? You mean Yue is going to get bigger!?" an inquisitive Haruna asked Negi. What very little relief Yue had was now all but gone upon Negi telling her that.

"How much bigger is Yue going to get, Negi-kun!?" Haruna added to her previous quesiton.

"Well", Negi quietly blurted out to his excited student, "Nodoka-san started out around 15 feet tall before she grew to 300 feet or so.."

"Wow", Haruna smiled at Yue. "You're going to become a giantess goddess, Yue."

"I don't want to be that big", Yue stammered, blushing in embarrassment at her giant height. As Yue continued to freak out, she felt a powerful surge going through her body again. The 45 foot tall giantess noticed her hair growing to more than twice the length it already was, soon followed by her feet, legs, arms, hands, torso, and lastly her head. When all was said and done, Yue was now 100 feet tall.

"Sensei!" Yue cried as she hugged Negi with her giant hands in a moment of cowardice. "I don't want to be any bigger! Please fix this now!"

"I told you, Yue-san, I don't know how!", Negi whimpered to his giantess student. Nodoka, meanwhile, patted her friend's head in an attempt to comfort her.

"There, there", Nodoka whispered to her fellow giantess friend, in a tone like that of a mother quieting down her crying newborn baby. "I won't let anything happen to you."

"Nodoka..." Yue replied to her friend, standing up on her legs and hugging her. Nodoka then wrapped her arms around the girl as well.

"Awwwwww", Haruna smiled in delight of her best friends hugging. "Isn't friendship beautiful, Negi-kun?"

"I guess so", Negi answered with a blank stare on his face.

"Well, now that that's done, how's about we finally make me bigger?" Haruna asked of her teacher, placing her head next to his own and smirking.
13121212111.title: Attempt to go with the flow

131212121111.content:
Negi thought for few minutes about this, then he smiled. He drew the circle around Haruna, and when he finished he looked at her.

"Are you sure you want to do it?" Negi asked.

"Yeah", Haruna replied.

Negi breathed in and breathed out. He chanted the incantation 'Incresco Tantus!'. The tip of the magic wand glowed, a light burst out, and then hit Haruna. All four of them covered their eyes, and when the light faded everyone lowered their arms. Haruna then discovered that her surroundings became smaller. She was now 15 foot tall, and excited by this.

"Wow! Now I'm a giantess!" Haruna gasped.

"You look cuter now, Haruna", Nodoka said with a smile.

"I agree", Yue replied.

"Really? Thanks! and thank you too, sensei!" Haruna squealed. She then picked Negi up and smiled at him with joyful emotion.

"Um, no problem..now I'll try to find a-" Negi said, but was soon interrupted.

Haruna started to grow again, and this time it was 25 foot. Yue and Nodoka were amazed by how she grew even faster, but then Yue started to grow as well, only this time to 75 foot. She looked at Negi with fear.

"Negi-sensei, please find a cure for this!" Yue asked with a worried face.

Negi nodded, as he didn't want these girls to have trouble, including himself. But before he could find the cure, he wanted a safer place to let these girls hide from the rest of the people in Mahora. Negi thought, then got the idea on where they would hide.
131212121111.title: Finishing the growing trio

choices: Continue looking for a girl to grow
1312121212.content:
"Maybe Asuna-san or Konoka-san or.."

Nodoka continued talking to herself. She made sure she didn't step on anybody while walking towards Mahora to look for someone else. Negi sat in her pocket, trying to not bounce about in her pocket.

I know Nodoka-san wants someone to else to grow with her, but I don't think we need other huge girls running around here. I'm sorry Nodoka-san, but you are going to shrink whether you want to or not he said to himself.

I need to get back to my room and get my spell book. When I get it, I can find the shrinking spell. I should also get the sleeping spell so when she falls asleep and then wakes up a few hours later, she would think this was all a dream.

Negi looked around and saw his staff so he grabbed it and jumped on it. He then flew up to the hole at the top of the pocket. He quietly flew out of it and started flying towards the dorms so he can get his book. He looked back and saw that Nodoka hadn't felt nor saw him leave. He started flying faster than he was earlier.

Nodoka continued listing girls that Negi could make grow for her when she suddenly felt her pocket empty.

"Hm?"

She put her hand in her pocket and she didn't feel anything.

"Huh? Negi-sensei left, but why? Should I continue looking for a girl to grow with me, or find him?" she asked herself.
1312121212.title: Escape from Nodoka's pocket

choices: He's interrupted by Nodoka having another Growth Spurt!
nothing he does the spell but to no effect! Can't Shrink the unwilling!
13121212122.content:
"I should go find Negi, after all what if I want to grow bigger or worse what if Negi-Kun is plotting to shrink me? I'm not ready to be normal size again anytime soon" mused the giant girl.


She changed direction just a bit and started her search for Negi determined more than she had ever been on anything with every fiber of her being to stay BIG as long as she can. It wasn't about power or ego or ill intent but rather she now simply liked being big.

The perspective was nice, her cuteness was apparently magnified and she found it oddly fun.


Nodoka made her way to Negi's place.


Meanwhile Negi had just found the spell book with the Growth Spell in it. Flipping thru it frantically he searched for a Shrinking Spell.

Nodoka however getting closer but not close enough to feel the tremors yet until she stopped another growth spurt starting much to her joy.


Bigger and bigger Nodoka swelled, watching the world around her seem smaller and smaller. She grew until stopping at 500 Feet tall.

"Wow I wonder how big I'll get?" Was all she said before continuing to Neji's leaving even bigger footprints in her wake and making the ground quake more.

Soon Neji had began to feel the tremors getting stronger..closer...

He rushed outside with his book and was soon greeted by the larger now 500 Feet tall Nodoka.

"Darn she grew again! Enough is enough I'm sorry Nodoka but this has to end" said Neji.


He just found the Shrinking Spell when she leaned down and picked him up. He was about to attempt the spell when...
13121212122.title: Go look for Negi

choices: The Spell backfires! Nodoka is Growing bigger!
The Spell Backfires! Nodoka Shrinks to normal in her own big Footprint But Negi s
The Spell works a little too well! From Giantess to Pocket Sized!
131212121223.content:
Bigger and bigger Nodoka swelled, watching the world around her seem smaller and smaller. She grew until stopping at 500 Feet tall.

"Wow I wonder how big I'll get?" Was all she said before continuing to Neji's leaving even bigger footprints in her wake and making the ground quake more.

Soon Neji had began to feel the tremors getting stronger..closer...

He rushed outside with his book and was soon greeted by the larger now 500 Feet tall Nodoka.

"Darn she grew again! Enough is enough I'm sorry Nodoka but this has to end" said Neji.


He just found the Shrinking Spell when she leaned down and picked him up. He was about to attempt the spell when...
131212121223.title: More Choices

choices: BIG Date! With size comes courage
1312121212231.content:
"Darn she grew again! Enough is enough I'm sorry Nodoka but this has to end" said Neji.


He just found the Shrinking Spell when she leaned down and picked him up. He was about to attempt the spell when the motion of Nodoka's giant hand made him mess up.
He'd only got out the 1st Syllable or 2 and lost his focus.


To his horror but Nodoka's glee as the 500 ft student stood up she began to grow grow once more.
Up and up both her height and size creeped.
Nodoka continued to grow until her fresh spurt put her at 750 feet tall.



Negi's worry was in stark contrast to Nodoka's enjoyment.
1312121212231.title: The Spell backfires! Nodoka is Growing bigger!

choices: Nodoka plays with the tiny Negi
1312121212232.content:
"Darn she grew again! Enough is enough I'm sorry Nodoka but this has to end" said Neji.


He just found the Shrinking Spell when she leaned down and picked him up. He was about to attempt the spell when the motion of Nodoka's giant hand made him mess up.
Negi lost his focus.

"Huh why isn't it working" asks Negi.

But as the 500 foot girl stands back up she feels strange.

"Oh boy is it happening again? Wait this feels slightly different"

Suddenly the change begins.
Nodoka scans her surroundings and notices the ground and objects below getting closer.
It was slow but noticeable.

"What's happening? Oh no I must be getting small again! I don't wanna be small again! Negi-Sensei please don't let me shrink"

The girl continued to shrink never the less.
She shrunk until she was back to her original size mostly save 3 inches taller.
There she stood in the crater that was her own footprint from earlier.

It then dawned on her Negi had shrunk too.
1312121212232.title: The Spell Backfires! Nodoka Shrinks to normal i...

choices: "We should go looking for anything suspicious around here."
"Maybe we should meet up with Asuna-san and Ojo-sama."
132.content:
Just as Negi was about to start the incantation, one of his students, Setsuna, came walking in his field of vision. The black-haired girl had her hair down today (a rare event), and was dressed in a plain white shirt and black shorts as she noticed her teacher in the distance. Still holding her sword in her hand, she dropped it near her teacher and began to talk to him as she approached him.

"Good morning, Negi-sensei", she smiled to her teacher, waving her left hand to him, her other hand putting down her sword near him.

"Good morning to you too, Setsuna-san", smiled Negi in reply, also waving to the girl. "What are you doing today in this most beautiful weather?"

"I was practicing some sword training, as well as sparring with Asuna-san", Setsuna told her teacher. "You never know when our next battle may be, after all. We always have to be on our toes."

Setsuna then looked at the dirt below Negi's feet, as well as his magic circle.

"Ah, I see you've made a circle. Are you practicing some kind of spell?"

"Yep", Negi responded. "It's a growth spell."

"G-growth spell??" asked a confused Setsuna. "I didn't know they had that kind of spell in your magic books."

"Apparently it's not used very often for some reason", Negi explained to Setsuna. "But I'm going to make this rock grow."

"Is it all right if I watch too, Negi-sensei?" asked a slightly flustered (and intrigued) Setsuna.

"Sure", smiled Negi. "Just be sure not to get too close to the circle."

With that, Setsuna proceeded to step back right behind Negi. The thought of the growth spell ran for her mind as she watched Negi prepare his spell. It made Setsuna wonder about her own height, considering herself fairly short for a 13 year-old girl. Konoka was a couple of inches than her, and Asuna looked like an adult in terms of height stature in comparison. Although Setsuna didn't look particularly young for her age, she did think of herself as fairly short.

"Negi-sensei...do you think I'm short for my age?" Setsuna asked her teacher in a sad tone of voice.

"Nonsense, Setsuna-san. You're fine just the way you are", Negi smiled in reply. "If anything, I'm short for my age."

"I'm worried one day my height might get in the way of protecting Ojo-sama.."

"Don't worry, Setsuna-san. Konoka-san's got you, Asuna-san, me, and many others in this school to protect her. Why are you asking this?"

"Because...I want you to help me protect Ojo-sama", Setsuna said in a decreasingly lower volume of voice, proceeding closer to her teacher until she was right beside him.

Negi pushed his head upward as he looked at the now depressed student of his. Usually Setsuna had either a determined or content look on her face as of late, but today she almost seem scared.

"Setsuna-san..do you want me to make you bigger?" Negi asked her.

"I-I do, sensei", Setsuna said in a much more assuring, louder voice. "I'll put my life on the line for Ojo-sama!"

With that, Setsuna put down her sword on the ground and proceeded to the circle, removing the rock from it. But before fully entering, she told her teacher while blushing beet red:

"Negi-sensei, please don't make me TOO tall. I don't want to hurt anyone."

"I promise you, Setsuna-san", Negi told her, in a comforting tone. "And if something goes wrong, I'll help you."

Negi then proceeded to take his staff and lift it with his arms, the staff facing vertically and away from the boy. The magic circle began to glow, and so did the tip of Negi's staff as he said the incantation: "Incresco Tantus!" And as soon as Negi said it, both the magic circle and the light from his staff disappeared.

"Setsuna-san, are you all right?" questioned Negi, hoping he didn't hurt the girl in any way.

"I'm fine, sensei", smiled Setsuna. "Though I guess it didn't work." Setsuna then proceeded to go pick up her sword and walk away from her teacher, waving him a friendly good-bye as she headed off to eat. She didn't look too phased by the spell's failure, but Negi was.

"I'm sorry, Setsuna-san", Negi frowned. "I guess I couldn't do it."

Setsuna then walked up to her teacher, smiling with her eye closed and embraced him in a hug.

"It's all right", smiled Setsuna. "You're still a great magic user, Negi-sensei. I just need to train some mo..."

Setsuna froze in mid-sentence, feeling something like a muscle cramp in her stomach. She fell to the ground on her knees as she panted heavily, screaming shortly afterward.

"AHH!! It hurts!!" exclaimed Setsuna as she pulled at the ground below her with her hands.

"Setsuna-san!!" exclaimed Negi. "What's happening?!"

As Negi said this, he noticed Setsuna's hair was getting longer, her petite arms were getting much longer, and her head was growing to a much bigger size. It seemed as if she was growing unevenly, with her head, hair, and arms at least 4 or 5 times their normal height, but the rest of her body the same size.

"This is really awkward", Setsuna nearly cried, struggling to keep balance as she stood up with her long arms, only to fall to the ground. Fortunately, the rest of her body was starting to grow. First up were her hands, then her legs, feet, and finally her stomach and backside. All in all it took about 4 minutes for Setsuna to finish growing to a height of about 24 feet (a little less than 5 times her current height). She could finally stand up now that her whole body was one size, but she found herself scooting on her butt on the ground until she managed to sit up, like she was in a chair that was hard to get out of.

"Negi-sensei", Setsuna frowned, worried about her new found size. "I'm...not intimidating, am I?"

"Well, you ARE a little intimidating at that size", Negi said nervously, causing Setsuna to droop her head down in sadness.

"B-b-b-but you're still the same Setuna-san you've always been: strong, brave, and beautiful!"

Setsuna felt a little better after Negi's recovery comment, sitting down beside her teacher. She was still a little nervous looking at her surroundings, though, and she now realized how it felt for the title heroine from Alice in Wonderland after she ate the "Eat Me" cookies.

"What should we do now, Setsuna-san?" asked Negi.

"Well..." thought Setsuna...
132.title: Setsuna's Big Surprise

1321.content:
"Negi-sensei, we should look for anything suspicious..." started Setsuna as she felt a little sweaty, wiping her head several times.

"What's wrong, Setsuna-san?" Negi asked her student, who looked dazed and tired all f a sudden.

"I feel...funny. Like when I grew just now...." she started, watching as her hands and arms grew longer and bigger, followed quickly by the rest of her body. The already tall samurai girl was now an even bigger 60 feet tall!

"That's weird...the spell shouldn't have multiplied the size of the target THAT much", a worried Negi told the giant-sized Setsuna, who sat stomach first to see her teacher.

"Negi-sensei, I think someone's out to get us..or in this case, me", a worried Setsuna whispered to her teacher, trying not to freak out. "We should hurry before it gets wors..."

Before Setsuna could continue, the already tall giantess was now an enormous 150 feet tall!

"Setsuna-san!!! Are you alright!?" Negi screamed to his student.

"Yes I am", she quietly whispered. "Though I think we should get out of here." Setsuna quickly picked up her teacher, put him in her skirt pocket, and started to run from Mahora Academy. As they ran Setsuna found herself getiing...
1321.title: Growing suspicions

13211.content:
As Setsuna ran with Negi in tow in her skirt pocket, the already very tall girl felt warm again. She quickly lept behind a very big tree and hoped that no one would spot them. Unfortunately this wouldn't last long, as Setsuna shot up yet again in growth. The spurts were small but consistent, with Setsuna growing about 2 feet each second during it. The growth did not cease for almost 2 minutes, with Setsuna now an icredible 400 feet tall! Her skirt pocket at this height would be enough for Negi to live in, much less hide in, and the extremely tall giantess slowly proceeded to creep ever further away from any people's sight.

Eventually the two reached a clearing, only to see a batch of huts in the middle of the forest even taller than Setsuna! They must have been over 1,000 feet tall! As Setsuna quickly hid behind one, she saw a girl who didn't look any more than 8 or 9 years old emerge from one of the huts. The girl was dressed in a plain pink t-shirt and white skirt, and quickly noticed the 400 foot-tall samurai hiding behind her house.

"Wow! Another giantess! But you're tiny", the 800 foot-tall girl told Setsuna, astonished by her incredible height. "But I'll fix that!" And with that, the girl ran back into her house and got out some hot soup.

"Drink this", the girl smiled to Setsuna. Setsuna wasn't hungry, but she didn't want to be rude, so she drank it. It tasted very good. But Setsuna wondered what the girl meant by "fixing" her height problem....

It didn't take long to figure out the meaning in it, though. Setsuna found herself balooning further in height, and this time she grew in spurts of 15 feet a second for almost a minute! In just 60 seconds Setsuna was not only taller than the huts she once was overshadowed by, but nearly everything else in town!!

"Wow!! You're really tall, onee-chan", the girl smiled in awe. "Not even my mommy grew to 1300 feet tall!"

"1300 FEET!?" a flustered Setsuna replied. "I'm almost a quarter of a mile high!?"

"Yep", the girl smiled. "And you're about to grow again. That was a super-strong soup."

"Why did you give me the soup?" the worried Setsuna wondered to the smiling girl.

"Well, you see....the growth that happened to you earlier was my doing. I've heard about your heroic escapades around Mahora Academy in the past and wanted you to come help our town."

"That's really nice of you, little one, but I'm afraid I have my own friends to protect", Setsuna bowed in apology, where she once again shot in growth, this time to 1700 feet.

"Unfortuantely for you, the only way to grow back to normal is to defeat the people who attacked our town", the girl told the very, very tall Setsuna, who once again shot up in height, this time to 1900 feet. "That's partially the reason we ourselves live here. We're too big to live in regular society."

"I see", Setsuna pondered. "Okay then, I'll help you. But ONLY if you promise to return me to my normal height" which she added as she shot up to 2100 feet tall.

"Alright then, onee-sama! By the way, my name's Ara."

"My name's Setsuna. Nice to meet you, Ara-san", Setsuna said, bowing to the girl.

"You too", she replied, also bowing her head. "And thank you so much!"

Before setting off, though, Setsuna reached into her pocket and pullled out Negi, who was dazed inside his student's skirt pocket.

"I hate to ask of you this, but can you watch my teacher, Negi-sensei?" Setsuna asked the girl, holding said teacher in the palm of her right hand. "I don't want him to get hurt."

"Got it", Ara responded, carerfully taking the teacher and placing him in her hands. "Good luck, Setsuna-sama!!"

And with that Setsuna headed pass the village to find out who was reponsible for disturbing the peace of the little town. As she walked she once again shot in growth, now up to 2500 feet tall! How long does it take her to get there?
13211.title: Mt. Setsuna

132112.content:
As she walked for close to an hour to her point of destination, Setsuna found the landscape around here getting smaller and smaller in size. Never before had the young 14 year-old heroine thought she would not only grow to be 5 feet and a half tall, but big enough to make most mountains look like toys! Setsuna's growth did not stop when she left the village, and the already tall giantess was now 5,000 feet tall. She could only pray that she did not hurt anyone during her walk, and she was very, very fortunate no one had seen her.

Setsuna finally arrived at the headquarters of the people who made the people in the not-so-nearby village monster-sized. Despite them knowing a spell that makes things much bigger, the town itself was small. Setsuna had to squint her eyes and bow down below her to see it.

"Hey you! Over here!" came a tiny voice from the tallest point of the village, about 10 feet from Setsuna's vision. There she saw a girl, about 5 foot, 10 inches tall. She had long, blonde hair, green eyes, and was wearing a pink-purple kimono, wearing wooden sandles with it. She was speaking for a very big microphone, causing the residents to cover their ears in the process. "Did you come here for an anti-growth spell?"

"Y-y-yes, yes I did", the gargantuan Setsuna told the girl, who didn't look the least bit scared of the tall girl. "Can I please have it?"

"Oh, I'll let you have it", the girl snickered, running up to Setsuna and pouring some rainbow-colored liquid on her right shoe.

What's she doing, thought Setsuna to herself. Just then, she felt the town growing in size. It seemed to be a shrinking spell after all.

"Why are you shrinking me?" Setsuna asked the girl, confused and a little worried as she shrank down from 5000 feet to 4600.

"Because we known you're with THEM, those backwards people from the hut village a hundred miles or so from here", the girl explained. "And we're going to cut you down to size, and the rest of your town, once and for all."

"But I don't understand", Setsuna asked, confused and a little worried as she now shrank down to 4300 feet tall. "Weren't you the ones who made those villagers grow in the first place?"

"Is THAT what they told you? Then they told you lies", the girl sighed. "That tribe has a habit of taking normal-sized people and making them grow big for their own amusement, claiming them to be 'heroes' they need help from. They're typically cute, young females lured out for the older, perverted men to gawk at."

"So how DID they grow in the first place?" wondered a now 3900-foot tall Setsuna.

"Long ago, there was a man and his wife in a valley not too far from here. They were a simple couple, living in luxury together in the wilderness. But the animals they encountered were very big...I'm talking 50-foot rats here! Eventually the man found the source of the growth and tried it on his wife. He was amazed at the results, as well as tantalized. He himself grew shortly after. But they got lonely by themselves, so they started getting other people to join them and they made a village. The couple themselves later had a baby, who started off human sized but grew to be over 700 feet tall the day she turned fifteen! Although the source of the growing liquid is long gone, relatives of that couple still have the power to make others grow.."

"So the girl who made me grow was..." questioned Setsuna, now down to 2900 fetet tall.

"That's right, giant girl! She was a descendant of those people. Every now and again they tried, by force of their huge size, to take our shrinking fountain away from us. And every time they've failed, because we blast them with a liquid that causes them to shrink to the size of bugs. Eventually they started recruiting others to grow and use them as bait, one day attempting to get the shrink formula, but to no avail."

"Why won't you give it to them?" asked Setsuna, now down to 2700 feet.

"Because they never politely asked", the girl huffed. Setsuna just gasped in awe.

"B-b-but I WAS going to politely ask", the flustered girl told her, now down to 2500 feet.

"Oh don't worry, the shrinking I hit you with stops at a certain point. It can only shrink someone to 1/200 the height they were hit with. Which means if I was 5,000 feet before..."

"You'll be about 25 feet when this is done. But to show you my regards, I'll give you the shrinking potion for the entire village IF you can beat me in a match."

"But I'm so much taller than you. It wouldn't be fair", pointed out Setsuna, now 2200 feet tall.

"Oh, don't worry about that detail", the girl snickered. "Our village is used to dealing with giants. We've slain people over 100 feet tall and came out on top. The village around here is protected by giant mountains, so any attackers MUST come in here if they want to fight us. And then we shrink them down to normal humans, then again to bugs, then dispose of them."

"That's cruel!" an angered Setsuna cried, now 1900 feet tall. "Have you no respect for people?"

"Respect? They're greedy cowards who used size to intimidate us. I care not for 'respect' or 'fairness'. Our village has been destroyed at least 7 or 8 times by giant attacks since I was born 15 years ago. My own grandfather was squashed to death by a giant woman's breasts. Shrinking them is the least we can do."

"If you feel that way, then I will stop your shrinking ways!" an angered Setsuna cried out to the whole town, now 1500 feet tall.

"Oooh, big girl on campus. What's your name?"

"My name is Setsuna", she replied straight-forward, now 1300 feet tall.

"My name is Amin", the blonde-haired girl. "And we shall fight as soon as you finish shrinking to 25 feet. Understood?"

"Yes", Setsuna sadly replied, now 1000 feet tall and worried about what will happen if she fails.

(no chapter choice, proceed to the next part)
132112.title: The big village and the small one

13212.content:
As the two ran, Setsuna felt sweaty once again. This time, though, instead of growing, Sesuna found herself shrinking, and at an enormous rate. Within seconds Setsuna shrank in height in spurts of 20 feet every few seconds, until she was down to 10 feet. Setsuna quickly put her teacher safely onthe ground around the 90 feet shrinking point, feeling relieved she was getting smaller.

However, the spell was not over when Setsuna shrank down to a mini-giantess size of 10 feet. The girl continued to shrink ever still, down even below her regular height. Negi watched as his student, who minutes ago was a 150-foot tall giantess, was now barely 10 inches tall. Negi picked up the tiny Setsuna and ran back to his dorm in Mahora Academy.

Within minutes Negi, short of breath, ran like a shot into the dorm room and closed it. Although Asuna was not there (she was busy with her paper route), Konoka was, and she noticed Negi from her bed, only now starting to get up.

"Good morning, Negi-kun", she smiled to her teacher as she yawned and sat up on her bed, stretching her arm. "What's up?"

"It's Setsuna-san...she shrank", a worried Negi told Konoka, who was baffled by her teacher's words.

"Negi-kun, I know you can't make people shrink", she giggled. "Are you sure you're not confusing her for the little Setsun she creates.

"Does THIS look like a doll to you?" he asked his student, holdin up a very tiny Setsuna in his arms, who was petrified at the height of Konoka.

"O-o-o-o-o-o-ojou-s-s-sama..." Setsuna tried to tell her friend, only to be taken by force from Negi into her arms.

"You're so adorable, Set-chan", Konoka smiled and grinned. "Really, really, really cute!"

"Ojo-sama, you're making me dizzy", a nauseous Setsuna told her.

"Sorry", a saddened Konoka told her 10-inch friend as she placed Setsuna on her bed. "So what happened?"

"Well, Negi-sensei made me grow, then I grew REALLY big, then I shrank down to this size. I don't know what's going on, but there's something afoot. I think someone on this campus is shrinking people."

"Don't be silly, Set-chan", Konoka assured her friend. "This will probably ware really soo..."

At that moment Konoka, too, felt warm, causing Negi and Setsuna to shout "Uh-oh!!" in unison. Within seconds Konoka was a little more than 10 inches tall.

"I guess you're right", Konoka smiled to her friend. "But what do we do?"

"We have to inform the school!" Negi said outloud. "Before every girl in Mahora Academy shrinks!" Negi decided to first tell about this...
13212.title: Chibi Setsuna

132122.content:
As Negi ran with the shrunken Konoka and Setsuna in tow, he decided to quickly cast a spell around Mahora to knock out the other girls before they noticed their shrinking as well. It was just as well, since Negi saw one by one girls shrinking as he ran to his friend Takamichi. They eventually found him sitting on a bench eating something. When Negi ran up to him, he was practically collapsing on the floor.

"Are you okay, Negi?" the teacher asked as he ate some ramen.

"....gasp...I'm fine, Takamichi. But I...need to ask you something..." the tired child explained. He then whispered into his ear what happened.

"Um...I'd run, if I were you."

"Huh?"

"This seems like a bigger challenge than you or I could do. I'd hurry before you get spotted."

"Takamichi! You have to be kidding me!"

As he talked to his senior, Negi soon shrunk to about 8 inches tall or so himself, falling butt first to the ground.

"Negi-sensei!" Setsuna exclaimed as she ran up to him. "Are you alright?"

"I'm fine, girls..." he replied, trying to mask the pain with a smile. "Ouch.."

"This is bad", Takamichi grumbled. "I could be next.."

"Takamichi, you see what I mean now?!" Negi, flying up to the man's face with Konoka and Setsuna on his staff with him, re-enforced. "We need to fix this before everyone, or possibly everything, shrinks!"

Takamichi's bench shrunk under him as he looked at Negi, falling to the ground.

"I got it now", he replied. "I think I can find someone who can help us."
132122.title: Favor for an old friend

1322.content:
"I think we should see Asuna and Ojo-sama", Setsuna recommended.

"Alright, we should see them", Negi replied.

Even though he knew that Asuna would be mad at him for casting the spell, Negi was glad he could actually do it. As they were going to search for them, both Setsuna and Negi heard someone shouting their teacher's name. It was none other then Asuna and Konoka themselves, and from it looked like Asuna was mad and Konoka had a look of worry and excitement at once.

"Neeeegggiii!" Asuna shouted.

They got to the point where Negi were floating. Konoka looked around to see if Setsuna was around. Asuna was yelling at him about how he stole something from their room, then she heard Konoka saying "Wow!" Asuna then looked at her roommate, and when she saw her looking up, she looked up as well to find the giantess Setsuna.

"Whoa! Setsuna-san! What happened?" Asuna asked.

"Well...I asked sensei to use a growth spell on me", Setsuna said with a red face.

"Negi! You better have a good explanation for this!" Asuna shouted.

He came down to explain to her but she put knuckles around his head and started to twirl it. It gave him a good deal of pain until Setsuna stopped her from doing by telling her to stop.

"STOP!!" Setsuna shouted. "I asked for it, so don't blame him!"

Asuna stopped as she started to calm down. She wanted to know why Setsuna, a good middle schooler and a great swordsmen, wanted to become a giantess. She pointed and asked her this.

"Okay then. Tell me why?"

"I asked Negi-sensei because I was..a little shorter then Ojo-sama, and I wanted to become bigger to protect her."

Konoka was surprised to hear that. Even though she knew that she wanted to protect her, she had asked Negi to grow to boost her protection towards herself. Konoka came next to Setsuna's knee and patted it.

"You know, Secchan...I thank you for such grateful thoughts", Konoka said.

"Ojo-sama..."

"But I liked the height you were before you became big."

Setsuna's heart felt a slight pain, and little tears came out. Negi and Asuna dodged the tears as she wiped the tears off with her handkerchief. But before she could even say something, she felt pain from her stomach and now became 70 foot tall. Asuna's mouth opened with disbelief and looked at negi.

"Negi! don't you know how to revert this spell?!"

"Actually...I don't really know"

Asuna grabbed Negi's collar and started to shake him, but Konoka broke the two up. Asuna was pissed because not only was Setsuna getting bigger, but Negi didn't know a revert spell.

"W-well, we can find a way to get Setsuna-san back to her original height."

"Actually.." Konoka mumbled. Everyone then looked instantly at her.

"I heard from Bookstore-san say that there's a book that has spells for shrinking and growing."

"Really?" Asuna asked.

"Does that exist?" Setsuna added.

"If there's a magic spell that caused this, there should be one", Konoka said.

Even though Negi wanted to believe her, he asked had Evangeline or Takamichi to rely on for help as well. Negi decided to ask...
1322.title: Seeking additional assisstance

133.content: It wasn't Nodoka or Setsuna, either. Perhaps it was...
133.title: Evangeline, Chachamaru, or someone else?

choices: "...we'll just have to increase your level of training, that's all."
"...I shall instead 'reward' you for your growing me to this size."
1331.content:
As it turns out, it wasn't any of his students at all! Well technically she was a student of his, but in school terms alone. The blonde-haired teacher of all things magical of Negi's, Evangeline McDowell stumbled on Negi's growth spell seconds before he was ready to cast it. The boy crept back a little when he finally noticed her coming up from behind him.

"What stupid thing are you doing now?" she asked him, an annoyed grimace on her face. "I hope you're not forgetting your training with me today."

"Of course I didn't, Master!", Negi quickly replied, hiding the circle in the dirt with his feet. Evangeline, however, just walked around him, wondering why he was playing in the dirt.

"What's with the circle, boy?"

"Um...."

"You're up to something. Spill it!"

And so Negi explained to his master everything he had learned recently about the growth spell he found out. The explanation proved pointless, though, as Evangeline herself had tried the spell decades ago, only to find it didn't work.

"It doesn't work", she told him point blank. "If I couldn't use it successfully, what makes you think you can? Even your father couldn't use it correctly!"

"Well I won't know until I try now, will I?" Negi asked her with a smile on his face. He then began the spell like he had planned to do so earlier, holding up his staff as he preformed the incantation of "Incresco Tantus!" All through it all Evangeline simply looked bored, yawning at the sight before her. She would've left right then and there if she didn't see a giant rock appear out of nowhere in front of Negi.

"What the...!?" the girl gasped at the sight of the 10 foot tall rock. "So it does work!" She then pointed at Negi, explaining to him, "You're going to try that spell on me next!"

"But Master! I don't know of a reversal spell...."

"Reversal spell!? Why would I not want to be bigger?!" she laughed at the child teacher, poking him on the head with her fingers. "Now just repeat what you did earlier, got it?"

"O-o-okay, Master...Just stand in the spot the rock was at earlier..."

Evangeline complied and waited for the boy to perform the spell once again. It worked perfectly, and the once short vampire could feel her body growing, laughing manically as her body pulsated bit by bit with growth. It didn't last very long, though, as the growth seemed to stop at 20 feet.

"Well that sucks", Evangeline sighed, hoping to grow bigger from the spell. "Still, this is definitely an improvement!" She then picked up the frightened Negi below her and stared at him with lowered eyebrows, smiling a disturbing smile at him.

"If you thought my training was tough before..." she teased the boy, slowly putting on the ground as she turned around in a full circle to show off her new size to Negi.

"Master, you can't possibly me to battle you at my current size! I have a hard time training with at your normal size!"

"That's true", the mini-giantess Evangeline admitted. "So....."
1331.title: Negi's Giant Master

choices: Asuna doesn’t listen to Negi and attacks Evangeline
13311.content:
The next few days of training were hell for poor Negi. Evangeline was throwing back no punches, and was once hard when he was taller than her was significantly more difficult when she was 4 times his size. He had to admit, though, that he was feeling more pumped up from his training than he ever had before. Even Evangeline had to admit that his progress was faster than it used to be, and after a few hours of training she decided to settle down in her beach resort in her pod.

“Bozu, get me something to drink!” the giantess vampire demanded from her pupil, who ran like a shot to do so. He quickly returned with some lemonade, but the glass was much too small for her..

“Make it bigger!” she told Negi, who whimpered at the command he was given. A shot of Evangeline’s face snapped him out of it, though, and quickly he cast another growth spell to make the glass several times its original size. Evangeline then picked it up and drank from it, placing it on the ground next to her pupil afterwards.

“M-M-Master, I’m very tired. Can I take a rest now?” Negi requested of his magic teacher, sweat running down his face, and bruises over many parts of his body.

“Sure, but get treated by Chachamaru first. I don’t want to hear you whining a few hours from now how you’re still sore”, she replied, turning away from the boy as she proceeded to take a snooze herself. Negi bowed his head in reply and ran off to get healed.

Negi and Chachamaru talked for a fairly long time as he explained about what happened that day that turned the once-short Evangeline into a towering giantess, which even the robot girl herself had a hard time believing.

“Do you regret it?” she politely asked her teacher as she wrapped up his foot in bandages. “Your training will only get much tougher from here, and what if she grows any bigger?”

“Yes, I’m afraid of that quite a bit. Master is quite strong as is..and today’s training was the hardest I’ve had with her in months.”

“But the results are definitely showing, Negi-sensei. I haven’t see you put up a fight like that in a long time.”

“Thanks, Chachamaru-san. But I wonder if it’s worth it if I need this much help after each fight…”

“Negi-kun!”

Negi and Chachamaru were confused by what they just heard. Was someone watching them? A closer look revealed that it was Konoka, running ahead of her best friend Asuna. The two seemed to be holding some sort of food in their hands as well.

“Konoka-san? Asuna-san? What are you two doing here?” wondered Negi as Konoka ran him to the boy and handed him a sandwich in his hands.

“We figured you’d be here training with Eva-chan when we didn’t find you when we woke up”, explained Asuna. “Anything new?”

Negi turned ghost white when Asuna asked him this. Chachamaru began to respond, but Negi whispered to her to keep it a secret through her left ear.

“Negiiiiiii”, an annoyed Asuna groaned. “Something happened and you won’t tell us, will you?”

“Um….I might’ve made Master….b-b-bigger…”

“WHAT?!” screamed both Asuna and Konoka as they ran off to find Evangeline. They did eventually find her asleep on a chair, coming back with shocked looks on both of their faces.

“Negi-bozu, explain yourself! Now!!” Asuna demanded, grabbing Negi by his shirt collar. He did as he was told, explaining to both her and Konoka about the growth spell he casted earlier, forced by Evangeline to try it on her as well.

“So it actually DID work?” Asuna asked, looking confused. “I thought you were reading a children’s book or something last night.”

“Well it did work, and it was real!” defended Negi. “Annnnnnd I have no clue how to reverse it.”

“And that could be a problem”, added Asuna, looking stressed. “Knowing Eva-chan, she could attack the campus Godzilla style if she got any bigger.”

As the three students and their teacher talked about Evangeline’s recent growth, the giantess herself woke up and looked down at her fellow, um, “acquaintances”.

“Ain’t this ironic?!” Evangeline cackled to herself as she picked up both Asuna and Konoka, one in each hand. “After all these months of mocking my height, and here I am much taller than you girls will ever amount to be.” She then squeezed Asuna even harder in her hand, watching her moan a little as she did so.

“Master, let Asuna-san and Konoka-san down now!” Negi requested of the giantess vampire. “You’re hurting them!”

“She’s not hurting me, Negi-kun”, Konoka told her teacher.

“But she is hurting me”, Asuna snapped, biting the vampire’s arm with her teeth. Evangeline let go of her grasp on her, watching her fall back to the ground unharmed. She then made a raspberry at the vampire, watching her get enraged as she threw Konoka back at her (with Negi slowly stopping her fall with his magic).

“That’s it! I’m going to make you pay for hurting Konoka!” yelled Asuna, unleashing her sword via her Pactio card. “Let’s dance, brat! 5 feet tall or 20, it doesn’t matter to me!”

“Asuna-san, calm down!” Negi pleaded with his student. But he doubted it would work right now to ask her to stop…
13311.title: Evangeline has the height advantage

133112.content:
Negi's words came through, with Evangeline having second thought and just flicked Asuna to the side, smiling.

"Well, I don't want any damage within this resort, so I shall take my pupil's word", the humble vampire said.

"Why you little!!" Asuna grumbled, holding back as much she could.

"I don't want to be hurt.." a sad Negi said to Asuna. She looked at his puppy eyes, and Konoka nodded. Asuna sighed and put her Pactio away. As she did, Evangeline felt some chest pain, falling on her knees, her right hand clenched to her chest.

"Master! What's wrong!?" Negi asked, running to her feet.

"I feel some..chest pain", Evangeline replied.

Just then, she...
133112.title: Second thoughts, and another change?

choices: Negi and Chacharmaru go talk to Evangeline
They change their mind and go seek help on their own
1332.content:
As Negi proceeded to cast the spell, he noticed one of his students walking in the distance. It was Chachamaru, who was taking a casual walk around Mahora Academy early in the morning. Evangeline’s robotic assistant was seldom seen away from her master, which Negi found much easier to talk to the android girl when his master wasn’t around.

“Hello, Chachamaru-san”, he said to the girl as she stopped and looked at him waving to her. “What are you doing out?”

“Oh, hello Negi-sensei”, she replied as she walked up to her teacher. “I was just enjoying a nice walk outside before going to the store. Master wanted me to buy her something to eat. What are you doing yourself on this nice Sunday?”

“Oh, I’m going to try to make this pebble bigger”, he explained. “I’m going to do so by using a growth spell I recently discovered.”

“M-may I see you do it?” Chachamaru questioned her teacher, looking a little excited by what he was about to do. He nodded in reply, and soon enough she stepped back a few steps as her teacher prepared the spell. He lifted his staff in front of him, and a bright light was beginning to shine from his staff as he shouted the incantation:

“Incresco Tantus!!”

And with that came a bright blue light. However, it wasn’t aiming for the pebble directly underneath Negi’s feet: somehow the projectile went backwards and hit Chachamaru instead! Slowly she felt her body tingling and growing before her, feeling her very body stretching quickly in various directions. First her legs grew, then her arms, hands, feet, stomach, and finally her hair and head. At the end the android student of his had grown to become a towering 90 feet tall giantess!

“Sensei, what just happened!?” a worried, embarrassed Chachamaru asked her teacher, standing on her knees and covering her face in her hands in shock.

“Somehow you got hit by the spell”, Negi told her, looking equally as worried. “Let’s go see if Evangeline-san can fix this!”

“No! I don’t want her to find out! I don’t want to worry her!” Chachamaru responded hastily. “And remember, sensei. If I recall, if anyone finds out about your magic abilities, you will be stripped of your powers and be turned into an ermine.

“I know you’re scared, but sometimes you have no choice but to ask for help”, Negi tried to comfort Chachamaru, padding her right foot, only to be lifted up by the robot giantess and kissed by her on his left face cheek!

“You’re right, sensei. Let’s go ask for help!”
1332.title: Chachamaru's Big Upgrade

choices: Hang out, while Chachamru grew more
13321.content:
Even though Chachamaru didn't want to, she agreed with Negi to seek Evangeline A.K. McdDwell, her master as well as Negi's teacher. Chachamaru was thinking of flying high so the people would not see her, opening the cockpit on her back to start her jet. When Negi saw this, he panicked.

"Wait!" he shouted.

"What is it, Negi-sensei?" Chachamaru said, stopping the process.

"If you fly, you might be seen!" Negi replied.

"Don't worry, sensei. I'll hide above the clouds". Chachamaru informed her teacher as she smiled.

Chachamaru jumped and flew high, carrying Negi with her. She started to go toward the cottage where Evangeline stayed. As she was flying, she felt a tingling sensation, and grew more. This time, she was now 150 feet tall, and she was a little embarrassed but continued to fly. She reached the destination and landed on the ground, letting Negi down. He flew up to the second floor and saw Evangeline sleeping. Negi knocked on the window, and his student heard it as she woke up slowely.

"What do you want, bozu? Today's Sunday", she mumbled.

"Um, I need your help Master", Negi replied. Evangeline reluctantly got up from her bed and walked toward where Negi stood.

"What are you talking abou-" Eva asked as she looked behind Negi. "What the-"

She got out and looked up to see a giantess Chachamaru, dumbfoudned by this. She gawked much like Negi did, slowly turning her head towards him.

"What the heck did you do to her?!" Eva asked.

Negi explained everything to her, including the growing spell. Eva listened to him, and despite being amazed by this, Negi told her that he needed her help, and she thought for few minutes.

"Well, there is one reverting spell I know...but I have to dig deep to remember that spell."

"Thank you, Master!" both Negi and Chachamaru reply..

When they finished their sentence, Chachamaru now shot up to 300 feet tall. Evangeline was starting to feel a little worried about her robot disciple, so she turned around as she started to walk away.

"I'll try to remember it, so until further notice, do whatever you want. There''s no training today.", Evangeline told Negi and Chachamaru. She went back in to figure out the way to cast the revert spell. Negi was now thinking of what should he and Chachamaru could do while Eva was collecting the information.
13321.title: Help from master

133211.content:
Negi suggested Chachamaru to go somewhere while Evangeline were looking for the revert spell. Chachamaru agreed with Negi and picked him up, then flew high. While they were flying, she grew some more, this time to a 500 foot robot, and they were worried about it.

"I hope Master can find the cure soon", Negi hoped.

"Don't worry, Master knows if there's trouble", Chachamaru replied.

As they were getting toward the Mahora Academy, Negi realized that Chachamaru couldn't show herself to the others, so he asked her to stop. She wondered why Negi would stop her, then looked down to where he as.

"Why stop?"

"I don't think we should approach the academy with our current...state."

Chachamaru looked at herself, and realized that she was now a 700 foot tall robot giantess now, and she looked back at Negi.

"I agree. Then what should I disguise myself as?" Chachamaru asked.

Negi thought for few minutes, then disguise her as...
133211.title: Giantess robot, oh my

1333.content: No, not Evangeline or Chachamaru, either. Then it must be
1333.title: Yue? Haruna? Or someone else?

13331.content:
Yue was excited beyond belief; today was the big library expedition day! She had all her gear, provisions, and and strange tasting juice boxes packed into an extremely small back pack. As she walked outside she saw her teacher, Negi, standing with his staff in his hands. "Incresco Tantus!" she heard him yell. A flash of blue light launched off his staff and struck her full force in the face. The impact caused her to fall to the ground immediately. She saw (or rather, felt) Negi running towards her.

"Yue-san! Are you alright?!" he squeaked.

"Ahh! Y-yes, Negi-sensei, I-I'm fine", she said as she stood up, clutching her face. She felt herself sway as if she was a reed in a river. She fell back down flat on her butt and rubbed her head.

"That was weird. I feel off-balance for some reason."

"Umm...Yue-san, could you open your eyes please?" Negi whispered. As she removed her hand she saw something that made her rub her eyes in shock; her teacher was floating on his staff above her gigantic right knee.

"The growth spell seems to have worked, though this isn't exactly how I planned. It was supposed to hit a rock and-".

Negi was soon silenced by a finger roughly the size of his whole body.

"It's not a good idea for us to talk about that kind of stuff here. Even if it is really early in the morning, we should find a more secluded spot to talk about what happened", Yue whispered as softly as she could to Negi. He simply nodded and hopped onto her ready palm. She stayed low and under the trees as much as her much bigger body would allow. As soon as they found a place to talk she sat with her back against a tree and looked straight at her teacher.

"Alright, sensei. What happened?" asked the 60 meter tall giantess Yue. "Why am I so big??"

"Well, like I said, it was a growth spell. I don't know why it missed the rock and hit you, but it did for some reason."

"A growth spell, huh? Wait a second..you do know how to fix this, right?" Yue asked, looking worried.

"Well. The truth is...n-no. I'm sorry, but I only know how to make things grow, not shrink them. It may take a while before I can probably fix it."

"Oh no! I'm going to miss the library expedition today! This is the WORST!" she pouted. It was the first time Negi had seen her be so emotional about something without crying. This sight was not to last, however; shortly after a torrent of tears flowed over the boy's body, drenching him from head to toe.

"Please don't cry, Yue-san. It's my fault! And as your teacher, I'm making it my responsibility to fix it."

Negi looked quite confident in himself as he proceeded to take out his staff once again and make a noticeably bigger circle in the dirty around his giantess student.

"I'm going to try my best at this and try to see if this spell will reverse itself. Here goes!"

"Negi-sensei.." Yue said between sniffles. "B-Be careful.."

Did Yue get smaller, or were her problems just about to get even bigger?
13331.title: Yue the Magical Girl..no, Magical Giantess

133311.content:
"Incretus tantus!" Negi shouted.

The light appeared and hit yue. The light succumbed her, as Negi hoped that the spell could actually work, but his hopes were shattered instantly. When light faded away, Yue started to grow bigger! She grew until she hit 100 meters,

"Negi sen...sei..."m Yue said with some tears.

"I'm sorry! I didn't cause that on purpose!" a frantic Negi replied.

Yue was sad, then suddenly was spotted by someone. He hoped to see someone that could help him from getting Yue back to her original height.

The person he saw was...
133311.title: The 100 meter magic girl

1333112.content:
it was takamichi himself! both negi and yue thought he would solve this crisis. Takamichi, who were strolling then noticed the big yue then negi came to him.

"Takamichi! Please help us!" Negi pleaded.

"Hold on negi, whats going on? Whys yue big?" Takamichi asked.

Negi explained to takamichi about everything and once he finished explaining, takamichi understood what he was talking about.

"Alright, I get it. I have heard there is a book in a library that would negate your spell." takamichi said.

"Really?" Negi asked.

"Yes, But thats just a rumor, so I cannot garuntee the book." Takamichi said.

"Alright....Thank you takamichi!" negi thanked him

Just then, yue...
1333112.title: Takamachi

choices: "No!", Yue responded angrily, and the two head off.
"I guess so...", Yue told her teacher.
133312.content:
Negi watched as Yue proceeded to glow once again and shrinking before hiss very eyes. At first the now 45 meter tall girl was happy that she was shrinking down in size, but that happiness turned to anger once again when she stopped shrinking a few minutes later at a meager 20 centimeters tall. Now barely half a foot tall, the annoyed girl walked up to her teacher's left foot and proceeded to sit next to it on the ground.

"As if I wasn't small enough for my age already", Yue sighed to herself as she watched Negi sit on the ground below her, looking depressed as well. "Any other day I would've been thrilled to be a giantess, but today.."

"Wait? So you're saying that if it wasn't for the library expedition, you wouldn't be upset about this, Yue-san?"

"Well, maybe, but not AS upset. Though at least at this height I can fit into the building, I suppose."

"But Yue-san, you'll get hurt hanging around people seven to eight times your size!"

"Heh! Who said anything about me walking!? Negi-sensei, you're going to take me to the library expedition in your pocket!" demanded Yue, pointing her right index finger at the boy's face. "It's your fault you got me like this. The least you can do is let me go to the library expedition with you as my guide."

"But I have to tests to grade and training and..", Negi told Yue as he rattled off a list of things he, as both a teacher and mage, had responsibilities of. But she didn't seem to care much about it, though...she was too excited about the expedition to care about what her teacher wanted to do, and Negi knew it.

"Fine", he sighed as he lowered his hands out to Yue on the ground, watching his tiny student crawl up into them. She was then placed inside Negi's left pants pocket. "But are you sure you don't want me to try to make at least a little bigger, Yue?"
133312.title: An improvement...sort of

choices: They ignore it for the time being and all walk in together
1333121.content:
"No!" Yue snapped at her teacher. "This is bad enough as it is, so just leave it until the day is over!" Negi hung his head as his student scolded him. Seeing that she had hurt him, Yue calmed down a bit. "Besides, only Nodoka, Haruna, and I are going on the expidition today, so it doesn't really matter what size I am I suppose. But I'd like to just leave this whole mess until later." Negi nodded as he began to walk to Library Island, with the tiny girl poking her head out of his pocket. He reached the massive building and looked around for Yue's dormmates.

"Negi-sensei!!!" Haruna yelled from afar as she and Nodoka jogged to him. "Have you seen Yue around? We can't seem to find her."

"Yeah, I know where she is", he said as he reached into his pocket for the girl. He fished her out and the larger girls gasped at their friend's new found size. But what do they do about it?
1333121.title: NOOOO!!!!

choices: Haruna agrees to keep it a secret
Haruna still wants Yue and Nodoka to know
13332.content:
As Negi was about to perform the spell, he saw Haruna, one of Nodoka's friends. The bi-speckled student was holding a sketchbook in her left hand and a pen in her left pocket. She was on her way to sit outside Mahora Academy to draw when she noticed Negi and his staff, a sight which quickly caught her eye. As she walked ever closer to her teacher, she became increasingly inquisitive of what he was doing.

"Performing a magical spell, eh, Negi-kun?" smiled a curious Haruna.

"Y-y-yeah", he shyly replied, holding his staff behind his back. Haruna then looked right below her teacher and saw a dirt circle with a pebble almost in the dead center of it.

"Let me guess. A growth spell?" Haruna asked her teacher, again smiling. Negi nodded his head up and down in reply.

"Why waste that on this rock?" Haruna asked, kicking the rock with her foot. "Why don't you try it on me?"

"I-I-I c-c-couldn't do that!" a nervous Negi told Haruna. "I don't even know a way to reverse it!"

"Don't worry, Negi-kun. I'm not worried", Haruna smiled, putting down her sketchbook on the ground and proceeding to step in the circle in the dirt. "I always wanted to be big."

"Really?" the inquisitive Negi asked his student. "I never heard that from Nodoka-san or Yue-san."

"Well, it's kind of a guilty pleasure secret of mine. When I was little, I LOVED Ultraman. My father and I used to watch it all the time right until I enrolled in this school a year or so back."

She watched it that long? Negi thought to himself, looking a little confused. While he had never watched Ultraman back in England, he had heard of it and read articles on it since he started teaching in Japan.

"So you always wanted to be a super heroine of sorts, Haruna-san?"

"Nah. I just wanted to be big, Negi-kun. Well, what are you waiting for!?"

Negi proceeded to turn his head in all directions before he answered that question, making sure no one was around to see him or Haruna. The coast seemed to be clear, so the nervous teacher started to begin the spell.

Negi proceeded to lift his staff with both of his hands, holding it in front of him while also pointing at Haruna. The circle in the dirt then began to glow, and Haruna felt the glow while standing on top of it. Then Negi began to chant the incantation:

"Incresco Tantus!!"

Within a manner of seconds the spell began to take effect, and Haruna looked really excited during it all. Everything on the girl's body, from the tips of her hair to ever her glasses, began to grow in bits until Haruna grew to a height of 25 feet. After her growth finished the light, as well as the circle in the dirt, both disappeared.

"Wow", Haruna exclaimed, looking around her much smaller surroundings. Viewpoints she normally would only be able to see from the third or fourth floor of the school building were visible to her in front of her very eyes, and she couldn't but think of how cool it all was. Then Haruna proceeded to look down at her teacher, who barely looked 10 or so inches tall at her newfound height. Haruna giggled at the sight of the smaller Negi, proceeding to sit down on her knees to see him better.

"It really worked", Haruna told her teacher, her eyes gleaming. "And it's even cooler than I thought."

"Maybe to you, but this is making me nervous", Negi panicked, his face deep red from Haruna zooming her face up to the boy. She purposely then stuck her face closer to him until the teacher was right next to her lips, but all she did then was smile with her teeth showing when that happened.

"How about we let Nodoka and Yue join in the fun?" Haruna asked her "small" teacher.

"I don't know", Negi replied. "Maybe it would be better if only you and me knew about this? You know, a secret."

"Hmm..Negi-kun, you may be right", pondered Haruna.

"So you won't get Nodoka-san and Yue-san involved?" asked a desperate Negi to his giantess student.
13332.title: An artist tall in stature

choices: Chisame, aka Chiu the internet idol
13333.content: Nope, not Nodoka's friends as well. Then maybe...?
13333.title: Chisame?

133331.content:
As young Chisame Hisegawa surfed the Internet one Sunday morning, she couldn't help but think of her teacher. "That kid sure is a handful", sighed Chisame Hisegawa to herself, typing away on her own message board. The "kid" in reference is actually her teacher, Negi Springfield, a 10-year old boy from England who's only entagled the teenage girl's life since he made his teaching debut. All Chisame wanted was a normal junior high school life, but with the likes of vampires, robots, time-travelers, ninjas, martial artists, and a whole assortment of magic users amongst her presence, her junior high life was anything but normal. And now that she found her teacher can use magic, it's only complicated things further for the bispeckled youth.

"Well today's different", she smiled smugly to herself. "Today's Sunday, and I'm going to spend in inside, away from Harry Potter and his magical misfit harem." But just as she went into the fridge to make herself some breakfast, Chisame realized she forgot to buy food recently! Too hungry to wait until lunch, she decided to make a quick trip back and forth to a local grocery store, hoping not to be seen. To make sure of this she decided to wear a hat to cover up her hair, as well as wear dark glasses over her regular ones to cover her eyes. She REALLY didn't want to be seen on her only day off of the week...especially by her teacher.

This was not to last, though. Despite her best intentions, Chisame was quickly spotted by Negi, who as standing not too far fro mthe school gates. "Good morning, Chiu-san!", he smiled to his student, referring to her by her online alias, in which she was one of the most adored idols on the Internet. Chisame still tried to ignore him, but found herslf unable to ignore him. He had made a circle in the dirt right next to him, which kind of intriqued Chisame. Reluctantly she walked up to her teacher, took off her disguise, and stared at the dirt.

"What's with the dirt circle?" Chisame bluntly asked Negi, unimpressed.

"Oh, I'm trying to cast a rare spell", Negi replied happily. "A growth spell."

"No way!", Chisame said surprised. "No way can a twerp like you know a spell like that!"

"Well...I was about to test it on this pebble here", the saddened teacher tried to tell his student. "You don't have to stay if you don't want to..."

He was right: Chisame DIDN'T want to stay. She simply wanted food in her belly. Still, what harm could it do to watch him?

"Actually...I have free time right now, sensei. Fire away!"

"Alright then", Negi said, smiling once again. He grabbed the staff, lifted it in the air, and began to chant the incantation.

"Incresco Tantus!"

Soon after, a light blue flash of light came from the sraff. However, instead of hitting the intended pebble in the center of the dirt circle, the light changed its course. It aimed straight at Chisame! It wasn't too long until she felt a pulsing sensation all across her body. Chisame quickly saw herself towering over her child teacher even more than before. In just a few moments Chisame had grown to 25 feet tall! Instead of scared of her new surroundings, though, she was angry. She grabbed Negi with her left hand, lifting him high above the ground to her own eye level.

"What on Earth have you done to me!?" asked a very annoyed Chisame. "You better fix this right now!!"

"I'm sorry, but.....I don't know a shrink spell."

"WHAT!?!?"

"But it's okay! I found this spell in the underground library of the school! Surely there's a book there that can reverse it?"

"There better be", said a still annoyed Chisame, finally putting her teacher back on the ground. "And I'm coming with you to find it!" Maybe my increased height might be of aid to this shrimp, she thought to herself.

But do Negi and Chisame leave right away, or not?
133331.title: Chisame's new size

1333311.content:
Chisame was as willing as Negi was to relieve her of her new, taller height, but the girl was pretty hungry. Especially since now she was 5 times her original height, her appetite, to follow suit, was also several times bigger. The girl quickly took Negi and ran from the school grounds.
