"Darn it! We'll be back to where we started!" Asuna sighed.

"Maybe, but if Negi-kun can grow back to normal size, maybe he can then do the same for us??" Konoka attempted to comfort Asuna by saying.

"Whatever you think works", Evangeline sighed as she walked away. "Just don't get ME involved. I don't want to be any smaller than I already am, thank you very much."

"Konoka, Makie-chan, we have two choices. Either one of us sacrifices four feet and 5 inches needed to restore Negi's original size, or we all split it in thirds to do so."

"You mean we'll all shrink down by almost a foot and a half in height, shrunk to the size of grade-school kids, if not smaller?" Konoka asked her best friend.

"Seems to be the case, I'm afraid. We can't leave Negi this tiny forever. So what plan do you guys want to go through with?"
13333221121222221111.title: Choosing the right spell

choices: They both end up at Negi's original height
133332211212222211111.content:
Asuna looked at her friends, knowing none of them wanted to give up their height, but also not wanting their teacher to remain at his current size. A long time passed as they mentally debated with themselves. The silence continued on to the extent that Asuna could no longer bear, and after a great amount of thought, she prepared herself to sacrifice her height for her teacher.

"I'll do it...", Makie said, just before Asuna could open her mouth. All three looked at her in wonder.

"B-but Makie-san, you'll be putting yourself right back where you started. There's even a chance you might never return to your normal size again! I-I-I can't do that to you", Negi protested.

"It's alright, Negi-kuni!" she chirped. "Because, with what I have learned from this crazy adventure, I know that everything will turn out all right!" She hugged him close to her and put him on the ground.

As he instructed her on how to perform the spell, the other two girls watched with a grimace.

"What if it doesn't work and something really bad happens?" Asuna asked Konoka with a grimace.

"I don't know, but all we can do is sit back and watch", she replied. Asuna then nodded with agreement.

"Alright. I'm ready, sensei!" Makie told her teahcer.

"Okay, now just like I said, alright?"

"Right! Here we go!" Makie said excitingly.

What happens next, though!? You decide!
133332211212222211111.title: Resized

choices: They head off immediately to Library Island
Something weird begins to happen to Negi and Makie's heights
1333322112122222111112.content:
As the spell began to take effect, both Negi and Makie started to glow in the same dark glow that had shrunk the former earlier that day. As Negi found himself glowing and growing, Makie felt her body slowly shrinking bit by bit, watching as she shrunk down several inches downwards from her peers' heights. Upon reaching his original size, Negi looked ecstatic by the restoration of his height, but noticed that something was off..

"Why did Makie-chan only shrink to Negi's size?" Konoka wondered as she approached the slightly shorter Makie. She placed the cheerful pink-haired friend of hers side-by-side her teacher, finding out that they were both four and a half feet tall.

"Wha!" Makie exclaimed, surprised by her size. "Now I'm the same size as Negi-kun!"

"Makie-san, don't be upse...", Negi began before his equal sized student gave him a hug.

"I'm so glad you're back to normal, sensei", Makie cried, tears of happiness running down her eyes. "I don't care if I stay this height forever if it means you're back to normal."

"Except that's not going to happen", Asuna grumbled as she grabbed both Makie and Negi by their hands. "Negi, we're getting out of here and heading to Library Island. They'll probably have something there."

"Oh yeah! Library Island! We haven't been there in a while...if I remembered it in the first place, I would've gone there", a dumbfounded Negi remembered. Asuna just sighed in annoyance, unimpressed by her teacher's foggy memory. The four then made their way out of the library and past a resting Evangeline, who didn't really pay attention to the four children as they went on their way out of her resort..
1333322112122222111112.title: Makie comes up a little short

choices: Makie grows anyway, this time to about 25 feet
Makie stays the same height, and the two head off
133332212.content:
So Negi decided to make up a lie to Makie, and make one up quick. It wasn't easy lying to his student, though, considering the morals he was raised up on by his cousin Nekane.

"Well, Makie, since you're still 'asleep', let's go, um, go several thousand feet from Mahora Academy and hang out somewhere. Anywhere but here"

"Really? Together?" smiled an inquisitive Makie, happy to hear her teacher wanting to spend more time with her. "Then let's go! I can carry you."

True to her word, Makie held Negi up once again with her hands and placed the boy on her left shoulder.

"So, Negi-kun, where are we going? Am I going to grow bigger?"

"Not as far as I know", Negi told the girl, secretly hoping he was right.
133332212.title: Negi's a lousy liar

choices: Let Makie have fun for the time being
1333322121.content:
Makie started sprinting towards to the woods, spreading her arms out like wings, with a big smile on her face. Negi, on the otherhand, was holding onto Makie's shoulder for dear life.

"Makie!" Negi yelled, "Can you please-!"

Negi stopped yelling when he felt something strange. He looked closely at Makie, realizing that she's growing again.

"Wheeee!" Makie yelled in delight.

Tears streamed out of Negi's eyes. "Oh no...." he cried.

Makie was now in the cover of the trees, and was now out of sight. They came up onto a river, and Makie sat down, lowering Negi down on the ground.

"This is the best dream I have ever had!" Makie said.

Negi looked the other way, looking down. "Yeah..."

"I have got to be like ... 25 feet now!"

Negi went by the river, and sat down. "what am I gonna do now..?"
1333322121.title: Into the woods, and over the river...

13333221211.content:
Negi stands back up, and turns to Makie.

"Makie, can you please try waking up?" Negi pleaded.

"Why?" Makie asked. "I'm having a great dream!"

"Because, uh ... You're going to be late for class!"

"Oh no!" Makie started pinching herself, trying to wake up. "Wah, how do I wake up?"

"Try falling asleep," Negi said. If all goes according to plan, when she falls asleep, Negi can shrink her back to normal size, and take her back to her dorm room, into her bed. (And perhaps she'll know that there's no class today when she wakes up :) )

Makie lays down, and shuts her eyes. After a few minutes, she said, "I can't fall asleep!"

"Just keep trying," Negi said with enthusiasm.

After another few minutes, she complains again. Negi slumps his shoulders, and walks up to Makie's head. He took his staff, and tapped her head. Makie went silent instantly.

"Good thing that old slee[ing spell still works."

Negi takes a stick, and runs in a big circle around Makie, dragging the stick behind him. After he makes the circle, he takes his staff, and holds it out vertically, and yells out:

"Decreso Tantus!"

The circle begins glowing, and Makie begins shrinking down to....
13333221211.title: Please fall asleep...

133332212111.content:
Makie shrinks down to her normal size. Negi lets out a sigh of relief, but now he faces a new challenge, getting Makie back with her waking up, and getting noticed. But with what Negi has learned already from magic school, it shouldn't be too much of a problem.

Negilifts Makie onto his staff, and they fly off high in the sky. While flying, Negi holds out his wand, and yells:

"Chameleon!"

Now, he and Makie will be camoflaged in the sky. In a matter of minutes, Negi pin points the dorms, and finds Makie dorm window. He flys in, floats over Makie's bed, and tilits forward, causing Makie to fall onto her bed. Luckily, she didn't wake.

Negi lands down, and wipes sweat off his forehead. "Whew... I'm not messing with this spell again anytime soon.

Negi dispels the chameleon spell, and walks out the door.

When he closes the door he hears "What were you doing in Makie's room?"






__________
An hour later, Makie runs to class, not knowing that it is the weekend
133332212111.title: End of a Nightmare

13333222.content: Well then, how about Kaede the ninja?
13333222.title: Kaede?

133332221.content:
As he raised his staff, preparing to start the incantation, a poof of smoke signaled the arrival of Kaede, Mahora's number one ninja student. Unfortunately, Negi was in the middle of the spell already and he could not see her blindly step into the magic circle just as it emitted blue light around her. He had shut his eyes because of the blinding light and; as it dimmed, he began to focus on something very large and very high above him.

"I guess a growth spell is sensei's way of saying good morning, eh de-gozaru?" the now 50 meter tall giantess said as she bent down to pick up her now quivering teacher.

"Oh, come on now. Don't look at me with that scared look, sensei! Although you do look really cute when you're frightened."

"K-Kaede-san..."

Realization struck him and he started to freak out, running up and down his student's hand (which was about five times his height).

"This is bad! This is REALLY BAD!! I'll be turned into an ermine for sure now!"

Kaede's fist came down softly on his head, but the minor impact was enough to stop his nervous rampage for a time.

"Negi-sensei, calm down", she said, smiling at him. "It was my fault anyway. And besides, it's a Sunday. You shouldn't be so high strung."

"You're right, Kaede-san", Negi said as he rubbed his throbbing head. "I'm not sure the blow to the head was necessary, though."

"Sorry, sensei. I had to do something about you", she smiled down at him and he frowned.

"Well right now we need to find a way to fix this", Negi told his giantess student.

"Is that what you're worried about? Hold on a sec, 'kay?"

Kaede then put her teacher down and formed different hand signs, none of which Negi could follow or understand. After a large puff of smoke came and went, there stood a normal sized Kaede. Negi ran to her but was struck by something with the force of a truck. A second later he found himself clinging to the head of his giantess of a student, now at her final height of 230 meters.

"That's the first time something like that has happened", the surprised Kaede said to her teacher. "Are you okay, sensei?"

"Yes!" Negi squeaked as his student's giant hand enveloped him, only to release him at her eye level.

"Sorry, sensei. It's really hard to keep control of that jutsu 'cause I'm not usually not this big when I use it."

"I understand, and NOW we have to find a way to fix you", Negi panicked.

"Right", she nodded in reply, putting Negi between her even bigger than usual breasts. So much blood ran to Negi's face that he almost fainted. Kaede laughed to herself as she strode off, but where was she going?
133332221.title: Enter Kaede

choices: "Forget the bag, we will be just fine without it."
"We should get it back just as a precaution."
1333322212.content:
The forest flashed by almost to quickly for Negi to see from his perch between the Kaede's massive breasts. In just 12 strides Kaede had cleared what would have been a 45 minute walk. The teacher looked up at his student who looked back at him and smiled. Feeling his face flushing again he quickly turned to stare at the ground far below them.

"Kaede-san where are we going?" Asked Negi rather worried that his student may have forgotten about her own predicament.

"There are a few things that I would like to pick up from my tent before we find out how to fix this." She replied in her usual cheerful tone.

"Oh I see. Do you know what to do?" He asked not sure as to what to do himself.

"Nope. Not a clue, but it doesn't hurt to be prepared for anything." She answered in an inspiring chirp.

"You're definitely right about that." He agreed, cursing himself for no following her example and trying the spell prepared for something like this. They reach the mountain area and the giantess takes her teacher out from his snug cradle and lowers him down to the plateau where her tent is nestled.

"Sensei do you think you can get them and make them big like me? Everything should be in a gray duffle bag." With that he ran in only to reemerge with a small piece of paper.

"It isn't there. But I did find this note." He said, worried.

"What!? What does that note say?!" She boomed.

"It says, 'Kaede, if you want your ninja bag back you will have to find us. Love, Fuuka and Fumika.' Well this is bothersome." Negi said.

"They picked the WRONG day to mess with me." Kaede sent Negi a wink telling him she was teasing them and trying to scare them out. It worked! A terrified pair of twins stepped out in the open holding Kaede's bag. Seeing the large version of their friend scared them even more than hearing her soft but incredibly loud voice. Realizing they had been tricked snapped them out of their horrified trance.

"You're not getting THIS back any time soon!" Fuuka yelled.

"Yeah, that was really mean!!" Fumika screamed as they both ran off.

"Should we just forget about the bag or should I chase them down sensei?"
1333322212.title: The home on a hill.

133332222.content: Then how's about Ku Fei?
133332222.title: Ku Fei?

1333322221.content:
Ku Fei, Mahora Academy's martial arts pride and joy, was training nonstop in the forest. She was taking a break after her endless self-punishment when her eyes were suddenly diverted. She ran straight up to a nearby tree and, after a quick succession of hits, fell to the ground on her feet. She had been training all morning, and although it was only about 10:30, Ku Fei was nearly exhausted. However, now she could clearly see what had called her attention in the first lace. It was her teacher, Negi, who was standing in the dirt with his staff. She saw him twirl it around in the dirt.

What is he doing? Fu Fei wondered to herself. So she walked straight up to him and looked him in the face. His eyes were tightly shut and his arms were raised up high.

"Negi-bozu! What are you doing?" she again asked, this time out loud and directly at her teacher. Negi then opened his eyes. only to see his student wrapped in intense blue light. He yelled at her to escape, but it was to no avail. Ku Fei struggled to escape from the light, but all her attempts were futile. Calmness overtook her body as she shut her eyes. By the time she opened them again she found herself looking straight up at Negi.

"Good, you're up", Negi sighed in relief. "It's a good that nothing happened either."

"What do you mean-bozu? What is supposed to happen?"

"Well you got caught in a growth spell I just cast and I couldn't stop it. But it seems to have failed."

"Hmm... I do feel kinda funny now that you mention it", Ku Fei laughed. But it was no joke. A second later she clutched her stomach, her insides feeling like they were growing inside of her. She was in such great pain that she started to rip up the ground beneath her. About a minute later she had stopped writhing and was now crouching with her face to the ground breathing heavily. Beads of sweat rolled down her face as she struggled to remain conscious. When K Fei finally did open her eyes, she no longer saw her teacher's young face staring down at her. This time she saw it looking directly up at her. She lifted her head up, and Negi's small body was caught by the top of her nose and lifted up as well.

"Oh no. It worked. This is bad...." the worried teacher said to himself.

"Negi-bozu. This... is... AWESOME!!!!!" squealed the now 80 meter tall giantess.

"What are you talking about!? This is terrible!" he yelled back at his super-sized student. "We'll be in serious trouble if anyone sees you! I'll be turned into an ermine! This is definitely not good!"

"But I'm so big! It fun being big", Ku Fei chirped happily in reply.

"Ku Fei-san, we have to find a way to get you back to normal fast!" Negi whined.

".....Alright-bozu. But how we going to do that? I can't really go walking around like this."

"We'll have to ask somebody for advice." Who does Negi ask for advice, though?
1333322221.title: Training Trouble

1333322222.content: Um...ninja twins Fumika and Fuuka??
1333322222.title: Fumika and Fuuka?

13333222221.content: Do Fumika and Fuuka grow together, or seperate?
13333222221.title: Twin Giantesses (choices)

choices: .."our secret hiding place in the forest."
133332222211.content:
As Negi began to proceed with the growing of the pebble in the dirt, two girls in the distance noticed their teacher. The two girls were fairly short for their age (even shorter than Negi), and they both had pink hair. One had hers in pigtails, and the other had hers in a bun. They also dressed the same: a plain white t-shirt and light blue shorts. They were Fuuka and Fumika, twin ninja girls in Negi's class. Fuuka was the childish one of the duo, while Fumika was the more mature, careful one of the two. The two girls noticed Negi in the distance not too far from their dormitory and wondered what he was doing so early in the morning.

"What do you suppose our teacher's doing, Fumika?" Fuuka asked her twin sister.

"I don't know. Let's go see", Fumika replied, and the two dashed off to see their teacher who, at that time, alread began the incantation, which went along the lines of "Incresco Tantus", Latin for increasing the size of something. However, as the two were not aware of Negi's growth spell, the two simply thought they saw flashes of light coming at them when Negi's spell misfired and hit both girls at the same time.

"Ah! So bright!" the twins screamed simultaneously, wondering what just happened. A few seconds later the light had finally stopped, and Fumika and Fuuka noticed their teacher looking worried.

"Fumika-san, Fuuka-san! We have to get out of here!" Negi tried to tell his students, but the two just looked at him with a blank stare.

"What's wrong, sensei? It's just a flash of light", Fumika told her teacher.

"It's not just that!" Negi continued to explain to his students about their very soon growth. "It's something...bigger than that."

"Bigger?" Fumika and Fuuka smiled in unison. "Like a growth spell?" The two noticed Negi's silent pause afterwards, and soon the twins put two and two together and jumped to the conlusion that Negi had them with a growth spell.

"I wonder which one of us will grow first?" wondered Fuuka outloud to her sister.

"I hope it's me", Fuuka smiled. "I always wanted to be taller."

It's not like Negi could blame the two for getting excited. Fumika and Fuuka were so tiny for their age, they were often mistaken for kindergardeners. What really worried Negi was how to turn them back, if they would even let him.

Suddenly, the first signs of growth began to appear on the girls. First to grow was Fuuka, who saw her shoes spring up in size. Her shoes grew in small spurts of growth until they were 10 times their normal height, in a process that took 15 seconds. Next up were her hands, which grew in similar spurts of growth for 15 seconds, then her arms, legs, butt, chest, and finally her hair and then lastly her head. The formerly tiny ninja girl was now a little more than 40 feet tall, and Fuuka couldn't be happier.

As Fumika looked up above to her sister, she too felt a tingle in her body. Unlike her sister, Fumika's growth began with her butt, which caused the tiny ninja girl to slam pretty fast onto the ground from the weight of it. Like Fuuka, Fumika's body parts were growing to 10 times their normal height, and shortly after her butt's growth began her legs and feet. About 30 seconds later her hands began to grow, then her arms, hands, and lastly her hair and head. At the end of all the growing, Fumika, too, was about 40 or so feet tall. Both sisters then came to Negi's eye level and gave them a kiss on each of his cheeks, Fumika kissing the left cheek and Fuuka the right. This freaked Negi more than a little out, of course.

"This is the best thing anyone's ever done for us, sensei", smiled Fuuka as if she just won a lottery giving away one million dollars to its winner. "Let's go somewhere to celebrate!"

"I don't think this is the time for celbra..." Negi tried to tell Fuuka, but the giantess ninja grabbed him before he coud finish his sentence. She then placed the boy on her left shoulder, smiling all the while.

"Don't worry, sensei", Fumika assured her teacher. "Where we're going, our newfound height will not be a problem."

"Really? Where are we going?" wondered Negi, still worried over the whole situation.

"Don't worry", Fuuka smiled to her teacher. "We're just going to.."
133332222211.title: Giantess Ninjas

choices: Kaede Arrives! Saved by the Ninja!
1333322222112.content:
"K-Kaede-san? Why would you go to visit her all the way in the mountains?" Negi asked as the twins marched through the thick forest.

"Because she always teaches us some new ninja move whenever we visit!" Fuuka chirped. "She's also the only one who doesn't make fun of us because of our height. But I guess that isn't that big of an issue anymore!"

"O.K., you can show Kaede-san that you're big, but then we have to go back so I can find a way to reverse this", Negi said resembling a father denning his child a toy.

"It seems to me that you not in a very good position to be telling us what to do", Fumika pointed out, smirking an evil grin. "One wrong move and it could be 'GOOD BYEEE sensei'! Anyway, we don't want to want to be small again. Being small is so boring!"

"Yes but it's normal..." Negi muttered to himself. He looked down to see the forest floor melting away into a green highland meadow. In front of them he saw Kaede's small tent with smoke coming up from around it.

"Kaede!" the two ninjas called for her. There was no reply. "Kaede! It's us, Fuuka and Fumika. You can come out!" Again, no reply.

"Grr!" growled Fuuka as she tore the tent off of the plateau that it had been sitting on. "Where could she have gone?!"

<Those two...seem to have grown angrier since I casted the spell.> Negi thought to himself. <I should calm them down, but how do you calm two hyper, devious, and now angry giantesses?>
1333322222112.title: Visiting Kaede

choices: He succeeds in calming them down
He fails, and the twins continue their rampage
13333222221121.content: Does he succeed or fail?
13333222221121.title: He tries and succeeds/fails

choices: "Since we're already here, why don't we play a game while we wait for Kaede."
"If we can't show Kaede, let's go back to the school & show everyone else!"
133332222211211.content:
As Negi sat nervously on Fuka's shoulder, he decided that he had to calm the girls down quickly. Tapping the giant Fuka on the back of her head to get her attention, he began to speak up.

"Please girls, you have to calm down! If you keep acting up like this, then you might end up hurting someone!"

Fuka and Fumika stopped their little rampage and looked at each other before sighing. Fumika then grabbed Negi off of her twin sister's shoulder and held him in front of her before speaking.

"Sorry Negi, we just got a bit carried away... Fuka and I just really wanted to show this to Kaede, and we can't really do that if she isn't around here..."

"Yeah sensei, we really didn't mean to cause any trouble. Sorry..."

Negi simply smiled at the girls.

"It's quite alright girls, but I do need you to promise me that you'll be more careful from now on. If I'm going to let you stay at this size, then you're going to have to be responsible and not abuse your power."

Fuka and Fumika simply smiled back at Negi and each gave him another quick kiss on the cheek.

"We promise, Negi-sensei. We'll be sure that we're extra careful not to hurt anyone now." the twin giantesses said in unison.

"Thank you girls, I'm glad to know that I can trust you two. So, what should we do now?"

The giantess twins simply grinned at each other before looking back at Negi. Fuka then answered by saying...
133332222211211.title: Calming the giantess twins

choices: smaller, now at about 15 feet or so tall
13333222221122.content:
Worried about Fumika and Fuuka's destruction, Negi attempted to get their attention, only to be tossed aside during their rampage. Luckily for Negi he was saved at the last second by a familiar face: Kaede! It seemed as if she was there the whole time, because she simply looked at Negi with a face that seems to have known everything that happened.

"Wow...never thought I'd see a spell like this ever, de-gozaru", Kaede commented, watching as Fuuka and Fumika calmed down and saw their "small" friend below them. Negi watched as the normal-sized ninja scolded the twin giantesses for being rude and mean to their teacher, which he was completely floored by. They could have easily crushed her or tossed her aside, but instead Fumika and Fuuka listened to Kaede's every word.

"Wow...I didn't know they respected her this much", Negi told himself behind a tree as he was quickly picked up by Fumika. She then proceeded to kiss Negi once again, this time on the lips!

"Negi-sensei, my sister and I are so sorry", she told him as she lightly hugged him. "We'll be good from now on."

"Well, I'm glad to hear that, Fumika-san. And if you two promise to behave, I can make you even bigger if you want."

"Really!?" Fuuka overheard, excited by the news as she rushed over and proceeded to pick up Negi herself, also kissing him on the lips. "That sounds great!"

"Okay then. Fumika-san, Fuuka-san, stand next together while I make a circle in the dirt", their reacher explained as he made a fairly large circle around the two girls. Kaede, meanwhile, watched as to what was about to unfold.

"This should be interesting, de-gozaru", she said to herself as she sat on a nearby log as Negi proceeded to incant the spell once again, this time making Fumika and Fuuka
13333222221122.title: Kaede the rescuer

choices: Negi returns them to their normal size.
133332222211222.content:
As Negi started to chant the incantation once again, a sudden urge took hold and, in last word of the spell, he sneezed hard enough to throw the entire spell off. The twins felt themselves starting to glow and giggled in delight, unaware of their teacher's large mistake. Their cries of glee turned to confusion as their previously giant bodies receded to only about three times their normal size. Granted this was still around fifteen feet tall, just big enough to pick Negi up and shake him to the point of almost releasing his already loose breakfast. A sharp look from Kaede ended with Negi sitting dazed, and a scolded look on the face of the mini giantesses.

"This is probably better. I don't think I could handle you getting any bigger", Kaede sighed with a grimace. The thought of that did not bring a smile to Negi as he imagined it, regretting the fact that it was his idea in the first place.

"But Kaede....", the twins whined simultaneously, "It's so much fun being big. Will you please show us a new move today?" They looked very hopeful at their teacher, and Kaede's switched from the mini-giantesses before her to her teacher.

"Yes. Today we'll learn how to set a ninja's mountain camp and start an open air bath for your sensei and sempai." Kaede turned to Negi and winked as the the twins' big shoulders dropped. knowing their future task at hand.

"Negi-sensei, being big isn't fun anymore", Fuuka said as she put up the tent. "Will you make us small again?"
133332222211222.title: Angry mini giantess twins... Not a good thing...

1333322222112222.content:
Negi happily nodded in reply to Fuuka's question, asking the two once again to stand close together as he made another circle in the dirt. Shortly after the incantation, Fuuka and Fumika found before them the world getting bigger once again, and Kaede sighed in relief that the spell returned the two to their exact original size and not a centimeter taller of smaller.

"Well I hope you two learned your lesson, de-gozaru", Kaede told the twin ninjas as she rubbed each of their heads with one of her hands. "Now go thank Negi-sensei for giving you the feeling in the first place of even being big."

"Thank you, Negi-sensei", Fuuka and Fumika said in unison, bowing before Negi.

"I'm just glad everything is back to normal", he replied with a nervous tone in his voice. "Besides...one day you two will become tall and beautiful adults yourselves."

"Really, sensei?" Fuuka blushed in reply to her teacher's statement. "You think that one day...Fumika and I will be...?"

"Yep. I do", Negi smiled as the twin ninjas ran up to him and kissed him once again.

"Then we'll look forward to showing you our beautiful adult selves when we grow up", Fumika teased her teacher, winking shortly her promise. She and Fuuka then took off with Kaede as they prepared for their next lesson with her...cleaning the camp ground around her home that they had damaged in their violent rage earlier that day.
1333322222112222.title: Lesson learned

133332222212.content: Then who grows first: childish Fuka, or the more mature Fumika?
133332222212.title: Who goes first?

13333222222.content: What about Chao Lengshen (NOTE: contains spoilers for the much later volumes of the manga, especially beyond volume 10)?
13333222222.title: Chao?

choices: They meet up with Satomi with no problem
The two stop along the way for some reason
133332222221.content:
As Negi proceeded to cast the spell, lifting his staff in the air and performing the incantation ("Incresco Tantus!"), a figure stepped by at the last second, replacing the pebble from earlier. It seemed to be one of Negi's students, Chao Lengshen!

"Yo, Negi-kun", she smiled at him, lifting one hand in the air at her teacher. "Seems I stumbled upon one of your spells."

"Ch-Chao-san!? You know that I'm a mage..!?" Negi began to say as Chao hugged the boy.

"Yep. Knew this entire time, actually. I even knew that you were performing a growth spell. One that, by the way, I purposely stumbled into."

"Wait? How did you know this would happen?" Negi asked of his student, who proceeded to look at him with a smug look.

"Because I'm from the future, silly", Chao laughed as she patted her teacher's head in just. "I once read about this spell before in my magic books, but was never able to find it myself. So, using a device that allows me to predict future and past events, I came to this spot at the exact time I knew you would begin this spell. I even know when I'll start growing!"

"And when is that...?" Negi reluctantly asked.

"Now!", Chao continued to smile as she placed Negi on the ground, her growth beginning before him. The child teacher could only watch as Chao's body began to expand in size all over, from her hair to her feet. After about 50 or so seconds had passed the growth was complete, and Chao smiled in glee of her new 100 foot size.

"Ga...eh.....eh.....eh", the speechless Negi babbled as Chao picked him up and placed him on top of her head.

"So Negi-kun, what do you think of the new and improved Chao Lengshen?" she asked him with a slight sinister tone to her voice.

"Um...that we should keep this a secret as much as possible...?"

"Heck no! This is too cool to keep this to myself! I just HAVE to show Satomi this and rub it in her face. She said it was impossible for humans to grow, but I'm gonna prove her wrong!"

"But Chao-san...if you know I'm a mage, then you probably also know that.."

"Yeah, yeah. 'If someone finds out, you'll be turned into an ermine'. I've heard it from your students before. Don't worry, Negi-kun. I'll try to be as quiet as I can." And with that, the reluctant teacher and his giantess student headed off to meet Satomi.
133332222221.title: The "accidental" giantess Chao is born

choices: Negi refuses to enlarge Satomi, much to a disappointed Chao
1333322222211.content:
As Negi held on to Chao's hair as she continued to proceed ever closer to the building Satomi was studying at, the giddy giantess continued to giggle to herself.

"Oh, this is going to be great!" Chao continued to smile to herself as she gently knocked on the building that Satomi was currently studying in.

"Satomi-san studies on Sundays?" Negi asked without any reason in-particular. "I didn't know that."

"Well, she didn't get some of the best grades in the school from watching anime and playing video games", Chao replied as she continued to knock on the side of the building Satomi was on, as if she was knocking on a wooden door.

"That's true. But still, studying every day? Even when I was training to be a teacher, I didn't have to do that."

"And that's the difference between you and Satomi. Me too, actually. I study every day too, Negi-kun."

Chao proceeded to peek through all the windows of the building, hoping to see a glimpse of the girl to show off her new size, but alas nothing. She was getting agitated now, angrily tapping her left foot on the ground. She was now behind the entrance of said building.

"Grrr...this is frustrating! I knew for sure she'd be here!"

"Um...Chao-san, I think I see Satomi-san entering from the front side.."

"Really!? Thanks, Negi-kun", the excited Chao rushed out as she proceeded to stare a wide grin at the girl, surprised by what she saw.

"AAAAHH! You scared me, Chao-san!" Satomi meekly muttered, dropping her notebooks in her hands.

"What's up?" Chao asked her as she picked her up in her hands, placing her on the top of her head right next to Negi. "Now do you believe me that people can grow?"

"B-b-but that's impossible! The body structure of people doesn't allow for growing or shrinking.."

"So what? You're saying I'm a robot, then?" Chao once again picked up Satomi, this time lifting her shirt up and placing Satomi's face directly in contact with the top of her stomach to feel her heartbeat.

"I...hear...a...heartbeat..." Satomi slowly blurted out.

"See? I told you! I'm a real, 100 foot tall giantess!" Chao grinned at her friend as she placed up on the ground. "And it's all thanks to Negi-kun!"

"Negi-sensei?! He has those powers!? I thought he only knew basic magic.."

"So you know about my powers too, Satomi-san?" Negi sighed in frustration over how easily he's let his "secret" of being a mage slip out among his students. "It seems like everyone knows.."

"I never knew you had magic quite like this, though!" a now starry-eyed Satomi shouted to her teacher, who was still on Chao's head high above. "Sensei!! Can you make me big, too!?"

"Come on, Negi-kun! It'll be fun", suggested Chao. "We promise we won't do anything to harm others. And if anyone asks, you can say Satomi and I are robots she created."

"Well...I don't know. Let me think about it, Chao-san and Satomi-san..", Negi paused, knowing that either decision would wind up being fairly problematic.
1333322222211.title: Rubbing it in

choices: Kazumi and Negi hang out somewhere
1333322222221.content:
Right before Negi began his spell, he saw one of his students not too far in the distance. It was Kazumi, one of his students aware of his magic abilities (though since she didn't have a pactio with Negi, she had no magic abilities of her own). The child teacher waved his hands out to her to get her attention, to which she did. Kazumi then dashed quickly over to Negi, wondering what he was doing.

"You're up early for a Sunday, Negi-kun", Kazumi said to her teacher, looking down at the circle in the dirt. "I guess you're trying out a new spell or something?"

"Yep", he smiled in reply. "I'm trying to make this pebble in the center of that circle grow."

"Wow! You know a spell that makes things grow in size?" the shocked Kazumi asked him, whose shocked expression quickly turned into a smile and a slight snicker. "Does it work on people?" She then walked into the circle herself.

"K-Kazumi-san!" the worried Negi sprang out. "I haven't tested it out yet! I'm testing it on this rock first to see if anything happens."

"Oh Negi-kun, don't be so wishy-washy", Kazumi smiled to her teacher. "You didn't become the great teacher you were today by not taking chances, right?" This caused Negi to pause in thought, and he remebered long ago when he fought against a monster that attacked his village years ago with nothing but a beginner's wand. He could've died that day, but was saved by his father in the nick of time. Negi didn't want to relive that kind of thing ever again in his life, and especially not jeopardize one of his students' lives in the process. Meanwhile, Kazumi was still looking at Negi, wondering if he would even go through with the spell now.

"Kazumi-san, I've made my decision", Negi told his student. "I can't do it." Kazumi looked disappointed at his teacher's decision, partially because she wanted to be a part of his magic studies. But Negi wasn't quite done yet. "I can't do it here, that is", he added. "Let's go outside the school gates and I'll let you....gr...ow."

Kazumi once again regained her cheerful disposition, and the two headed out to a naerby clearing far from the school gates. There were plenty of trees around the area as well, so even if someone COULD see them, Negi could always try to erase their memories with a spell should someone see them. Negi then proceeded, once again, to a patch of dirt on the ground and made a circle in it, which Kazumi quickly put herself inside of.

"I'm ready to go, Negi-kun", Kazumi smiled to her teacher, winking her right eye and giving him a thumbs up.

"Okay then", the still somwhat worried Negi replied, hoping that the spell wouldn't do anything major to his student. He then closed his eyes and began to hod up his staff with his left hand, swinging it around left and right. During this the circle Kazumi was in began to glow, and with it, Kazumi herself beganglowing. Kazumi could feel her whole body feeling warmer, almost as if she was in an electric blanket, and it made her feel a little funny. Then Negi finished off the spell with the following incantation:

"Incresco Tantus!!"

Within seconds afterwards the spell began to work its way into Kazumi. Kazumi's long, sender legs were the first part of her to grow, growing to several times their original size until they were several times taller than her own teacher. Next up were her arms, which reached out pass several trees (though thankfully her arms weren't caught in any branches). These were soon followed by the growth of her hands, which grew in quick spurts that made her head look as small as a Barbie doll's in comparison. Then Kazumi's feet began to grow, eventually growing up to Negi's own knees. Next up was her chest, stomach, and butt, which grew, much like the rest of her body, in quick spurts, each time getting to be about twice the size they were before. Kazumi's hair soon enough started to grow, quickly covering up her entire face, soon followed up with the growth of her head. In a manner of two minutes Kazumi's growth began and finished. Already one of the taller students in her class, Kazumi was now a 45-foot tall junior high school giantess. Kazumi looked around her new environment with a little bit of a shock, but was fairly happy with the results that it gave. She was also glad Negi's spell actually worked.

"Kazumi-san, are you alright?" Nei asked his student, yelling fairly loudly to get her attention. The newly found giantess then sat down on the ground on her back, picking up her teacher and placing him on top of her chest.

"I'm fine, Negi-kun", she smiled, her eyes closed doing so. "I'm glad it worked, and I'm glad you chose ME after all to practice this with."

"You're not worried?" Negi asked in shock while Kazumi patted him on the head with her right pinky finger.

"A little. You probably don't even know how to fix this, I bet", Kazumi told her teacher. "But I'm not too worried. If I know one thing about you, Negi-kun, is that you never leave a student in need behind. Ever. That's what makes you a great teacher."

"T-t-thanks", Negi smiled, blushing in reply. "But now what do we do?" Soon after asking this, Negi watched as Kazumi picked him up and placed him back on the ground on his feet, the giantess herself standing up once again on her feet.

"To tell you the truth, I have no idea", Kazumi said with a slightly childish tone in her voice, playfully sticking out her tounge a little. Just then she felt a strange warmth in her stomach and noticed the environment around her getting even smaller. Kazumi seemed to have to be 46 feet tall now! She then proceeded to the ground once again, this time sitting on her knees, and picked up Negi with her hands and placed him on her lap, his head resting on her chest once again. "We could always talk", Kazumi said to her teacher, looking down to him and smiling. "We don't get to hang out too much, Negi-kun. Or we could, you know, hang out somewhere." The giantess student, who at that point grew to 47 feet in height, then began playing with her teacher's hair once again with her right pinky finger. The first time she did this to Negi he was a little worried by the height difference, but he seemed more relaxed by it now.

"You seem happier since you've grown", Negi pointed out to his student, who grew up to 48 feet tall just then. "And you're already quite cheerful as is."

"Must be a side effect", Kazumi smiled, growing an additional foot, this time to 50 feet. "I guess the taller you get, the happier you are."

So what path do the two walk down now?
1333322222221.title: Giantess Kazumi

choices: Kazumi asks Negi to pick up something for the two of them
Kazumi suggests getting her something from her dorm and making it grow
13333222222211.content:
It was so weird...and yet not as well. Negi was used to be shorter than the majority of his students, but compared to the antics of vampires, robots, time-travelers, and rock golems, one of his students becoming a giantess wasn't so weird. He was especially glad that Kazumi was a friendly giantess, unlike a few B-horror movies he had seen as a child of giant-sized people destroying cities and killing people in their rampages.

"Negi-kun~", Kazumi smiled brightly at her teacher. "Do you like me..~?"

"Eh!?" was the boy's reaction to Kazumi's question. He gushed red as he stared at Kazumi's cheerful, smiling face, which zoomed overhead her large chest.

"Well....do you like me?" an annoyed Kazumi asked once again, her smile slowly turning into a frown. "I guess you don't..." She began to fak cry in front of the boy, giggling inside her head of his stressed-out expressions as he began to respond.

"Of course I liked you, Kazumi-san! I like all my students!" Negi quickly responded, watching Kazumi grow in size once again when she smiled in response. Negi could feel the distance between himself and her face separating all the further, watching as she grew from a tall 50 feet to an even greater 65.

"Aw...you're so sweet, Negi-kun. You'll make som lucky girl a nice husband one day", she teased her teacher as she kissed the boy with her giant-sized lips. "The kiss is our little secret, Negi-kun."

"Secret?" a befuddled Negi wondered. "Why would a kiss be a secret?"

"From your girlfriend, Asuna", she continued to further tease her teacher. "You two are so cute together! Or perhaps you like Nodoka, or perhaps Yue? I've seen you hang around with Chisame recently as well, and even Makie and Ku Fei. You sure are popular with the girls, ain't ya?"

"Um....they're my students. Of course I want to be...."

"To be...?"

"I want them to respect me, and to do so I earn their trust by being friendly."

"Awwwww! You're sooo cute when you're embarrassed", Kazumi further teased her teacher, standing up on her butt and proceeding to kiss him again. During the kiss she grew again, this time to a high 90 feet tall. Once again Negi stood in shock of what was going on, watching as his giantess student sat back down on her backside on the ground, placing her teacher on her large left breast.

"Negi-kun, are you hungry by any chance?" Kazumi asked the boy, whose stomach then rumbled as if he were hitting a cue. Her stomach then growled even larger, leaving a bit of a vibration to the teacher resting on her stomach.

"A little bit, yeah", he replied. "But where do we go to get food?"

"Hmm...that's a good question", pondered Kazumi, placing her left hand under her chin and stroking it.
13333222222211.title: Alone time with a giantess

133332222222112.content:
"I think there's something in my dorm room. Mind getting it for us?" she asked.

"Not at all", replied the magic teacher.


"Oh, and make it grow so it will be big enough for me, 'kay?"

"Got it."

Kazumi put Negi down as he headed off to the dorm, quickly finding Kazumi's room. The good thing is that the girls are off doing their own things and take no note of him. After getting the food he heads back out to Kazumi.

"So did you get it?"

"Right here."

"Good. Now make it grow."

He nods and casts the same spell that caused Kazumi to grow, then the two begin to eat to their heart's content.

"Ahh, that was good." said a satisfied Kazumi after finishing up the food.

"Indeed."

"So what do you want to do now? We still have some time to kill before I go to bed."

"Well....."
133332222222112.title: Jumbo sized order

1333322222221122.content:
"Well..even though it might be an bad idea, but maybe we should show the other students...including Asuna", suggested Negi.

Kazumi's eyes soon lit up with excitement, the opposite of what her teacher expected.

"That's an good idea!" Kazumi said with smile.

Just then Kazumi grew more, this time up to 150 feet tall! Negi was worried about her, but Kazumi assured him that it would be okay. She put Negi on her right hand palm and started to run toward the academy.

But there was one question; who would she meet with?
1333322222221122.title: Surprise, surprise!

1333322222222.content: What about Casper, er, Sayo, the friendly ghost?
1333322222222.title: Sayo?

13333222222221.content:
Sayo Asaka was your typical teenage girl: shy, klutzy, and had a difficult time making friends. She's actually very sweet and nice, but there's one thing about her that separates her from the rest of her classmates at Mahora Academy: she's a ghost. Long confined to the school grounds since her death, Sayo spent 60 years relatively alone until one day she finally got to talk to another student at the school. Her name was Kazumi, one of the top authorities of gossip and intrigue among the Mahora Academy students, and she was even in the same class as Sayo. Since then the two have been good friends. Of course, this was after she accidentally caused a ruckus on the campus and almost got blasted by Mana into a fate worse than...well, the afterlife.

But Sayo couldn't spend all her time with her newfound friend: after all, everyone needs a little privacy once in a while. So one beautiful Sunday morning in summer, Sayo flied around the sky of Mahora Academy, enjoying the summer colors and all the cheerful faces of the students on campus. During her flight she noticed her teacher, Negi Springfield, who seemed to be making a circle in the dirt right outside the school. Intrigued by her teacher's behavior, she decided to swoop down and see what he was up to.

Soon after swopping down to her teacher's eye level, she decided to hover above the dirt circle. At this time she was unaware that her teacher was already casting the growth spell, proceeding to enchant the incantation of "Increseco Tantus" while she continued to stare at the ground, even placing her ghostly hand on the dirt to pick up the little rock (despite being a ghost and not being able to pick it up).

A few moments later Sayo was about 20 feet in the sky, wondering how she got up there. Perhaps it was another barrier that blocked out ghosts and the like, and she was blown away? That's what Sayo thought, until she looked below her and noticed she had legs! Even more so, she noticed how far she now was from the ground....she was now a 25-foot tall ghost girl! Sayo started to get nervous, and proceeded to cry almost immediately following the discovery of her growth.

"What's happened to me!?" the scared ghost girl cried, hoping that Kazumi heard her and could possibly get her to ask Negi for help. As for Negi himself, he had left shortly after her growth, sad that the rock did not grow like he expected it to. Sayo was crying tears down her eyes like they were water faucets...but who hears her cries for help?
13333222222221.title: Sayo the Giantess Ghost

choices: Sayo waits for Kazumi and Negi to return
Sayo heads off on her own
133332222222211.content:
As Sayo worried and walked, she found Kazumi not too far away in the distance, about 100 feet or so away from her current location. Although Sayo was a ghost and couldn't hurt or interact with most of the people in Mahora, much less touch most anything there, she proceeded with care to tiptoe through the surrounding area, being as quiet and slow as she could possibly be.

When Sayo did finally ctach up to Kazumi, she quickly tapped her shoulder. Kazumi well then and there who was it behind her...she could tell Sayo's ghostly trail quite easily. However, when she turned around she was quite surprised by the sight upon her: a giantess Sayo.

"S-S-S-Sayo!", the astonished Kazumi asked, falling butt first on the ground in shock. "What happened to you!?"

"Negi-sensei cast some weird spell and I grew really big", the scared giantess cried, wiping the tears off her eyes as she did so. "And now I can't even fly since my legs grew when I did. And I also can't leave the school grounds because of the curse I have on me. Oh Kazumi-san, what should I do!?" The scared girl then proceeded to lay down on her stomach on the ground, looking at Kazumi in freight of her smaller environment.

"D-D-Don't worry, Sayo", Kazumi replied to her friend, now standing up once again. "Negi-kun can fix this, I'm sure of it! You wait here and I'll go get him."

"O-O-Okay", Sayo replied meekly. "I'll wait here, Kazumi-san. P-p-please hurry!"

Kazumi then proceeded to run around Mahora looking for Negi. Although happy that Kazumi decided to help her, Sayo wondered to herself if he could even fix her predicament, or even make it worse.

"I don't want to trouble anyone", a sad Sayo said to herself, proceeding to cry once again. "Perhaps I should leave and hide somewhere else.."
133332222222211.title: Sayo finds Kazumi

choices: She continues to walk on her own
She decides to go back to Mahora Academy
1333322222222112.content:
Sayo decided it was for the best if the rest of the student body at Mahora, as well as her teacher, did not find out about her growth. So she decided to walk away from the school as far out she could until a barrier prevented her from leaving the surrounding area.

But 10 minutes into her walking, Sayo noticed something. Now more than 4,000 feet away from Mahora Academy, Sayo hadn't once felt a barrier or anything of that sort in her travels. She decided to continue another 15 minutes to see if anything happened, but she didn't, and now she was almost 2 miles away from the school.

"I guess the barrier has no effect on my new size", Sayo smiled a little to herself. "Well, I guess one good thing came out of this ordeal. But now what do I do?"

Sayo was unsure of what she could do. Now that she could travel anywhere she wanted, the giantess ghost girl could finally see the sights and sounds of the world she couldn't see during her 60 year confinement at Mahora Academy. But at the same time she felt sad that she more or less lied to Kazumi when she told her to stay still unril she came back with Negi.

"I have to think about what's best for everyone", Sayo said to herself, placing her hands on her chest and thinking in thought.
1333322222222112.title: Sayo's solo travel

13333222222221121.content:
Sayo decided to continue her journey across the world. Now that she longer had limits, the giantess ghost girl was free to travel where ever she went. And she did so. From Europe, to the United States, to Africa, Sayo saw all the sights and sounds of the world and was never once spotted by anyone. In fact, it was at Africa that she heard of a shaman who had the ability to see ghosts and even possibly revive them from the dead! Sayo quickly hurried to the location of this shaman, who was often seen on Mount Kenya, which was located in the country of, well, Kenya.

"This is great!" Sayo smiled to herself. "I've been traveling the world for months and never thought I'd never hear of such a thing. Perhaps I can be made human again and reverse this curse!" As the excited ghost girl ran to Mount Kenya from her current destination in Nairobi, Kenya (which wasn't too far from Mount Kenya), though, she stopped and talked to herself.

"But will talking to him really fix this?" Sayo nervously asked herself, looking at her legs below her. "It's possible nothing could happen, or worse." As Sayo slowly walked to the mountain she thought to herself whether or not to go through with proceeding up Mount Kenya.
13333222222221121.title: Sayo's World Tour

133332222222211212.content:
At the end Sayo proceeded to Mount Kenya, staring at its massive size from below and feeling a little scared by its intimidating height. That's the problem with not having legs for 60 years: it makes it very difficult to climb up places. As Sayo lost her ability to fly when she grew, the giantess ghost girl had a difficult time working her way up the mountain. Although her legs were long enough to climb as high as 10 or even 15 feet in a single step, Sayo's natural clumsiness prevented her from going very far. To her it was like going one step forward and two steps back. After over 2 hours of struggling, Sayo only made it roughly one-tenth up the mountain, and she saw no sign of the shaman anywhere.

"Oh, I'm so useless", Sayo sighed sadly to herself. As the ghost girl continued to mentally beat herself up, she felt herself inching upwards to the sky.

"But I'm sitting down", the ghost girl slowly said to herself, unaware that she was growing for the first time in months. All of a sudden the mountain didn't look quite so big as Sayo grew from 25 feet to an extremely generous 200 feet tall! To say that the once mini-giantess was scared would be an understatement: Sayo proceeded to cry once again. But it didn't last long, as the giantess ghost girl decided to use her newfound height to scale the mountain faster. Surely now it would be easier for her to find the shaman, right?
133332222222211212.title: Climbing up the mountain

choices: She grows bigger as she ponders on what to do next
1333322222222112122.content:
Sayo was now two-fifths up the mountain and she saw no sign of the shaman, much less anyone else. The giantess ghost wondered if perhaps he wasn't even on the mountain at all? It was slowly getting dark, and at night it would be quite difficult to find him. At about the 55% mark Sayo proceeded to rest, saddened by her development.

"I'm thousands of miles away from my friends, my only savior is nowhere in sight, and now I'm a giant freak", Sayo cried to herself as she saw the sky increasingly turned orange. It also seemed to her as if she was inching upwards again, causing the girl to flail her arms in worry. Sayo watched as she ballooned in height from an already tall 200 feet to a gigantic 500 feet! Her footing on the mountain was coming off, and Sayo saw herself slowly falling down the mountain. As the worried giantess clenched on to a rock, she started to freak out again, and once again found herself getting bigger...now she was growing to an even bigger 600 feet! She found herself unable to even grab the biggest of rocks with her hands: they felt like mere pebbles in her hands. Sayo then fell down the mountain again, this time to the very bottom of the mountain.

Sayo proceeded to cry as she fell back first down the mountain, her progress all for nought. As she continued to cry she didn't feel notice herself growing ever bigger, this time to an amazing 1,000 feet! When Sayo did finally open her eyes, she was surprised by the huge difference between her and the mountain! It barely looked higher than a very large building to the thousand foot tall giantess. But Sayo was still frustrated by both her new height and her failure to find who she was looking for.
1333322222222112122.title: Growing anxiety

13333222222221121221.content:
As Sayo wondered what to do with her current situation, she felt herself growing even taller, quietly squeaking "not again" to herself as she found herself growing yet again. Already almost one-twelfth the size of Mount Kenya, the giantess ghost girl's growth continue to escalate in size, and within seconds she was now almost 1,500 feet tall! As Sayo tried to hold this idea of growing in, she felt another surge in her body, and this time it made her grow to a staggering 2,000 feet tall! Now nearly one-sixth the size of the mountain, the colossal sized Sayo walked in a circle around the mountain area to see if anywhere was near by. To her surprise she did see someone at the bottom of the mountain area: she found the shaman! His skin was black, as was his hair, and he wore a casual looking white shirt and beige pants. If Sayo didn't know any better, she would have mistaken the man for a tourist. Luckily for her she remembered his picture from an earlier source she looked up.

"Excuse me, Mister, but could you help me?" Sayo asked the man in the cutesiest, most pathetic voice she could muster up. The shaman, who at the moment was about to start climbing the mountain, turned his head back to see the massive ghost girl before his eyes! But does he see her, or only sense her presence?
13333222222221121221.title: Shaman found!

choices: "I can't really do this. I could cause trouble. I'll stay like this!"
"Maybe Negi sensei has found a shrinking spell. This could still work!"
133332222222211212212.content:
"Hmm. that's got to be the biggest ghost i've ever seen." He looked at Sayo who was still looking teary eyed.
"You mean... Then... you Can see me?"
"Oh yes. I can see you as clearly as the sun sees the Earth."
"YES!" Sayo yelped exitedly. "Then can you help me."
"What do you need help with?"
"Well I have heard that you can return ghosts to their normal human bodies and well, I wanted to be alive again."
"I can help you. But. I would need the help of a mage. In order for the ritual to work I need someone whom I can channel magic through."
"I know a mage! He is, er, was my middle school teacher"
"Perfect! However. You must know that you will now shrink down. Your body is gone so I will need to make a new one to accomidate your massive spirit. Just as you can't fit a boulder into a grain of sand, you can't put a large spirit into a tiny body." Sayo sighed. Maybe she should just stay like this. Dead and big, or Alive and big?
133332222222211212212.title: The shaman can see Sayo

choices: Negi gathers some of his students to come with him
1333322222222112122122.content:
"Maybe Negi-sensei found a shrinking spell by now", Sayo thought to herself out loud. "If he did, maybe he can fix this."

"Perhaps, but where exactly does your teacher live?" the shaman asked the ghost girl, who froze in sight when he asked him this.

"Um...Japan..", Sayo nervously replied, lowering in head in response to his question. "That's not going to be much help, is it?"

"I'm afraid not. I'm a shaman, not a teleporting service. But if you can retrieve him and come back, I can perhaps still help you. It shouldn't nearly as long for you to get over here now as you were when you were originally..." the shaman paused as he fully looked at the 2,000 ghost girl in front of him. He didn't realize just quite how big he was. "Just how tall WERE you, originally? I doubt you've always been quite this big."

"About 4 foot 11", Sayo replied as she stood on her butt on the ground to see the man better. "At first I grew to 25 feet tall, then 200, then I ballooned near this mountain until I was 2,000 feet tall!"

"That's amazing. You're the biggest ghost I've ever seen..anyway, bring back your teacher and we'll fix this mess."

"OK", Sayo smiled for the first time since her growth spurts began, running as fast as she could back to her native Japan. It would take her quite a while to get there: Sayo was lucky the first time because she was able to obtain rides on cruises and trains, taking advantage of her ghostly nature. Now the giantess would have to travel on her own.

After about 3 weeks of traveling through a combination of walking, crossing oceans, and riding planes and such (the ghost girl did not gain weight when she grew, so she could still attach herself to smaller things easily), Sayo finally arrived at Mahora academy. She could sense great change in the academy: all her school mates were now in their final year of middle school, and one student (Chao) seemed to have left the school completely. It was a bright Sunday morning, not too different from when she first grew. Sayo quickly spotted Negi sitting on a bench near a building, reading his new third-year roster.

"Some things never change", he smiled to himself as he read through his schedule, no different from last year. The only exceptions were Chao and, of course, Sayo. Negi sighed as he looked at Sayo's picture.

"Where on Earth did she go, anyw..." Negi began until he saw the enormous ghost girl before his eyes. Sayo was still under the assumption that Negi couldn't see her when he actually could, and Negi proceeded to scream at her intimidating size.

"Negi-sensei!! Can you see me!?" Sayo quickly asked.

"Y-y-y-yes I can. I've d-developed my m-magic in great detail over the last several m-months, so now I can see y-you as clear as day."

"I'm so happy to hear that", Sayo cheered out loud, so happy that tears were rolling down her eyes. She then explained to Negi the events that happened to her over the last 7 or so months.

"Wow, that's quite something. So you want me to travel to Africa to help you?"

"Please, Negi-sensei. If you don't help me, I'll just continue to get bigger and bigger until I'm taller than Earth", Sayo whimpered, growing to a bigger 2,200 feet before his eyes!

"All r-right, Sayo-san. I'll help you!"

"Thank you, sensei!! I promise I'll make this up to you somehow!"
1333322222222112122122.title: Find Negi!

13333222222221121221221.content:
"B-before we go I think we should tell someone about this. We can't just go on our own", Negi said to Sayo.

"Yes, you're right. But who can we ask? Almost no one can see me and I doubt that the few who can will go to Africa just to help me." Sayo started to cry again now on her knees in front of Negi. "Negi-sensei, I'm so scared. I don't want to be bigger than the earth!"

"It's O.K., Sayo-chan. I'll do what ever it takes to fix this. Now come on we have to find Asuna-san and the others", Negi said confidently. She looked down at him through her tears. and because he was so small it was hard to tell that he was showing her a soft, reassuring smile. However, she caught a glimpse of it and pulled herself together.

"A-alright. But where are they?"
13333222222221121221221.title: The student gathering

13333222222222.content: Running low on somewhat established characters. Well, how about Misa, Madoka, and Sakurako, aka the cheerleader girls?
13333222222222.title: Misa, Madoka, and Sakurako?

133332222222221.content: Do they grow one at a time, or all at once?
133332222222221.title: Three big girls (choices)

13333222222222111.content:
14 year-old Mahora Academy student and cheerleader Sakurako Shiina was waiting right near the school gates on a beautiful Sunday morning, waiting for fellow friends Misa or Madoka to pick up the message she left them on their cell phones minutes ago. The three were supposed to head out to get breakfast before hanging out, and the three were supposed to meet up at 9:00 a.m. But now it was 9:06 a.m., and Sakurako hadn't heard from them yet.

"Good thing I brought something just in case", the energetic cheerleader said to herself, taking out an apple and biting happily on it. "I still wish they'd show up, though."

As Sakurakobit happily into her apple, she saw her teacher Negi Springfield, dressed in teacher attire, in the distance. He was about 40 or 50 feet away, and he looked like he was about to say something.

"Oh,what the heck", Sakurako smiled to herself. "I probably have plenty of time before they show up." With that, she ran straight up to Negi, who stopped what he was doing to notice her.

"Good morning, Negi-kun", she smiled as she ran up to him, almost right to his face, startling the boy teacher a little.

"Why, good morning, Sakurako-san", he smiled in reply. "Were you waiting for someone?"

"Yeah...Misa and Madoka", she replied, sighing. "We were supposed to meet up today and hang out, but they're late. Anyway, what are you doing?"

"Oh....me?" Negi began, startled. "Oh...nothing."

"What's with the circle?" she wondered, staring in the circle of dirt next to them. "Are you summoning something?" Then Sakurako paused for a bit, and smacked her head.

"Oh! I get it!", she said outloud with confidence. "This is for a play or movie! What's it about?"

"Well...it's about a giant rock", he nervously half-lied to the girl, feeling ashamed of himself for doing such a thing. "And....it grows and grows and they can't stop it. I was going to try out the, er, 'special effects'."

"Ooh, I wanna see", Sakurako smiled, running right behind Negi. "Don't let me stop you!"

"Alright then", Negi replied, proceeding to put his staff up in the air. Perhaps if Sakurako wasn't aware he was doing magic, he wouldn't get chastised for it. With that, he proceeded to chant the magic words.

"Incresco Tantus!"

And with that, the pebble in the dirt began to grow bigger and bigger, up to at least 2 feet or so, when..."

"Wow! That looks neat", smiled Sakurako, who stepped closer and closer to the glowing, growing rock. "I wonder how you did th...AHHH!" Sakurako was then struck by the blue light, but only for a few seconds. At the end the pebble grew to 3 feet in height, and Sakurako collapsed on her legs on the ground, rubbing her hands on her stomach as if she just a tommyache.

"I don't feel right, Negi-kun", Sakurako sadly sighed, then proceeded to stare straight in her teacher's face. "Do I look okay?"

Negi couldn't reply because of he shocked he was by what was happening to Sakurako. Her hair was growing at a rapid rate, as were her hands and head. Since Sakurako was rubbing her eyes she didn't notice the effects, including the then growth of her arms, stomach, butt, legs, and finally her feet. In a process of about 20 seconds the average-sized cheerleader was now the tallest ever alive at 25 feet tall!

Sakurako had finally stopped rubbing her eyes and proceeding to stand up straight on her feet. Then she noticed the noticeably smaller trees and nearby buildings, able to see as high as the 6th floor in some of them. Sakurako was confused, unaware that she had grown into a giantess. Then she looked at the smaller Negi right blow her.

"Wow!" she smiled in delight. "A real-life replica set of Mahora Academy! I didn't know this movie was about a giantess", she added, winking to her teacher from above.

"Um...yeah. That's what it is", nerviously responded Negi. He had no idea how to tell her she had grown five timer her original height. What was a teacher to do? By this point Misa and Madoka had finally shown up at the front gate, only to notice the giantess cheerleader in the distance...how do they respond?
13333222222222111.title: Energetic Cheerleader Giantess

13333222222222112.content: Then who grows first: Misa or Madoka?
13333222222222112.title: Misa or Madoka?

133332222222222.content: Ako (note: may contain spoilers for the much later chapters of the manga)?
133332222222222.title: Ako??

1333322222222221.content:
"Hmmm...Nagi-san...", Ako said, fantasizing over Negi's older persona once again as she took a long, early morning walk. "I wonder how he is doing back in Whales." As she walked through a large clearing she notice her young teacher, Negi. "Hmm? Oh I got It! I'll ask Negi-kun for his address so I can write him a letter!" She then sprinted to her teacher. But just as she reached him, she was enveloped by a shroud of bright blue light that came from the circle beneath her.

"W-what is this?!" Ako asked herself in shock. As the light faded, Negi opened his eyes and saw his student kneeling before him, clutching her stomach.

"Ako-san! Oh no! This is really bad!" a worried Negi said outloud. He bent down to tend to her, only to be struck by her head as it almost tripled in size, as did the rest of her body, knocking the child teacher into the air. Ako then opened her eyes as the pain in her mid-section passed, finding herself holding Negi in her palm.

"W-w-what happened just now!?" she asked her teacher, who was rubbing his head.

"Well you got caught up in a.... in a... a growth spell...", Negi replied hesitantly.

"A-a-a growth spell?", a very frightened Ako asked her teacher.

"Yes. I'm a mage, and you got trapped in my growth spell. I'm really sorry, Ako-san."

"You're a mage?!" Ako asked, appalled.

"Yes, I'm sorry I have never told you. I haven't told nearly half the class this, actually. It's a very big secret that mustn't get out, less I be turned into an ermine", Negi explained to his student as he cringed.

"An ermine? Wow, isn't that a little...harsh?" Ako inquired.

"It's one of the worst punishments a mage can suffer. So please don't tell anyone about this", Negi pleaded.

"Don't worry sensei, I won't", Ako promised, much more confident about her height, which was roughly 30 meters tall now. "Well, sensei...now what should we do?"
1333322222222221.title: One Big Bass Player

choices: Negi is interrupted before he can finish his sentence
13333222222222211.content:
Aside from when he was "Nagi", Negi hadn't really talked to Ako much since he became her teacher. As the gentle giantess placed her teacher on her left shoulder, Negi felt increasingly calmer about the recent growth his student had succumbed to. The two decided to walk into a nearby grass clearing, and Ako slowly placed Negi down on the ground. Having earlier packed a lunch for her that day, Ako decided to eat it now despite being morning still. Her increased size also brought an increased appetite, and as she proceeded to quickly eat the meal she had made she felt hungry still. But right now she couldn't simply head back to campus...that would be absurd. Instead, Ako used this time to get to know her teacher better.

"Negi-sensei, feel free to ask me about anything you want", Ako told her teacher as she smiled at him. "Anything at all. I don't care!"

"Well..if I remember correctly...you play in a band, right?" Negi asked his student, who looked a little shocked by that knowledge he had. "What kind of songs do you play?"

"Oh...um...some rock, some ballads..", Ako shyly told her teacher. "I can get quite nervous on stage easily at times."

"Don't we all?" Negi giggled. "Now you know how I feel teaching a class of girls several years my senior. Every DAY it feels like I'm playing a concert...only this one involving literature and knowledge, not music. Do you also sing, Ako-san?"

"Yep", Ako nodded.

"Are you good? What do you sound like?" an increasingly inquisitive Negi asked Ako, who felt like she was being put on the spot. Negi knew this, however, and then proceeded to stop asking her questions. He knew part of the reason that she was trying her hardest as of late was because of his "older counterpart" Nagi, and Negi thought it was about time he told her the truth about him.

"Ako-san...you know who Nagi is, right?"

"Yes, yes I do! He's your handsome, kind older cousin. What about him?" a brightly smiling Ako asked her teacher, her face directly staring at his, almost close enough to kiss the young boy.

"Well...there's something you should know about him..."

"What's that? Is he going to visit campus soon? Are you two gonna hang out soon? What? Please tell me!" Ako pleaded with her teacher.

"Well...to tell you the truth, Nagi and I are..."
13333222222222211.title: A talk between teacher and student

choices: Ako wants to spend more time with Negi
Ako wants to cure her increasing height
133332222222222111.content:
"Nagi and I are one and the same", Negi told his student point blank. Ako, of course, didn't believe him. In fact, she laughed at the idea that her teacher could be the same boy she had a crush on since the Mahora Festival.

"No way! You two look nothing alike!", Ako continued, looking at Negi with a disbelieving expression. To prove his point, though, Negi got out one of the age-changing candies that he had previously used at the festival earlier and quickly swallowed it down. Within a flash the once 10 year-old teacher was now the tall, skinny, good-looking 15 year-old boy that Ako had earlier come to have a crush on. The expression on her face was nothing short of total shock.

"W-w-what!?" Ako asked herself as she banged her head into a nearby tree. "I can't believe I've fallen in love with a 10 year-old!!"

"Ako-san, calm down!!", Negi attempted to comfort his giantess student. "I'm sorry I didn't tell you earlier..."

"Well, I wish you told me earlier still, Negi-kun...now I feel really silly", Ako said to herself as she cried a little. "I must be the stupidest girl in Mahora Academy for falling for a little kid. Though come to think of it..I always thought 'Nagi' looked kind of familiar. Like that of a person watching over me from afar or something."

"So it wasn't love you felt, Ako-san?" Negi asked his troubled student as she inched ever closer to her teacher, placing the boy on her lap and playfully stroking his hair.

"Maybe, maybe not. Maybe it was just me being a young fool in love. I won't deny that I'm a little downtrodden by the news you brought me, but I'm also glad you came out and told me the truth. Thank you, Negi-kun." And with that, Ako picked up Negi and proceeded to give the boy a kiss on the lips, shortly growing afterwards to a noticeably bigger 50 meters.

"The ten year-old Negi-kun is cool, too", she smiled at the boy as she then proceeded to hug him, growing ever further to 60 meters in height. Although glad that she was happy again, Negi was beginning to worry about his student's increasing size..
133332222222222111.title: The truth hurts..

choices: Ako ends up forming a pact
Ako cancels the pact seconds before it's made
1333322222222221112.content:
Still a little shocked by the news of Negi being Nagi and vice-versa earlier, Ako still felt a little awkward around her teacher, despite just telling him she was oaky with what happened. As the growing giantess proceeded to follow her teacher to find a cure, they were soon spotted by a familiar, white animal..

"Chamo-kun!" Negi observed. "What are you doing here!?"

"Looking for you, bro. You weren't in bed when I woke up, so I came to see what was up."

"So...I guess you know about the 60 meter tall Ako walking behind me, huh?" he whispered to the ermine, pointing to the very tall girl in question.

"What are you talking about? Are you referring to Iz-zu-zu-zu..........!"

Chamo was at a loss of words. Such a towering figure of cute before him made it hard for him to control his male hormones. But more important than that, think of how much money a Pactio with a girl that big could bring him!

"Bro, you have to make a pact with her! Now!" Chamo splurted out at a feverish pace.

"But Chamo-kun, I need to fix this!"

"Um.....excuse me, Negi-kun, but what's going on? What are you talking to that hamster?" Ako slowly asked, sitting on her knees to get a closer look at the ermine on the ground below, sitting on a tree stump.

"I'm bro's partner in magic. Together we've activated several Pactios with the power of a girl's kiss."

"A girl's kiss!?" Ako blushed, unsure of what that meant. "What do you mean by that?"

"Well, I create a circle, Negi kisses a girl, and voila! The girl gets a card and a special power for doing so."

"I-I'm still confused, Chabo...Kabu...Kobo..."

"Chamo. The name's Chamo."

"I'm still confused, Chamo-kun. Negi-kun, could you explain it better to me?"

"I sure would, Ako-san. You see...."

Negi then proceeded to tell his student how he already made pacts with several of the girls in his class, and how as a result they've helped him inch ever closer to his goal of finding his father, the Thousand Master, as well as become a Magister Magi (Master Mage).

"So you say that if I kiss you, we can form a pact, and I'll gain magic abilities?" Ako carefully asked, still trying to follow everything she was being told.

"Right", nodded Negi. "You don't have to if you don't want to."

"No, I want to!" forcefully replied Ako. "Negi-kun, let's form a Pactio!"

"Well, if you're okay with it. Chamo-kun, you know what to do!"

"Right!"

Within seconds a circle appeared below the feet of both Negi and the 60-meter tall Ako. Slowly but assuringly she pressed her lips closer and closer to her teacher, still thinking of Nagi as she did so.

Do it, Izumi-san! Kiss me!

It was only then that Ako began to have second thoughts of the whole thing. She debated to herself that it might help her overcome her growing dilemma. However, at the same time she felt extremely awkward kissing a 10 year-old boy about something she wasn't sure would even work, much less benefit her.
1333322222222221112.title: Spotted by Chamo!

choices: Negi got too close to Ako. Time to try those nursing skills!
Negi was flying in the air on his staff, safe and sound
13333222222222211121.content:
After debating it on and off for a while, Ako decided to form the pactio at the end, gently kissing Negi right on his lips. Her tall height, however, made this far more difficult to accomplish than she expected, being careful not to inhale her own teacher with her breathing in and out of her mouth. At least that's what she worried would happen.

Soon enough the pactio ended, and Ako found herself with a card with her own name and image on it. She was confused as to what she was supposed to do next.

"Um.....now what, Negi-sensei?"

"Say 'Adeat', Ako-san. That should bring forth your artifact."

"All right, then", the worried giantess said in a meek tone as she held up the card in her left hand and said "Adeat" out loud! And before she could anything else, Ako found herself carrying a 40-meter tall syringe in her hands, and was also donning a pink nurse uniform. The sight of this, of course, made Chamo very happy.

"Um...why am I holding this!? What's going on, Negi-kun!? And why am I dressed in a pink nurse uniform!?"

"That's weird. Usually the artifact corresponds to something the student I make a pact with does. Do you work at a hospital by any chance, Ako-san?"

"Well, yes. I work as a nursing assistant, though I'm very squeamish around blood.."

"Oh, me too! But I had no idea you were in training for such a career. I figured that..well..you just played in a band."

"Oh, that's just for fun! I don't expect to get big while being in the band.."

Negi noticed something afoot the second Ako uttered the word "big" from her mouth..she seemed to be getting bigger again. She didn't seem to notice as she grew to 70 meters tall, though, until she reached the peak of her recent growth.

"Negi-kun? Where did you go?" a confused Ako asked as she turned her head to the ground, looking around for her teacher. She then paused for a moment and worried that she might have sat on him as she grew, unaware while still talking to him.
