"Negi-sensei!! Negi-sensei!?! NEGI-SENSEI!!??" she continued to yell as she searched the ground below her, hoping that the young teacher was alright..
13333222222222211121.title: Hello, gigantic nurse!

choices: Ako tries to make herself shrink
Ako tests out her abilities on something else first
133332222222222111211.content:
Although a nursing assisstant for several months, Ako was unsure of how to handle her somewhat squashed teacher. Although very alive and well, it seems that Negi was more or less paralyzed from the waist down, accidentally squashed by her huge legs. He tried not to show the pain, but that just made Ako all the more frustrated. She gently placed Negi on the ground as she wondered what to do next.

"Think back to your training, Ako", she tried telling herself as she continued to mumble under her breath. "But wait...come to think of it, is my syringe the only thing that could heal him?"

Ako then proceeded to look at the 47 meter tall nursing tool in front of her, its tip almost, if not taller, than her teacher's head.

"Negi-sensei said that I have magical healing abilities in this form...I hope he's correct."

Reluctantly but assuringly, Ako very, very gently turned her teacher on his backside and took out the syringe. She then very slowly placed the tip of the needle onto his back, slowly injecting him with a tiny bit of fluids in his body. Ako then soon put away the syringe and waited for any results to follow up. When two minutes went by, with no sign at all of Negi getting better, Ako started to cry big tears from her eyes.

It was during this crying that Negi finally started to move, fully recovered from earlier. He tried to tell Ako this bit of good news, but the crying giantess couldn't hear him through the hands in front of her face. When she did finally let them go, though, she saw a happy Negi jokingly dance for her to show that his legs were healed. She then flashed the brightest smile he had possibly ever seen from any of his students (with the possible exceptions of Ayaka and Makie).

"Sensei, I'm so glad you're back to normal. You were right; I DO have healing abilities!" the delighted Ako smiled at her teacher.

"And very good ones at that, Ako-san!" he chimed.

"Hmm...I wonder if it's possible to inject myself and see if I can shrink myself back to my original size? I'm not quite sure what else my syringe can do, honestly."

"I'd be careful about that, Ako-san. Maybe you should try something else first before you do that.."

"Maybe..but I'm not comfortable being a 70-meter tall girl in a pink nurse uniform. I just want to return to normal and get something to eat and go to sleep...despite being so early in the morning, it already feels like it was so much longer."
133332222222222111211.title: Nurse Ako at your service!

choices: Ako returns to her original size
Ako stops at barely one-sixth her original size
1333322222222221112111.content:
Ako proceeded to ponder more and more about her current dilemma of being 70 meters tall, making a pact with her teacher, and of healing her hurt teacher. The pessimistic giantess felt only shame about almost seriously injuring her teacher, thinking that it was the opposite of a healer.

"I can't continue to be big like this!!" Ako yelled outloud as she injected herself with the contents of her syringe into her left arm, hoping that something good would happen to her. Like with Negi's healing before, the result wasn't instantaneous...she found herself waiting for almost 3 minutes before something happened.

"Ako-san, don't beat yourself up!!" encouraged Negi as he flew on his broom in front of her face. "I know you can do it if you believe in yourself! That's the greatest magic of all!"

"Thanks, Negi-kun", she half-hearetedly replied as she decided to concentrate on returning to normal size, feeling a warmth around her similar to when she grew for the first time. Was it working?
1333322222222221112111.title: The healing hands of a giantess??

13333222222222211121111.content:
As she gently injected herself with her own syringe, Ako watched as she shrunk smaller and smaller in scope until she was her normal size again. She then hugged her teacher in gratitude for giving her the faith she needed to restore herself to her original height.

"Thanks so much, Negi-kun. Both for these powers and for believing in me!" Ako nearly cried as she continued to hug her teacher, causing Negi to blush and for Chamo to attempt to join in as well (though he was tossed aside back to the ground by Ako as he attempted to get closer to her).

"Ako-san, you know..I can erase your memories of this incident if you want me to..", Negi suggested to her student.

"No, it's okay. I already promised I wouldn't tell. Maybe one day I could even grow again to help out around the community."

"You mean like a giantess goddess who surveys the land and heals people with her magic abilities? Like a gigantic Sailor Mo...Lunar...Luna...oh, I always forget the name of that show!"

"It's 'Sailor Moon', Negi-kun", Ako corrected her teacher as he playfully scuffed up his hair with her left hand. "And yes, I guess it would be kind of like that, only without bad guys or transformation sequences or dressing up in embarrassing, rainbow colored skirts."

"Well, if you really want to, Ako-san, you can I suppose. But...just not right now."

"I understand. Perhaps some day my powers of this Pactio thing will prove useful to you", said Ako as she nodded a couple of times before heading off. Negi watched as Chamo counted up the money he had just earned for the Pactio earlier, hoping for Negi to initiate another one soon.

"Nooooo thanks!" sighed Negi. "I've had about all I can take concerning Pactios for a while!"
13333222222222211121111.title: The end of Nurse Ako...for now.

133332222222222112.content:
"Nagi and I are....", Negi began to say.

"Are what, Negi-kun?" Ako asked, rather irritated by his delayed response. But just as Negi was about to tell her, a loud yell captured the two's attention.

"What was that!?" Negi yelped.

"I'm not sure, Negi-kun. It was sure loud, though", Ako replied. After she said that, a rustle in a small groove caught their attentions again. Through the bushes emerged a figure who's presence brought happiness to Ako's face and a drop in Negi's jaw. Though it was not his father they saw, but his older persona Nagi!

"B-b-b-but how is this possible! I'm Nagi! How can there be two of me!?" Negi yelled, bewildered.

"Nagi-san! It's so good to see you!" Ako chirped, forgetting about the size difference between the two of them.

"Hello, Ako-san", Nagi replied. "Negi-kun, would you mind coming down here?" Negi stumbled down to him and got up right in his face.

"Alright. Who are you?!" he whispered to Nagi, making sure Ako didn't hear.

"Relax, Negi-kun. It's me, Kotarou!" "Nagi" told him.

"WAH!! WHAT!?" Negi shouted. "How are you, you, me, who, GAH!"

"Negi...this is a ninjutsu I picked up from Kaede-neesan. I'll act as Nagi so you don't have to worry about hurting Ako-san's feelings", Kotarou said with a grin. "And it'll be extra training for me."

"Oh...Alright, I see. Well Ako-san," he said turning to his enormous student, "Here he is! Surprise!"

"Hooray! Nagi-san IS here!" she chirped. "What should we do!?"
133332222222222112.title: Nagi?!

choices: No, stay small.... er tall but.... what ever.
13333222222222221.content:
Natsumi Murakami was a normal girl. She didn't know anything about her teacher being a mage (or that half her class knew about it). She was just your typical run-of-the mill, red headed girl. She really despised her freckles but there was nothing she could do.

One day as she was on a walk through the huge Mahora campus, she unknowingly strode into Negi's magic circle. Since her head was down in worry (she worries a LOT), she could not see her teacher starting the spell. She sure felt it, though. A moment later she was wrapped in an intense blue light that radiated around her and even through her.

She felt a warm sensation that can only be explained as drinking hot chocolate, coffee, or tea that has been warmed to the exact right heat on a cold day. She felt her body give way and stretch out. It continued to stretch until it stopped abruptly and she opened her eyes and lifted her head. She saw a tree about her height directly in front of her.

"What happened?" she asked herself. "There aren't any trees at Mahora that are my height. Unless they just planted a new one or something." She felt a slight tap on her knee. She looked down to see her teacher. From where she was he only came up to the top of her shin.

"WAHH!! L-l-l-little Negi-sensei!" she screamed.

"Natsumi-san, please be quiet. If someone hears you we will both get in trouble', Negi said in a tone only slightly more level-headed than his freaked out giantess student. "Please sit down so no one sees you." His pupil began to sink to her knees and weep into her hands. Negi walked up to her and patted her head.

"Natsumi-san, please don't cry. This is my fault", Negi said, trying to comfort the giantess.

"Sensei's fault? B-b-but how can that be?" she sniffed in-between tears.

"Well, I'm.... kind of a mage", Negi explained hesitantly. "I casted a growth spell and you stepped into the magic circle."

"A-a growth spell?" she said, wiping the tears away from her face. "So that's what happened?"

"Yes, I'm very sorr-hmph!" Negi started to say before he received a large hug from the giantess.

"Thank you, Negi-sensei!" she chirped happily. "Now that I'm big, I'm not scared of things so much."

"W-what? You aren't mad about this? I accidentally made you 20 meters tall!" Negi said, appalled at his student's reaction.

"Of course not, silly! I might have been scared for a second, but I'm not mad at all! But we SHOULD find a way to fix this."

"You're right. But do you think I should make you a little bigger? I mean it could be dangerous. We might need it", Negi asked, worried about what was going to happen next. What should they do?
13333222222222221.title: Bigger Freckles = Bigger Problems

133332222222222211.content:
“If it’s alright with you, Natsumi-san, I’m going to make you bigger”, Negi told his student, hoping she was okay with the news.

“Sure thing, Negi-kun! Just don’t make too big to not see you”, teased Natsumi, playfully sticking her tongue out at her young teacher. And with that Negi decided to make another circle in the dirt around the 20 meter tall Natsumi, once again performing the incantation. The already tall giantess noticed her body growing ever further from the ground, with even the tallest trees on campus grounds looking like mere shrubs to her growing stature. Within moments she grew from 20 meters to an even more impressive 100 meters.

“Wow, everything’s so small”, a shocked Natsumi said to herself as she lifted her teacher to his face level. “I hope I’m not scaring you, Negi-kun.”

“Don’t worry, Natsumi-san! You’re doing fine. Can you still hear ME?” Negi shouted to his student into her left ear.

“It’s a little harder now, but I can still hear you, Negi-kun”, Natsumi smiled in reply, placing her teacher on the top of her head. “Please hold on to my hair, teacher.”

“Okay. But now what, Natsumi-san?”

“Hmm…..”, pandered Natsumi. “You think Kotarou-kun would know anything about this? He knows magic, too.”

“Perhaps”, Negi added to his student’s suggestion. “You’re too big to fit into any building now, so it’s either him or we ask Evangeline-san or someone else who knows high-level magic.”

“Well, you’re the teacher and I your student, Negi-kun. You make the choice!” reminded Natsumi, smiling at the end of her sentence.
133332222222222211.title: Broadening Natsumi’s horizons

1333322222222222112.content: Both Negi and Natsumi thought to see Kotarou, but Natsumi told Negi that she would embarrassed if he saw her at her new height. "I'll never hear the end of it!" she whined to her teacher. Negi understood and tried to come up with another idea. As they did, though, they saw someone coming towards them. It was..
1333322222222222112.title: Finding the right person to talk to

13333222222222222.content: Chizuru would probably make a gentle, motherly giantess, more so than most of Negi's class. How about going with her?
13333222222222222.title: Chizuru?

choices: I guess just showing them would be ok.
133332222222222221.content:
Chizuru was walking happily to her dorms after doing some grocery shopping when she stopped. She had noticed something was amiss and she turned around to see something that brought tears to her eyes. It was Negi, her child teacher, who up until now was so adult-like and mature beyond his years, was playing in the dirt. She ran up to him and hugged him, smothering the boy in her breasts.

"Negi-kun! It's good to see you playing like a normal child should!" she said resting her chin on the top of his head and smiling. "I was worried that you might grow up too fast and miss your childhood fun!" Negi pulled away from his student just before the blue light of his spell enveloped her body.

"Uh oh. Chizuru-san, get out of there!" Hh screamed to his student. She couldn't hear him. She was over come by what was surely the greatest feeling she had ever experienced. She felt her body loosen up and stretch out. Her body as a whole was overpowered by a warm sensation that loosened her up even more. Her eyes were comfortably closed until the feelings stopped abruptly and she felt the chill of the early Sunday morning air sweep across her.

"Brrr...it's really cold, sensei", Chizuru said her teacher, her eyes still closed. But when she finally opened them her teacher was nowhere to be found. She looked in all directions before feeling something very small crawling onto her left knee. She looked down and was shocked at what she saw. It was Negi! Her teacher was now roughly the size of a watch to her.

"Negi-kun. Y-y-you shank!" she said, beginning to panic while picking Negi up and thrusting him to her chest.

"Well, no I didn't, Chizuru-san. Well you, umm...how can I explain this? You kinda, well, grew", Negi stuttered.

"What!? But h-how is that even possible?" she said, surprised. Negi went on to tell her his connection with magic. Once he was done Chizuru had grown from about 30 meters to a staggering 100 meters into the open skies above Mahora.

"So you're a mage, am I correct Negi-kun?" He nodded. "Then you can fix this... right?"

"Well, I would need a little time but I'm sure I can fin-" he started before he was cut off as Chizuru's chest enveloped, this time instead of just his head, his whole form.

"You're just TOO cute! And a mage no less! I knew there was more to you than just being a genius Negi-kun. I just KNEW!" she chirped as she removed Negi from between her giant breasts.

"Chizuru-san. We have to get you back to normal or something very bad will happen to me", Negi said, worried.

"What kind of bad thing?" She asked looking even more worried than him.

"For one I'll be turned into an ermine an-" he was again cut off by another trip into his students enormous cleavage.

"No! No one will be turning MY sensei into an ermine! I won't allow it!" she said removing Negi yet again, this time placing him on her lap. "As long as no one sees you and we get this fixed we don't have to worry about that." Negi grimaced. "We really should be getting to Master (Evangeline) to ask her about this", he told his student.

"I understand, but...Negi-kun. Could we please show Natsumi, Ayaka, and Kotarou-kun this?" she asked the boy, bringing him up to her eye level.

"I d-d-don't think that's such a good idea."

"Please, Negi-kun", she pleaded with a kicked puppy look that would put any plush doll to shame.

"Well uhh..." Negi thought over to himself. What should he do?
133332222222222221.title: Chizuru's Motherly Rampage.

1333322222222222211.content:
"Chizuru-san", Negi said, managing to tear away from her gaze. "It's not a good idea to show off. There are certain people that know about me, but the majority of people don't know I'm a mage. It would be better if we just went to see Master Eva."

"Alright, Negi-kun. Hey...wait a minute. Why do we have to see Evangeline? And why are you calling her Master?" Chizuru asked with a worried stare.

"Because she's teaching me and requires me to call her 'Master', Negi explained as Chizuru stuck out her tongue in disgust. "And we should see her because she's Magister Magi (or great mage). She has had many years more experience than I have."

"How's that, Negi-kun? You both look the same age."

"Well she is actually ma~~any years older than anyone in the class. Even older than Takamichi."

"Really? That's strange. Is she immortal or something?" Chizuru wondered out loud.

"Well yeah. She's a vampire", Negi said casually before finding himself buried deep inside Chizuru's breasts yet again. From where he was he could see the bottom of Chizuru's chin and some of her hair. He could also hear her heart beat and hear her breathing as she exhaled and inhaled.

"Negi-kun! We're not going to get help from a vampire! She might suck out all of your blood or hypnotize you into killing someone or... or...we just aren't doing it! As long as I'm this size, you're staying with me and not going to be drained by a ugly vampire!" Chizuru ranted.

"But Chizuru-san. How am I supposed to fix this if I can't ask Master for help?" Negi faintly whined as he wondered what to do about his current situation. But then he remembered two other people who knew, telling his student, "Oh wait a second. I think I can ask two people right now."

"Who?"

"Well, I can ask..."
1333322222222222211.title: No More Master.

choices: No, everyone was training. Negi, you has some spalaining to do!
Yes, all alone. Peace and quiet. Hehe..not for long
13333222222222222111.content:
Just as Negi said the name "Albireo-san", there was a loud crashing noise. Both Negi and Chizuru turned around to see a figure in a white jacket floating next to a large tree.

"Negi-kun! What have I told you to call me?!" said the cloaked figure.

"Ah, I mean Colonel Sanders-san! I'm sorry", Negi corrected himself.

"That's better. Now, what did you need me for?" he asked curiously. Negi stood on his student's giant hand dumbfounded.

"How could you NOT know?! My student is giant and you want to know what I want from you?!" Negi shouted. After taking his hood off, Albireo observed Negi's giant companion.

"Hmm. She is rather big, isn't she? Soooo.... what is it you need?" he asked, smiling. Negi looked at him with his mouth wide open.

Is he always this dumb? Negi thought to himself. After collecting himself, Negi explained everything to the colonel.

"You're in quite a predicament. aren't you?" he said as Negi, teary eyed, nodded in agreement. "Lucky for you I know a shrinking spell! DECRESCO TANTUS!!"

Chizuru felt the same tingly feeling as when she grew the first time. This time, however, her body was tightening up instead. Her arms and legs were being pulled back in, as well as the rest of her body. By the time the process was done she was on the ground in a not particularly comfortable position, rubbing her eyes.

"Ch-Chizu-Chizuru-san!" Negi stuttered. She finally opened her eyes to see a giant hand descending on her.

"Ahh!" she screamed and slapped it away in response.

"Ouch! Chizuru-san, that hurt!" Negi said, picking up his now tiny student. "Colonel-san, you shrank her! You made it WORSE, not better!"

"Sorry Negi-kun!" he said before he disappeared.

"Grr!" Negi growled. He looked down at his small student whimpering in his hand and calmed down a bit. "Chizuru-san, we will just have to find a way to get you back to normal ourselves.

"B-b-but who will we talk to now?" she cried.

"We have to see Master now."

"Negi-kun, no! I don't want her to hurt you! Y-y-y-you can't!"

"Chizuru-san, I want to fix this mess and Master is the only one I can turn to. I just remembered Takamichi is overseas again so I can't go to him." Noticing that she no longer had the ability to stop him, Chizuru backed down.

"Alright. But promise me that if she starts to hurt you, you will get away from her."

"Alright, Chizuru-san. She should be in her Villa, if I'm correct."

Negi walked with Chizuru clinging to his shoulder. When they finally reached the cottage, they went in and headed straight for the little glass dome. But would the two be alone with Evangeline, or was there company?
13333222222222222111.title: Kentucky Fried Chizuru

choices: They go unconscious and Negi doesn't tell them anything.
They stare wide-eyed until Negi explains.
1333322222222222212.content:
Negi found it incredibly hard to resist Chizuru's giant puppy dog eyes. He finally caved in and stood on Chizuru's lap (Which was harder than resisting her look considering he kept slipping on her skirt.)

"Alright." He sighed. "We can show class rep and Natsumi-chan."

"Yay! Wait... what about Kotarou-kun?" She asked.

"Oh him? Well he already knows." Negi replied

"What?!" She shouted. "I welcome him into my dorm as well as my heart and he keeps a secret like this from me?" Negi began to explain to her before she shushed him. "What a good boy Kotarou-kun is. Keeping a secret like that all to protect you!"

"Yeah he is a pretty good friend to have." Negi said as he received a small kiss from Chizuru's massive lips.

"Well anyway let's go find Ayaka and co. 'kay Negi-kun?" She said with a smile.

"Y-yes lets go." He said. He looked frightened as the hand below him fell away as he was carried by the scruff of his shirt to the giantess' dorm room. She plopped him on her hand and lowered him down to her dorm window. She gently tapped it until Ayaka came to it to see Negi suspended in mid-air.

"N-N-Negi-sensei! How are you floating?!" She stammered as Natsumi and Kotarou came to the window with her.

"Negi/-kun!" Both Kotarou and Natsumi yelled. It took them a while to see he was not floating, but standing. Standing on an enormous hand so delicate it could only belong to one person. Chizuru. All at once they looked out the window higher to see their giant roommate waving to them. They waved back,stunned at their friends height, but then what happened?
1333322222222222212.title: Show and tell. Negi's secret revealed!

choices: Negi explains what happened to Natsumi and Kotarou
Chizuru askes Negi to make Natsumi and Kotarou bigger before he can explain
13333222222222222121.content:
Before Negi could explain anything to Natsumi and Kotarou, the sight of the giantess Chizuru caused both of them to pass out in shock.

"Heck, if it were ME seeing this for the first time, I would've done the same", Negi told his giantess student as he looked at the unconscious Kotarou and Natsumi on the ground.

"They'll get used to it", Chizuru giggled to herself as she picked up the two roommates of hers in her arms and put them in her shirt pocket. "We'd better hurry before someone sees, Negi-kun."

"You're not going to get Natsumi-san and Kotarou involved with this growth thing, are you, Chizuru-san?"

"Would that be such a bad thing?" his student smiled in reply to his question. "Think of all the neat things that could be done with the power of growth."

"Maybe, but remember when you grew to triple your size after you grew the first time? I'm worried that if you get any bigger, you may outgrow Mahora Academy itself. You'd be too small to see Natsumi-san and Kotarou, much less protect them."

"You're right, sensei! Now I know what I must do."

"You do, Chizuru-san? I'm glad to hear it.."

"Yep!! I'll make Kotarou-kun and Natsumi bigger."

Negi froze in silence as to what his student just told him. If Chizuru already grew to nearly 100 meters in height, he could only wonder what would happen to Kotarou and Natsumi. Even worse was that Negi had no choice in the matter. Although Chizuru was a very nice giantess, she had a way to manipulate her child teacher. It's hard to say "no" to such a sad, distraught face from a pretty girl like the face Chizuru used earlier.

Chizuru soon left the campus, which wasn't so hard for her to do at her new height, covering ground up to 60 times faster than when she was at her original height. The 100 meter tall giantess stopped at a lake, gently putting Negi, Natsumi, and Kotarou down on the ground, the latter two finally waking up from earlier, only to see the giant face of Chizuru smile down on them.

"Chizu-nee!! What happened to you!?" a freaked out Natsumi asked her friend, tears of shock running down her face. Kotarou, meanwhile, was just plain shocked, the hairs on the top of his head standing up in surprised shock.

"Good morning, you two! Ready to get big like me?" the happy giantess asked the two playfully.

"Big?" Natsumi asked her friend. "How did you get big in the first place?"
13333222222222222121.title: Culture Shock

133332222222222221211.content:
Finally snapping out of his trance, Kotarou looked up at his humongous friend. His brain slowly started to function again as it took in the sight of Chizuru's hand descending upon him. She gently picked him up and he saw Negi looking worried on his student's right shoulder.

"N-N-NEGI!!!!! THIS IS YOUR F-F-FAULT ISN'T IT?!!" Kotarou screamed at the other boy. Chizuru picked Negi and Natsumi up and placed the two of them (and Kotarou) on her lap.

"Negi-kun? How can he be responsible for this?" Natsumi asked, confused.

"Because Negi-kun is a mage, Natsumi-chan!" chirped her giant friend. Natsumi simply stood there, looking back and forth between Negi and her huge roommate.

"She's right and so is Kotarou. I'm a mage, and I did cause this", Negi said, a sad smile on his face.

"But why, Negi?" both his student and friend asked.

"It was an accident", Negi muffled. As Negi explained the story and then again for Natsumi, who couldn't believe that her teacher was a mage, he was surprised at how much his student understood.

"Negi-kun", Chizuru jokingly said as sternly as she could without laughing. "It's time to make them big."

"All right", he said as he and the others were placed on the ground where he began to draw a magic circle. "Here goes", he said as he repeated the spell. The growth occurred almost immediately after his incantation of the spell. But how tall do Natsumi and Kotarou grow?
133332222222222221211.title: Bigger, Badder, Best Buds

133332222222222221212.content:
Before Natsumi and Kotarou could further question Chizuru's new height, Negi started to make a circle in the dirt around the two. They could only help but look as the young mage finished making the circle, then lifting up his staff in front of them, facing the two. Needless to say, Natsumi and Kotarou were confused as to what was going on.

"Negi-kun, if you may?" jokingly commanded Chizuru to her teacher, who only nodded in reply as the two watched Natsumi and Kotarou glow in a bright, light blue color.

"Incresco Tantus!" Negi then shouted out loud as a bright flash of light went to and enveloped both of Chizuru's roommates. They felt very warm as the growth slowly proceeded to take effect, like they were wrapped up in a blanket. Natsumi's growth was starting much faster and in much bigger spurts than Kotarou's, and within seconds she was at a height of around 25 meters. Her growth was soon followed after by Kotarou's, who stopped at about 20 meters.

"Negi, you shrunk!" an astonished Kotarou exclaimed.

"Why is everything so much smaller?" a worried Natsumi added quickly after him. "What's going on?!"

"Um....you grew", Negi told them point blank. Natsumi looked quite upset about this shocking revelation, though Kotarou not so much. In fact, he seemed to find it to be pretty neat. Chizuru, meanwhile, simply smiled at the height of her new friends.

"Aw, you two make such cute mini-giants", Chizuru squealed happily as she hugged both Kotarou and Natsumi between her rather large chest. "It's like hugging human plush dolls."

"Chizu-nee, please stop", Natsumi suggested to her very tall friend, finding it very hard to breath with her face smothered in her chest. She then asked her friend, "How did we fix this?" Chizuru, however, simply replied, "I don't know", causing Natsumi to quickly grab her teacher and shake him rapidly, making Negi very dizzy.

"Negi-kun, please fix this", a worried Natsumi asked of her teacher. "I don't want to be the size of a building!"

"Well, I COULD try a reversal spell by replacing the Latin word for 'Increase' with that of 'Decrease', but I don't know if that would work.

"I don't care. Please fix this!"

"Well, what about Kotaro? Should I get him involved as well?"

"No thanks, Negi. I like being big", Kotarou smiled to his friend before being hugged once again by Chizuru. Before Negi could do anything about it, though..
133332222222222221212.title: Friends grow together

133332222222222222.content: Now here come the girls of the series overshadowed by most of the cast. First up is Yotsuba.
133332222222222222.title: Yotsuba??

choices: Negi gets the food and makes the ingredients and supplies bigger for Yotsuba
Negi cooks while Yotsuba supervises/helps him
1333322222222222221.content:
(The orginial idea for this chapter was done by story contributor Sarlen Raine. I will finish it up for him/her as the momentous 150th chapter of this story! Thanks so much for the addition over the last several months!)

Satsuki Yotsuba (though she was usually referred to by her last name) was walking along the pathway that lead from the dorms to the gather ingrediants for a special meal. Being a chef at heart, she knew that thinking with her slightly plump stomach was the way to go. She had a very specific list and she knew just where to go. As she strolled down the sidewalk she noticed her teacher, Negi, with his hands raised and his eyes closed. She approached him slowly, not wanting to disturb him. Just as she got close enough to touch his shoulder a shot of blue light from the tip of his staff shot through her.

"Ah!" Yotsuba yelped, confused by the light that shot through her, closing her eyes from its brightness. She then touched her body to see if anything happened to her. It didn't hurt, though she was greatly confused by what just happened.

"Negi-sensei...what were you doing?" she politely asked her teacher as he started to sweat fairly big drops from his face.

"Um....Satsuki-san...well, um...I hate to tell you this, but...?"

"But what?" she innocently smiled at her teacher, unaware of the growth currently happening to her, slowly developing her body in size, now at the 7 foot mark! Negi wanted to tell his student of her growing development, but he was too shocked by what he saw.

"Sensei, is there something wrong with me? Do I have something on my face?" Now at the 11 foot mark, Yotsuba slowly noticed that she was growing. She didn't panic, though, much to a bewildered Negi.

"Satsuki-san, um....you're growing.."

"Hmm? You're silly, sensei. I know I'm a growing girl, but.."

"No, as in you're growing really big! You're over 15 feet tall!"

"Huh?" a baffled Yotsuba said to herself again, standing back-to-back alongside her teacher. He was right; she was growing! And getting bigger, now at the 25 foot mark!

"Um...Satsuki-san, I should tell something that you may or may not have already figured out. I'm a mage.."

"A mage!?" a shocked Yotsuba, now over 35 feet tall, asked her teacher. "Is that why I'm growing?"

"Yes, I'm afraid. And if anyone found out about this, I'd be stripped of my powers and turned into an ermine. Also, I don't even know how big you're going to get. I wouldn't be surprised if you were upset right now..."

Negi was too afraid to look at his growing student in the eye after having spilled the beans on his being a mage, not noticing her growing to 60 feet tall. He did feel something, though; her growing hands grabbing hold of him!

"Please don't hurt me, Satsuki-san!" Negi screamed, fearing the worst. He then heard loud laughter coming out of the cheerful, growing cook as she patted him on the head with her left hand.

"Negi-sensei, I'm not mad at you! An I'm glad you told me the truth." And with that Yotsuba hugged in her arms as she finally stopped growing at the height of 120 feet tall, surprising even herself when she noticed the change around her.

"Wow! Everything seems so small now.."

"Satsuki-san, it's a little late to ask, but why were you out here today?"

"Oh, I was getting ingredients to cook something, but it doesn't look I can do that now that I'm so big."

"That's not true! I-I can help you!"

"Really, Negi-sensei!? That's so sweet of you!" With that, Satsuki (who was still holding her teacher in her arms from earlier) hugged Negi once again.

"Thanks for being so kind to me over the last few months, Negi-sensei! But how exactly are we going to go about this?"
1333322222222222221.title: Cooking up something big!

1333322222222222222.content: How about the athletic girl, Yuna??
1333322222222222222.title: Yuna??

choices: Nope. She finds Ako and Akira before he can catch up.
Yup. He stops her and they talk.
13333222222222222221.content:
Yuna was sprinting as fast as her long, basketball player legs could carry her. At the same time she was dribbling her basketball even faster. She ran past an empty clearing where she barley saw her teacher, Negi. She stopped abruptly but the ball slipped from her grip, careening towards him at a very high speed. Just as Negi finished the growth spell's incantations, the ball smacked into the back of his head. A flash of light shot from his upraised staff and ran directly through Yuna's torso. She then collapsed on the ground, clutching the area where the light had gone through. Her eyes were tightly closed, so she couldn't see Negi running to her aid. She felt him resting her head on his lap and the icy touch of his hand to her burning forehead.

"N-Negi-kun?" she gasped. "W-what was that light?" Her question resulted in Negi's sighing. How could he explain to his student that he was a mage?

"Well the thing is... I'm a mage", he said reluctantly to his student. As he finished saying this he felt a large weight press against his lap. It was Yuna's head! It was growing so rapidly that he had to lower it as gently as possible to the ground and step away from it, as well as the rest of her growing body.

"Negi-kun!? What's happening?!" she said, frightened by the size difference between her and her teacher. She curled into a ball until she reached what seemed to be her final height of 50 meters. The results left Negi looking at her in awe and shock. She rolled over to look at her tiny teacher and picked him up gently, bringing him up to her face.

"H-h-how did I get this big?" she asked, so confused that Negi could feel her shaking, quivering hands vibrating his body as she asked him.

"Wait..you said you were a mage right?"

Negi nodded to his student in reply, looking ashamed of what he did.

"Th-Then you did this, sensei?" a confused Yuna asked her teacher, inching him a little close to her face. Again Negi nodded in reply, half expecting the worst. Instead, Yuna only kissed him and set him back on the ground.

"What was that!?" Negi yelled. "I make you a giantess and you kiss me?!"

"Mm-hmm", she replied, smiling a bright smile to her "small" teacher. "I've always wanted to be really big! Thank you, sensei! Now I can beat anyone at any sport! HAHAHA!" And with that, Yuna laughed as she ran off to show off her new size.

"YUNA-SAN, WAIT!" Negi yelled. He began to sprint after her, but does he stop her?
13333222222222222221.title: 50 Meters... A Little TOO Big For Basketball

133332222222222222211.content:
Despite his best attempts, Negi found himself short of breath as he tried to catch up to Yuna's far superior running abilities. Not even his staff was fast enough to keep up with her, as he noticed by the attempts he made with it. Once he got close enough to his other students, though, Negi ditched the flying and started to walk at a briskly pace. It seemed to be for naught, though...all of a sudden a smiling Yuna walked back up to Negi, holding Ako and Akira in each of her gigantic hands.

"Yo", Yuna said to her teacher with a monosyllable reply. "What's up?"

"Yuna-san, why are you holding Akira-san and Ako-san in your hands..?" a befuddled Negi asked his giantess student.

"Oh, I was about to challenge them at sports. I want to see how they can measure up against me", she smiled, not noticing how scary and confused Ako and Akira were about the whole thing.

"Negi-kun, what's going on?! Why is Yuna so tall?" Ako was the first to ask, looking scared out of her gourd as she asked him.

"Well....it's kind of complicated. I'll tell you all later..", Negi replied hesitantly, flying up on his staff to see her better, then proceeding to stand next to her. "Are you alright, Ako-san?"

"Yeah, I'm fine, but...I never imagined THIS kind of scenario ever happening to me in my junior high school career. I thought this only happened in the movies."

"I agree. It's quite a surprise", Akira added. Yuna, however, was getting tired of waiting for something to happen, so she placed Negi and both of her friends in her left short pocket and proceeded to walk once again.

"Where are we going?" Negi reluctantly asked his student, feeling every bump and movement Yuna made.

"To play sports!" Yuna replied, not really answering Negi's question. When the four finally stopped, they were...
133332222222222222211.title: Everything's more fun with friends

choices: Negi makes Ako and Akira more focused
Negi makes Ako and Akira grow bigger
1333322222222222222111.content:
Yuna decided to have a friendly, "fair" games of basketball with her friends Ako and Akira, as well as her teacher Negi, who then explained to the confused duo that he was a mage in training and that they needed to be as quiet about this as possible.

"I won't tell, Negi-kun. I promise", swore Ako, placing her hands on top of her teacher's, Akira soon following her lead.

"I promise too, sensei", added Akira. Meanwhile, holding the ball she had earlier prior to her growth, Yuna looked annoyed, waiting for the conversing to end and the ball playing to begin. She decided to play the game 1 vs. 3, with the 50 meter giantess being the obvious 1.

"Whoever scores 10 shots first for their team wins. My basket will be to the left, and yours will be to the right", Yuna explained to the "tiny" people below her feet. "Do you guys want to go first?"

"Yuna-san, this isn't fair! You're so much taller than we are!" Ako told her friend, shouting to her in an attempt to make her opinion more heard.

"What? Do you want to grow bigger as well?" asked Yuna, quieting Ako up pretty quickly, not wanting to grow to a building sized girl herself. And with that silence came Yuna lifting the ball and placing it in her teacher's hands.

"You first, Negi-kun", she told his teacher as he gently patted his head with her right hand.

"But I'm not very good at this game..", Negi told Yuna as Akira blew the whistle, signaling the start of the game. She then took the ball politely from her teacher and proceeded to ran to the left side of the court, hoping to avoid Yuna's long legs and feet. Although a swimmer at heart, Akira was still fairly athletic and agile, and although not as fast as some of the other girls in her class, could still hold her own in a basketball game. Yuna barely moved around the court, instead waiting for the opportunity to grab her friend and take the ball by force. It wasn't any good, though: Akira quickly threw the ball to Ako right after being snatched by the athletic giantess, who proceeded to run as fast as she could and scored the first goal.

"Wow, you guys are better than I thought", Yuna admitted, smiling at the surprising coordination her two fellow students had. "Perhaps you'd like to grow and make this a fairer game?"

"I don't know", Akira pandered. "I don't think I want to grow really big.."

"Neither do I", added Ako, Negi nodding in agreement with her. Yuna was disappointed by this reaction. She wanted to have a really interesting game, and although her friends would soon exhaust themselves to avoid the giantess before them, it wouldn't make for a fun game if she simply took the ball from the tired girls and proceeded to score several shots consecutively in a row.

"Negi-kun, do you know a spell that can make people always full of energy or something similar for long periods of time?" Yuna asked him, holding him in her left hand and placing him at her eye level. "I want this game to be interesting."

"Well, I did once use a spell that made my class more focused. I don't know if it will work in this case, but I could try. Then again, I could...always grow Ako-san and Akira-san..."

"It's up to you, Negi-kun. You're the one with the power here", reminded Yuna. "But I'll be happy with whatever decision you make."
1333322222222222222111.title: "Big" game of basketball

choices: The three giantesses cancel the game and play with Negi
The three giantesses continue the game
13333222222222222221112.content:
"I'll make you two bigger. Is that okay?" Negi asked Ako and Akira.

"I'm a little scared, but I have faith in you, Negi-kun! Fire away!" said Ako.

"I respect your opinion, sensei. Do it!" added Akira.

Within moments both girls shooted up in size. Like with Yuna, their growing wasn't perfect: Ako's hair grew before the rest of her did, and Akira's legs grew before her other body parts. But soon enough they matched Yuna in height, surprising their friend in the process.

"This is great! We're all giantesses!" Yuna exclaimed as she hugged both Akira and Ako. She then looked down at Negi and scooped him up, caressing him in her chest.

"How about you play with me, Negi-kun?" Yuna asked him, winking at the "tiny" teacher. "If we win, I'll give you another kiss!"

"Yuna!" yelled both Akira and Ako.

"Just kidding", said Yuna, a dopey smile planted on her face. She then handed over Negi to Ako, who held Negi in her hands like she was looking at a baby caterpillar.

"N-Negi-kun's so small", noted Akira, who then held Negi in her own hands. "And cute.."

"Very cute!" Ako added, hugging the teacher as she pressed her to her chest. "He's like a little figurine!"

Great. Even my more normal students are acting like this Negi said to himself. He was hoping that, of all his students, Ako would be one of the last to do the "Aww, Negi-kun's so cute" routine. Soon after Akira even joined in, perplexing him even more.
13333222222222222221112.title: Yuna's height disadvantage is going..going..gone!

choices: ..cast a spell on himself, shrinking him to a smaller size to hide somewhere
..attempt shrinking his students back to regular size
133332222222222222211121.content:
"I know! Let' play hide and seek!" Yuna suggested to her friends, a big smile forming her face.

"Sure! That sounds like fun", Ako agreed, Akira nodding her head along with her.

"Okay then! Negi, we'll count to 20 and try to find you", Yuna said to her teacher as she placed him on the ground. All three giantesses then closed their eyes and started counting fairly quickly to 20.

Negi was worried about where to hide. At his height it would be easy for him to concela himsefl from his building-sized students, but he also didn't want them tearing the place apart in the process to find him. As far as he was concerned, even a single tree falling as a result of the giantesses was enough noise for the girls to be caught in the act. Not only would Negi turned into an ermine and stripped of his powers, his giantess students might be used for weird experiments (or worse).

"18...19...20!" all three girls said in unison, slowly opening up their eyes once again.

Negi had to think fast right now! He decided to..
133332222222222222211121.title: Hide and seek with giantesses!

choices: Akira, Ako, and Yuna shrink down to the size of pencils
Akira, Ako, and Yuna grow even taller than they were before!
1333322222222222222111212.content:
Negi decided that the best line of action at this point would be to shrink his students to a more manageable size. He quickly cast the spell he cast before to make them grow, only he replaced "Incresco" with "Decresco", hoping that the change in words would decrease their size. And while it <i>did</i> decrease their size a little, the three would still well over 30 meters tall.

Negi decided to hide in the bushes and try the spell again to shrink them down further. A second incantation resulted in their shrinking down to 18 meters each in size. Akira, Ako, and Yuna were extremely confused why everything was growing around them, wondering if Negi was trying to shrink them back to normal when they were having so much fun with him!

"Good!" Negi proudly said to himself. "One more blast should shrink them down to normal size!"

But before Negi could cast the spell again, something was happening to Akira, Ako, and Yuna just then..

"Guys, I don't feel so good..", Ako whined as she felt dizzy all of a sudden.

"My stomach agrees with that", added Yuna, also feeling a little woozy herself.
1333322222222222222111212.title: Turning the tables around?

choices: Negi shrinks down to their level
Ako, Akira, and Yuna grow back to normal size, but Negi shrinks
13333222222222222221112121.content:
Before Akira, Ako, and Yuna could comment any more of their feeling sick, they notice they were starting to glow once more. The girls watched before them as the environmeent around them grew in size until they reached their original heights.

"Aw man! I was having fun being big!" Yuna sighed. She was about to walk away until she noticed her hands were a lot smaller than usual.

"What the...?! What's wrong with my hands?!"

"My arms are smaller, too!" Ako pointed out.

"My hair is shrinking, and so is my head!" Akira added, and soon enough all three girls knew what was happening; they were shrinking!

The three formers giantesses decided to stick close together as their environment doubled, then tripled, then quadrupled in size before them, stopping only when they got down to the height of a mere 3 inches each.

"Now what do we do?!" Ako wondered, clasping her hand to her throat. "My voice! It's all squeaky!"

"Let me try", said Yuna. "Hey, you're right. It is squeaky. Cool!"

"ARE YOU ALL OKAY?!" a giant voice boomed from above, scaring all three girls. As the three lifted their hands, they found who it was; it was Negi!

"Negi-sensei/kun!" the three girls said with delight as they hugged their teacher's left leg. "Thank goodness you're here!"

"Don't be too happy yet. I'm the reason you're small."

"But..why?" Yuna wondered.

"Well, I didn't want you to cause a ruckus when big. If anything got destroyed I could get fired, even if my secret wasn't blurted out.

"That's okay", said Yuna, understanding as she nodded her head. "We can have fun small, too!"

"Negi-sensei, could you..shrink too? It's a little weird being so tiny compared to you."

"I dunno. I never tried this spell on myself.." grimaced Negi.

"You'll never know until you try", Akira calmly said to her teacher.

"Eh, what the heck?!" Negi decided, pointing on his staff at himself as he began the incantation once more.
13333222222222222221112121.title: Portable-sized sports stars

133332222222222222211121211.content:
Ako, Akira, and Yuna looked on as they saw their young teacher shrink to fit their new size. Negi then looked around at his gigantic surroundings, startld by the new view.

"I-It w-worked..." Negi said in an extremely squeaky voice. "I now regret trying it, but it worked!"

"Yay!" the girls cheered.

"Your voice sounds so funny, Negi-kun!" laughed Yuna.

"I really think we should go back to the dorms", Negi suggested. "That way we'll have a less chance of someone stepping on us."

"What do you mean, Negi-sensei?" Akira asked.

"Yeah! We're perfectly fine here!" Yuna shouted.

"Uh, do you guys hear something?" Ako whimpered.

A loud, booming noise rang through their shrunken ears.

"It sounds like foot steps!" Negi exclaimed. "Everybody, run! Hide!"

Negi ran and waved his arms in panic while Ako, Akira and Yuna look for the source of the sound.

"Hey look!" Ako yelled as she pointed out the strange sound. Everybody, including Negi, looked at where she was pointing.
133332222222222222211121211.title: They All Are Tiny

choices: Find somewhere to stay and grow it to the students' size
13333222222222222221112122.content:
Before Akira, Ako, and Yuna could comment any more of their feeling sick, they notice they were starting to glow once more. The girls watched before them as their feet and legs propelled them high above the ground below, past the trees and even shooting past the highest buildings in Mahora! The three giantesses continued to grow until they were at least 200 meters tall each! Needless to say, this took them some time getting used to..

"Awesome!!!" Yuna responded. "Look at how gigantic we are! We could be like Godzilla!"

"NO!" Ako shriked, how booming voice even reachable to Negi far below. "50 meters was tall enough! This is way too much!"

"Where's Negi-sensei?" wondered Akira, tilting her head down to the ground to find her teacher. She moved some trees around as if they were discarded jigsaw pieces off from the ground to find him, which she eventually did. She picked up the boy very carefully between her thumb and pinky and placed him on her hand, lifting him up to her eye color.

The sight was a lot for Negi to take! He was used to being shorter than his students, but now they were over 700 feet tall! He could feel their breating on him from far away, and their lips were bigger than the boy himself!

"Negi-sensei, I'm scared!" Ako whined, placing her hands on her chest. "We have to get out of here."

"I agree", said Negi, nodding his head. Though he wasn't even sure his students could hear him.

"But where??" Akira wondered. It wouldn't be easy to hide three giantess goddesses now, would it?
13333222222222222221112122.title: The big get bigger!

choices: They go search for the book
133332222222222222211121222.content:
Negi thought for a while to figure out where they could grow, then he realized somewhere; none other then the mountain, so he looked at the three giant teenage girls and said to them,.

"Everybody, we should go to the mountain, so no one would spot you three."

"I agree", Akira replied. Ako and Yuna seconded her motion.

Yuna grabbed Negi and the three girls started to go to the mountain. Hours passed, and when then they reached the mountain, the three girls stopped to get some breath, As they did they felt another sensation, and they grew up to 1,000 feet tall now. Ako and Akira were worried about growing any further, while Yuna were excited and wondering if the growing would keep going. Negi floated on his staff to talk to the girls at their eye level.

"Now what?" Ako asked, worried.

"Well, I'll go back to Mahora to see if I can find the book to cure you three", the young teacher suggested..

"Alright, but please hurry", Akira pleaded.

"Don't worry. I will", Negi promised.

Negi then dashed toward the direction of Mahora. As he was leaving, the three girls were now 1500 foot tall. Negi finally reached Mahora and went directly to Library Island, where he went to look for a book to cure the three giantesses. While looking for the book, he bumped into Library Club members Nodoka and Yue.

"Good morning, Negi-sensei", Nodoka replied, blushing at the sight of her teacher / crush.

"Oh, hello girls", he greeted them.

"What are you searching for?" Yue asked as she sipped on a juice box.

"I'm looking for a book on how to revert a magic spell", the fidgeting teacher replied. "I'm in a bit of a pickle right now.."

"Mayibe we can help", Nodoka suggested.

"That would be great. Thank you very much", Negi said as he bowed.
133332222222222222211121222.title: Giant-sized hiding place

13333222222222222222.content: How about the shy girl from the swimming club, the Makoto-ish looking Akira?
13333222222222222222.title: Akira??

choices: "..no. I'm glad you told me the truth."
"..a little. How am I going to practice my swimming now!?"
133332222222222222221.content:
As Negi prepared his spell, he was interrupted by the arrival of another student of his: Akira. Strolling around on Sunday, wearing a red t-shirt over her two-piece bathing suit, she waved to her teacher mere seconds before the spell went off. Unfortunately she wasn't able to dodge the blast at the end, but it faded to near nothingness before hitting her, so Akira didn't even notice. She thought that light simply got in her eyes as she walked up ever closer to her teacher.

"Good morning, Negi-sensei. What are you doing?" she cheerfully asked her teacher, who at that moment looked quite scared.

"Sensei, I hope I didn't scare you earlier when I said 'Hello'. Are you all right?" a worried Akira asked him, proceeding to hug him.

"No..it's not that..it's just..well..", Negi began in a rushed, hectic manner, knowing full well that the spell was going to grow his 5 foot or so student into a gigantic giantess in a manner of minutes.

"Sensei...what are you trying to say-y-y-y-yyy....!?" Akira asked before the growth spell started coming into effect, first growing her feet by ten times their normal size. Then her legs grew, causing her to grow over 30 feet in size. Next up was her stomach and chest, then her arms, hands, and hair. Lastly was her head, which looked quite awkward in comparison to the rest of her grown body, growing to ten times its regular size like the rest of her. When all was said and done, the somewhat shy swim club member had grown to a staggering height of 50 feet tall!

"Wh-wh-wh-wh-what's h-h-happened to me!?" Akira shyly blurted out, sitting on her knees and looking quite upset. "Sensei...did you do this??"

"Um........maybe", Negi hesitated to reply, fearing the worst of Akira's reaction. Normally she was very gentle and kind, but at this height there was no telling what she could do at her newfound size.

"Akira-san....it's time to tell you what I've told a third of my class already. I'm actually a mage."

"A WHAT!?" a surprised Akira looked in astonishment, sitting down now on the ground on her butt and placing Negi on her lap. "Are y-you serious?"

"Yes I am. Asuna-san and many other of my students already know this. I guess that may explain to you some of the odder events in this school in the past few months.."

"Come to think of it...I always did think there was something different about you, sensei. I just couldn't quite put my finger on it."

"So you're not mad, Akira-san?"

"Well..."
133332222222222222221.title: The swimming giantess

choices: Akira wants to stay big little longer
1333322222222222222212.content:
"I'm glad you told me the truth, Negi-sensei, but...it's going to be quite difficult for me to practice my swimming now at this height.."

"You're right. You're taller than the building itself, much less able to fit into it. Even if you did, you would be almost as long as the pool itself."

"Kinda of like Alice in Wonderland when Alice was in the white rabbit's house", Akira smirked, a little clamer about her current situation. "Well, at least my clothes grew with me."

"Akira-san, I could try to change you back to normal size by reciting the spell and replace Incresco with Decresco, but I don't know if that will work so well. Unless, of course, you're comfortable with your new height.."
1333322222222222222212.title: To fix or not to fix

choices: Akira was blown away a little by the wind
Akira is still there, soon spotted by Negi
13333222222222222222122.content:
Akira quickly decided that being big wasn't something she wanted to continue experimenting with, and she soon clapped her hands together and politely asked Negi to shrink her down to normal size.

He once again made a circle in the dirt and starting holding his staff up in front of him, recanting the spell:

"Decresco Tantus!"

Akira soon found herself glowing like she did before, feeling as if her body was being pushed back into her. Like before, her head was the first to shrink, though it shrunk to more than just one-tenth its regular size..

"What the!?" Akira squeaked, closing her voice in shock. "Negi-sensei, what's going on!?"

"Uh-oh..", Negi gulped as he watched the rest of Akira's once giantess body shrink down to the smaller size of 4 inches in scope. The former giantess was now scared of her much bigger surroundings, including her titan sized teacher.

"Akira-san, are you okay?!" Negi yelled out to her, his voice ringing in her voice like two or three rock concerts going on at once.

"I'm fine. Please don't yell!" she asked of her teacher, covering her ears in reply.

"Oh, this is bad! Really, really bad! But...at least I can hide you now."

"Yeah. Being 4 inches tall doesn't stick out quite as much as being 50 feet tall...", Akira sadly sighed. "But. now everything's so big."

"I see. First you're too big for the pool, now you're too small for it. This is a perplexing dilemma. Akira-san, this is going to sound weird, but..?"

"Yes, sensei?"

"You may be too small to practice in the school pool, but what if I shrunk you down even more so that you could practice swimming in the sink...?"

"Sensei, I don't think that's such a good idea..", Akira squeaked moments before shrinking in size once again, now down to a puny quarter of an inch tall!

"Akira-san!!" Negi whimpered, looking for his tiny student in the grass surroundings around him. Where could she be?
13333222222222222222122.title: To her, the sink is her swimming pool

133332222222222222221221.content:
Quite shocked by her shrunken size once again, Akira had little time to worry about that as she soon found herself swept up in the air by a strong summer breeze. Although only a couple of inches off the ground, to Akira it seemed like several stories! And all she could do was flail her arms and hope to land on something soft upon arriving back on terra firma.

Unfortunately for her, Akira felt straight into the mud, soaking her body from hair to toe. She also found herself spewing out quite a bit of mud as she proceeded to move forward, hoping to rinse her body off with water.

"I seemed to have lost of Negi-sensei now. I should've stayed big..", Akira told herself as she continued to walk pass giant-sized nuts and grass blades, hoping to not get spotted by a bird or an ant or some other animal. She soon enough found a little water puddle to rinse the mud off of her clothes...but several earthworms were in the water as well. Normally tey wouldn't bother Akira, but at her size their grossness factor went up significantly when seen up close.

"Yuck!" a disgusted Akira gagged as she decided to dip her body in the water anyway, soon enough getting somee of the mud off of her. Thankfully she wore her swimsuit, so getting her clothes soaked wasn't quite as bad as it would if she were, say, in her school uniform. After a while of scrubbing with her hands (which, again, grossed Akira out), she proceeded to continue walking around the field, hoping to be spotted by either Negi or another one of her classmates.

Meanwhile, her teacher in question was about to shrink himself and his staff down so as to find Akira, using a mirror to deflect the blast back at him to find her. However, Negi was a shoddy aim when it came to this growing and shrinking stuff, so did it end up shrinking him, or did it end up hitting someone else on the field?
133332222222222222221221.title: Akira and the Blustery Day

1333322222222222222212212.content:
Negi's spell didn't end up shrinking him like it hoped he would. Instead, the spell bounced off the mirror and scattered all across the field, shrinking various flowers, rocks, and insects here and there. Thanfkully Akira was not struck by this blast (she was small enough as it is), but she knew that her teacher was close by when the grass blades only a few feet in front of her were now "normal sized" in comparison to her once again.

It was pretty weird, actually. One square foot everything looked normal sized to Akira, the next she was extremely tiny. It was nothing short of awkward, especially when she found a nearby dog. The dog seemed to be a puppy, barely a couple of months old. It fur was dark brown, its ears short and pointy, and it looked both happy and scared at the same time, wagging its tail happily around Akira while also whimpering. The puppy was about 5 times the size of Akira, but it definitely seemed to have shrunk down in size from the spell. She slowly walked up the to the puppy and reached out her left hand to it, watching as the dog licked her face in response, soaking her whole head, as well as her hair.

Akira then attempted to climb up the shrunken puppy, finding a nearby tree branch and climbing up it. She then slowly made her descent down to the backside of the puppy, thankful for her athletic ability to do so in a time like this. When she got on the puppy, she then climbed up to its head and started rubbing its head with her heads.

"Don't worry. I'll help you find your owner. Do you know where he or she is?" she cutely asked the puppy, who just started walking forward as she asked. Akira was not so sure if the puppy was even listening to her or not, and simply held on to its fur as it began to take move.
1333322222222222222212212.title: Girl meets puppy

13333222222222222222122122.content:
Akira rode on the puppy for what felt like hours to her, watching as it across the field happily, while also at the same time running away from the much bigger predators the 3 inch puppy had to be cautious of. During that time she did not see hide nor hair of anyone from her class, or of her teacher Negi. Akira sighed in frustration as the puppy to a rest at a puddle to drink some of its water. It was at this time that she mounted off the puppy and tried to look at its collar.

A further look on the dog's collar revealed that it was owned by someone named Chihaya Inutsuki. That was not a name that Akira was familiar with, though truth be told she never quite learned all her classmates' names. Akira figured that the owner was probably a girl, considering how young and youthful the happy was. She doubted an adult would buy a newborn puppy unless they bought it for someone or they were taking care of it.

At this time the puppy decided to lay around on the dirt underneath its feet, gathering dust in Akira's direction. As the girl coughed from the dust it was forming, she heard a familiar voice not too far from her. It was Negi! Akira screamed aloud to her teacher, waving her arms in the air jumping as high she could. The puppy also joined in, barking its tiny, high-pitched barks aloud for him to hear. Fortunately he heard the noise and stopped walking mere feet in front of Akira, who sighed in relief that she was able to avoid meeting her teacher's foot. Negi then looked down in the grass below and started feeling the grass underneath him before finally finding Akira, who was knocked down by his left hand's sheer force against her body.

"Be more careful, sensei!" she scolded the boy as he drooped his head and apologized. "Negi-sensei, do you know of a way to make me normal sized again?"

"Well, I could use the spell I used to make you big again, but it may not work..." Negi hadn't yet noticed the small puppy, but he did when he felt something rubbing against his left shoe.

"Negi-sensei, that's a liost dog I found", Akira explained as she climbed up Negi's right pant leg, his shirt, and then all the way up to right in front of his nose. "Could you perhaps make it bigger? I doubt it'll find its owner at this size."

"I agree", Negi nodded, making a fairly big circle in the dirt below and performing the same spell he made Akira grow with earlier that day. At the end it ended up being...
13333222222222222222122122.title: Little lost puppy

133332222222222222221221221.content:
Negi spread his arms as he recited the spell. The puppy barked and ran around, though it did not run out of the circle. As he uttered the final incantation the small dog rolled over and looked expectantly at the child teacher. Slowly but surly the puppy grew. Hair by hair, limb by limb the dog returned to its original stature of just about two feet tall. It yelped as it jumped so high that Negi had to catch it and hold it back to avoid having his face become drenched in the dog's drool.

Akira carefully strolled across Negi's arm and patted the hyperactive little creature on its fury head. "Now you go run along and find your master alright?" she told it with a smile. The puppy wriggled out of Negi's grasp and landed on its feet on the grassy terrain. It then looked back and barked, then continued in running across the field towards where it had no doubt become lost.

"Well, Sensei? Do you think you can repeat your actions?" Akira asked her larger counterpart.

"I think so. But I'm unsure of how large you will become. For all I know you could end up being two feet like that dog, or you could continue growing until you reach giantess status", Negi replied with a grimace. "The chances are unknown to me at the moment."

"Well we should try anyway. Just make sure you stand with your back to the wind so I don't fly off again", said Akira.

"Alright. Here", he said as he placed her in the same circle as the puppy. However, this time he was placing himself between his student and the gusts of the Sunday afternoon as he started the spell again. But does it have any effect on growing humans? Or is it only animals that it has effect on?
133332222222222222221221221.title: Return Forever

choices: They don't, and she finds herself growing/shrinking again in minutes
1333322222222222222212212211.content:
Return of the giantess

Negi decided to form a similar circle to that of the puppy's from earlier, and Akira clapped her hands together and hoped that she would soon find herself growing in size. At first it worked, with Akira inching ever higher to her teacher, even proceeding to hug him once she reached the 5 foot point. However...it didn't stop there.

Still hugging the boy in her arms, Akira found herself shooting higher and higher, her teacher slowly shrinking in her hands. It wasn't too long that she could easily hold her teacher in her arms, then one arm, then finally one hand! Akira was not only a giantess again, but she was even bigger than she was before! She had to be at least 200 feet tall now.

"Negi-sensei..." the girl panicked, slowly placing her teacher back on the ground. "I thought that was going to work, too.."

"So did I", he agreed. "Well, at least no one is around to see us."

"I guess it could've been wors...." Akira started before she felt herself changing in size again. She quickly found herself shooting down to the ground below her, past her teacher in a manner of seconds as she shrunk down to barely up to Negi's feet. A few minutes later she found herself shooting up yet again, this time to 300 feet tall!

"What's happening!?" Akira wondered, tears coming down her eyes. "Why won't it stop?!"

"I'm afraid it might have something to do with the spell. Perhaps it doesn't work on people so well....?"

"Negi-sensei, I thought you would think this a little more carefully", Akira sighed as she shrunk down to 25 feet or so. "Well, come on. We can't hang around here much longer."

"Agreed", her teacher complied, and the two headed off, hoping that Akira's spurts of growing and shrinking would stop for at least a little while..
1333322222222222222212212211.title: Return of the giantess

13333222222222222222122122112.content:
Negi hoped the spurts would stop, but they continued as Akira shrunk again. This time she was an inch tall, then she shot up to 500 foot tall. Negi panicked as sje was getting increasingly scared. Akira then shrunk to 1/4 of an inch, then she grew up to 5000 foot, where she stopped.

"Negi-sensei...." Akira said, with tears flowing from her ears.

"I-I-I'll find a way to cure this!" Negi promised his student. Before he could go, he heard a familiar voice from behind. Negi turned around and saw both Asuna and Konoka; the former frustrated and the latter with a smile on her face.

"Negi-bozu, where were you?!" Asuna asked. "You completely missed breakfast!"

"I..I was.." Negi said, mumbling.

"I told we would see you at the pla-" Asuna started, but she stopped when she noticed something behind Negi. She looked up to see the iantess akira. She fell down, while Konoka was astonished by this.

"Wow, Negi-kun! Did you do this?" konoka asked.

"Y..yes, I did."

"Negi-bozu! why did you do this?" Asuna asked with an annoying frown. "Don't you know how to cure this?"

"I know it..but it needs heavy amounts of concentration."

"Then do it right now!" Asuna replied, slightly angry.

She picked herself up, and Negi was preparing to cure Akira when Konoka came next to him.

"Say, Negi-kun, I have a request."

"Yes, what is it?"

"Will you make Asuna and I bigger?" Konoka seemed really anxious to grow, putting on near fake tears to her teacher.

"What!?" both Asuna and Negi shouted. Asuna's face lit red as she came up next to Konoka.

"Konoka, what are you saying!?"

"Oh come on, Asuna! It might be fun being a giantess!"

"B..but."

"I don't..really mind if they became big.." Akira said.

"See?" konoka said.

Konoka gave Negi a playful wink, while Asune looked at Negi with a little bit of blush on her face.
13333222222222222222122122112.title: Spastic growth/shrink continued

choices: Akira starts to grow on her teacher's lap
1333322222222222222212212212.content:
Unfortunately, luck did not struck twice with the spell for Akira: she was still a quarter of an inch high. Furstrated, Negi sat down on the ground besides his student and began to whimper. However, Akira climbed up the boy's legs and climbed up to straight in his face.

"Negi-sensei, don't feel so bad! This isn't the worst thing that has ever happened to me!" Akira said to her teacher, hoping to calm him down.

"How can you say that, Akira-san? I'm over 200 times your size to you.."

"And I'm not scared one bit! Why? Because I know you can fix this! You're my teacher! You're very smart as well!"

"If I was so smart, you wouldn't be tiny right now.."

"Everyone makes mistakes, sensei! You didn't mean to shrink me to the size of a bug, right?"

"Well, of course I didn't.."

"Don't feel so bad, then! I'll stay with you until you fix this! How's that sound?"

"That sounds like a good idea. Thank you, Akira-san.."

Akira then happily sat on her teacher's lap as she watched the scenery around her. To her it was like watching the view from the top of a canyon or high building, but on her teacher's own legs. Negi slowly calmed down as well as the two felt the light, cool breeze go through their hair.

"I knew the world was a big place, but now it seems ENOMROUS!" giggled Akira as she stretched her body on her teacher's lap. The tired girl then fell asleep on her teacher's lap, yawning loud enough for even Negi to hear beforehand.
1333322222222222222212212212.title: Staying small

13333222222222222222122122122.content:
Moments before Akira fell asleep, she felt her body feeling the same kind of warmth it did when she first started to grow. Just then her head grew to 24 times its size, the rest of her body soon growing along with it. The once quarter of an inch tall student was now 6 inches tall, looking much more relieved with her smaller environment.

"Sensei, you don't suppose there's a time limit on the spell, do you..?" Akira asked Negi.

"Could be. Or maybe it's triggered by something", contemplated the 10 year old teacher.

Akira paused as she wondered what could have made her grow. As she did, she looked at her teacher in the face and smiled at him.

"I have no idea myself what did this. All I know is that despite how chaotic today was, I had fun. It was kind of neat seeing everything so big!"

Akira started to grow again just then, this time her height propelled upwards to 9 inches in height.

"I see!" brainstormed Negi. "Whenever you say something positive about me, you'll grow in size!"

"That's not so hard, Negi-sensei. You're a sweet, kindhearted boy. It's no surprise the other students in my class look up to you!"

Akira then grew to 1'9", her teacher's lap looking much smaller than it was seconds ago.

"I'm glad you feel that way, Akira-san. I like having you as a student as well!"

His student grew once again in size just then, now up to 2'6" in height.

"Thank you, sensei!" the not-so-small Akira said to her teacher, standing up on her two feet in front of him. Negi followed suit, looking like a father in terms of his size.

"I looked up to you before, Negi-sensei, but not like this", Akira said to her teacher as she grew ever taller, now at 3'6". "I wouldn't mind shrinking again, in all honesty."

Akira grew yet again to 4'4", her height almost fully restored. She then ran up to her teacher and gave him a big hug in her arms, their heights equal for a brief moment as she grew to 4'11".

"Thank you for such an interesting day, Negi-sensei!" Akira thanked Negi as she gave him a kiss on the lips, restoring her height completely. It also left Negi flabbergasted (and a little worried if Chamo was there or not).

"Akira-san...I...you...!" Negi tried to reply, but he was silenced by his student's left hand.

"It's okay, Negi-sensei. I won't tell a soul about what happened today! It's your and my little secret!"

Akira winked at her teacher as she ran off to get a shower, her body more than a little dirty from all the running around outside she did today. She also left with a new found appreciation of her teacher, as well as his secret.

And the next time that the pool was closed, Akira would use a bathtub for swim practice. And she wasn't alone then, either.
13333222222222222222122122122.title: Words are the ultimate magic

133332222222222222222.content: What about track and field runner Misora?
133332222222222222222.title: Misora??

1333322222222222222222.content: How about the priestess who's pretty awesome with guns, Mana?
1333322222222222222222.title: Mana??

choices: Mana is calmer and gentler at her new size
Mana is nervous, but she's also very angry about her new size as well
13333222222222222222221.content:
It ended up being Mana Tatsumiya who caught Negi's eye. One of the more reclusive students of his, he seldom talked to her outside of school, though he did remember hanging out with her at the school festival just a little while back (including being surprised by her wielding of guns), and before that helping "reveal" Sayo the ghost girl to both his class and himself. Today she was dressed casually, however, dressed up in a long, black dress that looked quite good on the dark-tanned girl, with matching black boots.

"Negi-sensei, I'm surprised to see you out here so early", she gasped at the sight of her teacher. "What are you doing?"

"Just trying out a spell. Nothing special."

"Really. What kind of spell, may I ask?"

".....a growth spell."

"Hm? Growth??" Mana wondered, stepping closer to her teacher. She then rubbed her chin a little. "Your magic is that powerful, Negi-sensei?"

"Well, I just learned it last night, so I'm going to test it out on this pebble here in the dirt first."

Negi watched as his student proceeded over to the dirt circle and picked up the pebble with her right hand. She then flicked it away from her, causing him to gasp.

"Mana-san, what are you doing!?"

"Negi-sensei, it's dangerous to do this in front of so many people. What don't you try this inside or in the forest?"

"You're right. It was so silly of me", Negi sighed, Mana sighing quickly after him. However, she also patted his head, smiling at the boy as she began to suggest something to him regarding his growth spell.

"I was going to polish my guns today , but you have me intrigued now, Negi-sensei. So why don't we go to the Tatsumiya Shrine? It's usually fairly quiet on Sunday, so we can try it out inside. It won't be too difficult to get in since it belongs to my parents and that I work there."

"Ah! That''s right!" Negi remembered, recalling seeing her dressed up in priestess clothes before. "I recall seeing you there before, Mana-san."

"Well then, let's go!" Mana told her teacher, walking ahead of him. Negi hurried behind her, shouting to her "Wait up, Mana-san!" as he did.

It wasn't too far of a walk away from where they were, thankfully. The Tatsumiya shrine was on the Mahora Academy campus itself, so it wasn't something Negi was unfamiliar with or anything like that. When they finally arrived there, Mana and Negi then headed inside, and Negi made a circle on the ground with chalk instead of dirt, putting another pebble in the center of the circle. Mana stood on the opposite side of the room, watching as Negi lifted his staff in the air and began to recant the incantation:

"Incresco Tantus!"

A flash of light then followed, causing both Negi and Mana to close their eyes due to its intense brightness. When the light finally died down, though, the pebble seemed to be the same size. The child teacher looked upset, the same expression on his face that a kid gets when he barely misses the ice cream truck that passed by his street. Mana came up to the saddened boy and patted him on the back.

"Don't feel too bad, Negi-sensei. One day you'll get it right", she assured her teacher. "Just keep practicing."

"You're right", a more determined Negi replied, pumping his left hand into a fist. "I will get stronger, and one day I will get it to work! Thanks, Mana-san!"

"You're welcome. Ouch!" Mana went, rubbing her head against the top of the ceiling. She then looked down below her, noticing that her legs were over twice their original size.

"M-M-M-Mana-sssss-an...." Negi gasped, stepping back a few steps at the sight of his growing student. Mana quickly crawled on her foot out of the shrine and stood right outside of it, her legs then expanding in size once more. Then her feet grew to compliment them, as did quickly her hair, arms, hands, her stomach, chest, butt, and head. She then surged in growth bit by bit afterwards until she finally stopped at the incredible height of 70 feet!

"Negi-sensei.....! It worked....but...", Mana whimpered, standing on the ground on her butt, her long legs stretched out before her teacher. Even her feet seemed gigantic, with one of her feet being alone taller than Negi himself! She continued to blush red in embarrassment as she wondered what happened, which was a rare emotion for Negi to see from her. Usually Mana was serious and level-headed, but now she was panicky, even nervous at her new giantess height. Is it possible her mood changed when she grew as well?
13333222222222222222221.title: Priestess turned giantess

choices: They grab a bite to eat
133332222222222222222211.content:
"Um....Negi-sensei....", Mana tried to say to each teacher, but she was too freaked out by her height to say anything. She then stood up once again, walking away from the shrine, with Negi running behind her. She was heading away from campus, only finally stopping once she made it to a clearing near a river. She then stood down again on her butt, looking at the river below.

"I'm so sorry, Mana-san!!" Negi profusely apologized as he continuously bowed up and down to his student. "This must affect your entire day's routine! I wouldn't have done this if I kn..."

"Shhhh", commented Mana as she placed with her giant fingers on Negi's mouth. "It's okay. You didn't do this on purpose." She then smiled a warm smile at him, yet another sight Negi seldom saw from her (if ever).

"You seem really different, Mana-san. I thought you would freak out and stomp me for causing this change in you, but you act like nothing happened! I'm confused."
