"Well, sensei, it seems that the spell changes not only a person's height, but also their attitude. At least from what I gathered. I do admit that at first, yes I was quite angry (and scared), but the taller I got the more serene I felt." Mana then hugged her teacher in a warm, soft giantess embrace, growing to a further 80 feet as she did so. "See?"

"Well, I guess so...but I don't know how to reverse this.."

"Take your time! I wasn't planning on anything today aside from polishing my guns", chirped Mana, once again hugging her teacher in a soft embrace. Negi, meanwhile, kept blushing red all through out. "Isn't it a nice day outside, sensei? It's so rare that I get to spend time with you."

"Y-y-yeah", Negi replied, a bit worried about Mana's new height. As she continued to stare at the scenery around her, she grew once more to 90 feet tall.

"Negi-kun, want to hang out somewhere?" she asked him, her voice being a lot more cheerful sounding. Her clothing seemed to have changed as well, going from her long, beautiful black dress to a more casual pink shirt and black, medium-length skirt. Her boots slowly changed into a pair of cute, white sandals as well. Even her hair, when usually went straight down her back, was now in a braided ponytail. It was official: Mana was becoming more playful and acting more like a typical teenage girl before his eyes. She even wore little star earrings on her ears now, as if that wasn't enough of a change already.

"Let's go, Negi-kun!" she playfully demanded her teacher, kissing him on the lips and then scooping him up with her hands, placing the boy on her head. She then grew again to exactly 100 feet tall as she headed off somewhere.
133332222222222222222211.title: A bigger, gentler, and stranger Mana

choices: They head to a local amusement park
They head to a sports field of some sort..
1333322222222222222222111.content:
Since it was still morning, the giant-sized Mana was hungry for breakfast.. So they headed to right outside of the Mahora campus cafeteria. Negi quickly grabbed something to eat from inside, coming back with a few rice balls in his hands. He then grew them with the same spell that made Mana grow, and the cheerful giantess quickly grabbed them (and Negi) and headed back to the clearing she was at earlier. She felt very serene around the water..

"Thank you so much, Negi-kun!" she thanked her teacher, bowing down to him even. "I was getting pretty hungry."

"Your stomach rumbled like a small earthquake", Negi commented, laughing a little bit, soon joined in by Mana.

"It was pretty loud, wasn't it?" she agreed, continuing to eat her giant rice ball (although to her it was a little smaller than a typical rice ball. Fortunately there were 3 of them for her to eat). Once she finished eating them, she then stared at Negi once more. She noticed he had some rice on his face, so she picked some off with her giant left index finger and proceeded to lick it. Negi blushed at the girl's cheerful smile she gave him. There was no doubt that Mana was pretty for a girl her age, but her tall stature made her all the more so. She then laid flat on the ground and turned her head to Negi, looking ready to ask the boy a question.

"Negi-kun....do you like....anyone in particular in our class?"

This question caused Negi to choke on the food he was eating, being saved by Mana's quick reflexes, slapping the boy's back to help him swallow the food down.

"O-o-of course I do! I l-like all my students!" he explained haphazardly to a smiling, giggling Mana, who then placed the boy on her lap facing her face.

"Yes, but...do you like me, in particular? I know I'm the most attentive student in your class, but.."

"Mana-san, I don't think of you any less than I do the students I spend more time with", he explained point blank to his student. He felt very confident about what he said, and he didn't stutter once in that whole sentence. And then suddenly he met with Mana's big, giantess lips, which softly kissed his face.

"You're such a sweet boy, Negi-kun!" she told him growing in size to 120 feet. "That made me very happy to hear you say that."

Before Negi and Mana could continue talking, though, she scooped up the boy once more and placed her on her head again. She then seemed to be moving forward into the forest, soon leaving it and heading constantly north.

"Mana-san, where are we going!?" Negi wondered, holding on tightly to his student's braided hair as they continued to move forward, feeling each step she made on the ground as she did.

"To hang out some more, Negi-kun!" she replied with a grin. "It's only 9:30. Let's spend the whole day together!"
1333322222222222222222111.title: Big breakfast

choices: Mana grows in size just then..
13333222222222222222221111.content:
The two think about their options for a couple of minutes and consider the amusement park.

"The amusement park should be good", suggested Mana. "What do you think?"

Negi ponders over the offer and thinks of both the fun and the foul-ups that could occur. Still, a day at the fair should be a good time, so without further hesitation he said to his giantess student:

"Okay, the park it is."

"Let's go!"

While walking there Negi thinks of the amusement they could have, especially when a 120ft. Mana walks into it. The thought of such an unexpected sight walking up to you would be quite a surprise indeed, which could turn Mana into an amusement herself.

"Negi-sensei, we're almost there", reminded Mana as they approached the gates, now only about 500 feet or so from them.

Negi snaps out of his thoughts and sees the amusement park coming up. They'll be there in a minute. This should be interesting.
13333222222222222222221111.title: Trip to the park and...

choices: Mana shrinks down to ride the coaster
Mana explores the park with Negi at her current size
133332222222222222222211112.content:
Negi noticed something odd about Mana as the two approached ever closer to the amusement park. Not only was she starting to grow again, but it seemed like she was getting smaller in some areas. Her eyes were becoming bigger in proportion to her head, her breasts shrunk in size, and her arms and legs seemed a little smaller overall to her body, and a little chubbier as well. Even her hair was going through some changes, becoming shorter and slightly lighter in color. She looked almost Negi's age now, and the 140 foot tall giantess ran like a shot closer to the park.

"Come on, Negi-kun. I wanna see the sights!" she exclaimed to her teacher in a more childish sounding voice, which had gone up a pitch since earlier. However, when she came up to the gates, she was met with some disappointment...and slowly she walked back to the gates.

"They say I'm too 'big a prop' to enter through", Mana sighed as she sat down on the ground below her. "Mana really wanted to go to the park today, too.."

"Mana-san, it's okay. We'll do something else..."

"No! I want to go the amusement park! Oh how I wish I could shrink in size!"

"Mana-san, you can't shrink yourself...!"

That's what Negi tried to say, anyway. He was quite surprised when he realized that Mana was willing herself to shrink down in size, dwindling down and down before her teacher's eyes. Before Negi went up to the tip of her feet when standing up, but now his student was at a much more manageable level in terms of size. She continued to shrink down until she was only 50 feet tall.

"There! That's better!" Mana gleamed with delight as she grabbed Negi by the hands and raced to the gates again. This time the "robot" and her "operator" were allowed in, and Mana was all smiles about the sights and sounds around her. Candy, rides, games, face paint...she wanted to see it all.

But what really caught Mana's eye was an upside-down roller coaster on the far end of the park. It went up to 90 feet in the air at a speed of at least 60 miles per hour, dropping down to a 80 foot fall before spinning around the rest of the end of the park for the next minute and a half.

"Negi-kun, want to ride that with me?" wondered Mana as she and her teacher went to a nearby ticket booth to buy tickets.

"Mana-san, you're too big..", the child teacher noted, which she wasn't surprised to hear. She was just a few minutes ago even taller than the coaster, so it came to no surprise to her that she couldn't ride it...at least not at her current size.
133332222222222222222211112.title: Bigger...and yet younger too?

choices: Negi and Mana get on with no problem
1333322222222222222222111121.content:
Mana shrunk down to 4'8" in height in order for her to ride the coaster. Upon shrinking, she grabbed Negi's arm and raced for the coaster.

"Negi-kun, you'll pay for my ticket, right?" she cheerfully asked him, winking at him.

"Um..sure", he replied, a grimace on his face. He then thought to himself how fast his paycheck would be used up today.

The line was fairly long for such a popular ride. As they waited, the curious Mana asked Negi,

"Have you ever been on a roller coaster before, Negi-kun?"

"No, I haven't. I always they were kind of scary.."

"Don't be, Negi-kun! They're fun! Just like hanging out with you!"


Negi blushed at his student's quibble, unsure of how to react to her friendly smile. He was so used to Mana being calm, tall, and womanly, so seeing her his age, smiling and wearing such cute clothes, threw him off. It also brought up something else: this was the first time since he left for Japan he was hanging out with a girl his own age. (If Mana did indeed regress in age. It certainly looked like it to him.)


"Negi-kun, what's wrong?" Mana asked, putting her face close to his. "Are you daydreaming?"

"Ahhh, no! I'm fine!" he panicked, a little shy around his cute student. "I just..noticed you look cute today, Mana-san.."

"Thank you!" she replied, giving Negi a quick kiss on the cheek. "You're so sweet. You look nice, too."

"T..thank you.." the flustered boy replied, unable to think straight after the kiss. The line to the coaster was getting shorter for them; they'd be on in 10 more minutes.
1333322222222222222222111121.title: Student and teacher now on (almost) even levels

13333222222222222222222.content: How about Chachamaru's "mother", the scientist girl Satomi?
13333222222222222222222.title: Satomi??

choices: Negi listens to his student, and Satomi grows some more
133332222222222222222221.content:
Negi decided to relocate his spell at the very last second, deciding to get further away from the school, if not off the school grounds. As he was able to stop, though, he noticed a girl walking by. She was a fairly short girl, with black hair in braids and very large glasses on her face, and she was wearing a white lab coat. In her hands were mechanical supplies of some sort. Negi quickly knew who that was right away; one of his students, Satomi! Not only one of the smartest students (if not the smartest) in his class, but in all of Mahora Academy!

"Negi-sensei, good morning!" the excited girl said to her teacher as she stopped in place and slowly walked over. "What are you up to this early in the morning?"

"Well...it's kind of silly. Out of curiosity, Satomi-san, do you think people can grow to bigger sizes?"

"Eh? Sensei, are you okay..?" Satomi looked extremely baffled by her teacher's question.

"It's just an innocent question, Satomi-san. I mean, you made a talking, functional robot who looks and sounds human, so I figured that you maybe.."

"Sensei, I don't believe that humans can grow to giant proportions. That's just silly, especially coming out of you. Do you think they can?"

"O-of course n-not! It was just a simple question.."

Negi attempted his hardest to defend himself from the corner that he put himself at, thinking that Satomi already saw through him. That she hadn't yet asked why he made a circle in the dirt and was wielding a wooden staff in front of her eyes surprised him greatly.

"Negi-sensei, are you hiding something from me?" the curious student asked him as she placed his forehead right next to his. "I don't think the question you asked was simply out of the blue."

"Well...if I tell you, will you promise not to tell anyone? Like, really promise?"

"Of what? That you have magic powers?"

"YOU KNOW!?!? Oh great.."

"Don't worry, sensei. It's not a big deal! Evangeline-san told me from time to time in the past, so don't be too surprised. After all, I AM the one who takes care of her partner Chachamaru."

"Well, that is true. But if you know I have magic abilities, then why do you doubt growing people?"

"Because I do. Besides, I've never heard of such a thing in any of my visits to Library Island, and I've read most every book there."

"That's true. You could give most high school students a run for their money, Satomi-san. Well, if you're still skeptical, I was going to ask if you could witness my growing of this pebble with a spell I recently discovered."

"Discovered....?" Satomi paused, never hearing of such a thing in the very few magic books she ever read.

"Yep. But I'm going to relocate to behind the school, so if you want to check it out, follow me", Negi told his student as he picked up the pebble and brushed off the circle in the dirt with his shoes. Satomi quickly followed behind, like a dog following behind a person with meat in their hands.

--------------------------------

A few minutes later, Negi was in a patch of green scenery not too far from Mahora Academy. Satomi, meanwhile, watched on a log about 15 feet away, looking fairly unimpressed and even yawning in response to what her teacher was about to do.

"Negi-sensei, please hurry this up! I have work to do on Chachamaru!"

"I understand", he quickly blurted in reply, then drawing a circle in the dirt and placing the pebble there once again. He then proceeded to pick up his staff and incant the spell, pointing his staff right at the pebble.

"Incresco Tantus!"

Negi watched as a light blue light shone from his staff and hit the pebble, causing it to slowly grow. Unfortunately, that same blast reflected a little off the pebble and right into Satomi's chest, like an arrow going through her body. It didn't hurt her, and she barely saw the light (as did Negi), but he still felt that something had gone wrong when the spell ended.

"Wow!" the surprised teacher said to himself as he saw the pebble had grown to almost 3 feet tall, almost 30 times its regular size!

"Satomi-san, did you see!? The spell worked..."

"Unh....Negi-sensei, I don't feel so good..."

Negi quickly ran over to his student and proceeded to lift her up from the log, her body feeling as if it was paralyzed to him. It didn't help that she continue to shiver rapidly, and a few seconds later even glowing!

"Satomi-san!!!" he screamed as Satomi closed her eyes and fell stomach first on the ground, heavily panting and sweating. He quickly turned her over and prepared to try to lift her up again, until he noticed something...Satomi was getting bigger!

Very quickly her head and neck grew in spurts of growth until they were a little more than 30 times their original size. Then came her chest, her arms, her hands, stomach, butt, and lastly her legs and feet, all of which also grew to 30 times their size! By the time it was finished, Satomi had grown to a height of exactly 150 feet! And everything, including her glasses, had grown along with her.

It was then that Satomi proceeded to sit up and look at the environment around her, but especially at her teacher.

"S-s-sensei..you were right", Satomi yawned, acting as if she had slept for 10 hours, when she was only out for a few minutes.

"Satomi-san, are you all right? Can you stand up?!"

"I..I think so", Satomi replied, standing straight up, though a little slow at doing so. "Wow! Everything looks so tiny! Including you!"

The new giantess then gave Negi a quick peck on the cheek, both bewildered and happy at the same time by the recent events around her.

"Satomi-san!...", Negi gushed, still shocked by the kiss.

"Negi-sensei! This is the coolest thing ever! Could you possibly make me even bigger!?"

"E-E-E-EH!?!?" Negi was unsure of how to respond!
133332222222222222222221.title: Giantess scientist

1333322222222222222222211.content:
Negi sighed a forced sigh as he decided to make a second circle in the dirt around his giantess student's feet. He mainly did it for two reasons. One, he was afraid Satomi would blab if he didn't listen to her (and considering the height difference now, he didn't like that option). And two, he felt something odd about the grown Satomi. One of the more quiet students of his, he saw this growing of her as his way of spending time of her. A weird way, indeed, but a way nonetheless.

"Incresco Tantus!"

Satomi was all smiles as she felt her body ever expanding in size once again, delighted by the growth of her feet, which slowly crept all the way up to the rest of her growing body until she was an amazing 300 feet tall, twice the size she was before! When the growing was all finished, Satomi proceeded to pick up her teacher once again and kiss him. She had to careful, though, as Negi was a little less than an inch high in scope to her now.

"I feel so...powerful! So big! So wonderful!"

"Satomi-san...you're not going to do anything reckless, are you?"

All Satomi could do was cackle a little at her teacher's reply, placing him in her lab coat pocket as she proceeded further away from Mahora Academy.
1333322222222222222222211.title: The "biggest" discovery in Mahora Academy history

133332222222222222222222.content: Perhaps you like the mysterious, like Zazie? Even 22+ volumes into the manga, we STILL don't know much about her.
133332222222222222222222.title: Zazie Rainyday??

1333322222222222222222221.content:
Zazie Rainyday was a student of few words. She didn't speak in class, much less anywhere else. On the incredibly rare occasions when she {i]did{/i] talk, it was usually a simple one or two word sentence. She was also the class clown...literally. She was a circus performer, and a good one at that. The tattoos on her face shown brightly in the gorgeous sunlight on this fine Sunday morning.

Today Zazie was taking a stroll through the wooded areas within Mahora. Not a lot of people were out, or even awake for that matter, at 9 or 10 o' clock A.M. on a Sunday.
She walked through a clearing where she saw a figure to one side; it was her teacher, Negi. Throughout the entirety of the time he has spent teaching, the two of them had never properly been acquainted. A shadow of a smile touched her tattooed face as she decided that would change as of today. In a few long strides she reached her teacher. She waited for him to open his eyes instead of saying anything to him. A moment later a shroud of light blue light shot up, wrapping itself around her body.

Despite any struggles made (though she made very little), the light would not release its grip on her. After a short while the glow softened and seemed to sink into her skin, leaving her with a feeling of warmth and comfortableness. She looked at her teacher who, for some strange reason, was slowly growing further and further away from her. "Hmm?" she faintly grunted. She looked down at him and noticed that he was small enough for her to pick him up with one hand. Her hand descended on him and lifted him to her still ever increasing eye level.

"Sensei?" Zazie asked her teacher simply.

The sudden change in altitude, as well as the bland remark, were enough to make Negi open his eyes, breaking him off of the concentration of the spell. It also stopped Zazie's growth, which ended at a very tall 50 meters.

"Z-Z-Zazie-san?!" Negi said, appalled.

Giving only a nod in return, Zazie smiled at her teacher.

"ZAZIE-SAN! Oh no! This is bad! If anyone finds out..especially if Asuna-san finds out..I'll be in big trouble!!!" Negi blurted. If not for a finger raised by the giantess student of his asking for silence, Negi's ranting may have lasted for a good hour and a half.

Having seen her peers "handle" Negi gave Zazie a few ideas. First, she hugged her teacher as best she could at her new size. Secondly, she placed him on her lap while gently toying with his hair. Negi was at a loss for words when his student's lips came together to give him a true giantess' kiss. Finally snapping out of his confusion, he looked at his student, who smiled down at him, the first smile she had awarded him since the Mahora Festival.

"Sensei...can we...hang out, today?" she shyly asked, as if she somehow gained the ability to speak aloud. "I can...show you some tricks...I've learned."

She then continued, still adjusting to actually speaking to someone. Negi stood up, looking up from his student's palm about what he should do about this. Well..what SHOULD he do?
1333322222222222222222221.title: An Acrobatic Giantess

1333322222222222222222222.content: One final choice. Perhaps Negi's spell goes SO bad, he makes his entire class grow all at once?
1333322222222222222222222.title: Everyone At Once!

choices: Negi explains to his whole class what happened
Negi is interrupted before he can explain
13333222222222222222222221.content:
Much to his surprise, Negi was not interrupted by anyone as he began to perform the spell. He lifted his staff up to his face, holding it right in front of him. He then quietly and slowly began to cant the incantation:

"Incresco Tantus!"

Unfortunately for Negi, the spell did not hit its destination target at all. In fact, it completely missed, and the beams of growth that came from his staff instead hit a nearby window, scattering them into several smaller pieces that rained down on the academy, both outside and even indoors! Needless to say, Negi was quite worried about what just happened. The worried child student then felt a sensation in the ground, almost like an earthquake!

"What's going on!?" Negi asked himself as he shut his eyes in fear for the noise that was being made. He then noticed many of the buildings breaking apart and being completely destroyed, covering the areas in huge clouds of dust. Negi couldn't see or hear what was going on and quickly flew on his staff to avoid breathing in all the dust. It took quite a few minutes for it to clear, but when it did, it revealed something that made the 10 year-old speechless:

His entire class had grown to the size of giantesses!!

Negi noticed before him that all of his students, from Asuna to Zazie Rainyday, had grown in heights ranging from 40 to almost as high as 130 feet tall! Asuna, Konoka, Setsuna, Nodoka, Evangeline, Yue, Haruna, Kaede, Chisame, and Kazumi knew it was clearly Negi, but the rest of the student body were either confused, scared, or annoyed by the recent events.

"Nnnnnnneeeeeeggggggiiiiii!!!" an infuriated Asuna yelled to the heavens, the yell itself causing a gigantic shock wave to Negi as he continued to fly on his room. Asuna was one of the taller girls among the giantesses at about 120 feet tall, and she was one of the most annoyed as well. Negi lowered himself on the ground and proceeded to attempt to get away, but found Asuna quickly catching up to him. Eventually the giantess student catches up to the littler Negi and holds him head up in the palm of her hand, furious as she lifted him up to her eye level.

"Explanation. Now!!" demanded Asuna.
13333222222222222222222221.title: Gonna need a bigger classroom!

choices: Go to the world tree plaza
Go some where out of Mahora
133332222222222222222222212.content:
Ayaka snatched Negi's tiny form away from the raging Asuna before he had a chance to speak.

"And what makes you so sure that our Negi-sensei did this, you monkey? I'm sure there is a completely logical and normal explanation for this."

"How is this NORMAL!" Asuna shouted. Ayaka acknowledged that she had a point.

"There IS an logical explanation for this. R-right sensei?" Ayaka stammered. Negi was frightened out of his mind. He knew most of them would be o.k. if he told them he was a mage, but how would they react when he told them he had caused this? Negi only sat in a fetal position, rocking back and forth in the class rep's massive hand.

"What's wrong with him?" whispered Fukka. Everyone turned to find the to twins, as well as Evangeline, the tallest among the giantess group. Everyone's face went white upon seeing this.

"Cruel irony, it seems", said the 150 foot tall vampire.

"This is what you get for making fun of our height!" yelled Fumika, sticking her tongue out at them. Throughout the confusion Ayaka had not noticed the absence of the mage's group as well as Negi.

A few miles away Asuna was pressing Negi for answers, literally, and not very gently, either. A few jabs of her enormous thumbs knocked the senses back into the minuscule teacher and he began to cry.

"Hey, stop that!" Asuna shouted, coming in for another jab but Setsuna's quick reflexes stopped her.

"Asuna-san, do you understand why sensei is crying right now?" Setsuna calmly asked her friend. "It is because he is a child, you are hitting him mercilessly, and he has made his class into an even more unmanageable size than it first was. No matter how angry you are with him, you must understand what he is going through as well." Asuna stopped and looked at her teacher. He was black and blue with bruises. Realizing that that was her doing, she took him more gently in her palm and apologized.

"Negi, I'm so sorry. I didn't know what was going on and i just lost control. I'm sorry", Asuna said to her teacher. "Now can you please tell us what happened?" After a long moment of silence Asuna looked closer at Negi. Seeing his facial expression she looked up. "Aww man, I did lose it. I knocked him out cold!"

"Well give him to me. I can heal him up and he might wake up faster", Konoka said as Asuna handed his limp body to her. After a quick healing spell Konoka handed Negi back to Asuna. Noticing that he would not wake up today they went back to the regular group, still not realizing that they had gone.

"We should find a place to sleep tonight", Asuna said. "We can find away to reverse this in the morning." Everyone nodded with her. Ayaka, noticing Negi was no longer in her self proclaimed "caring" hands, shot a menacing glance at Asuna. "Don't worry, Ayaka. Negi is already asleep. Now come on, everyone. I have an idea of where to go."
133332222222222222222222212.title: Negi is interrupted before he can explain

choices: They catch him before he turns himself in
They arrive at the same time
1333322222222222222222222121.content:
"The world tree plaza," Ayaka repeated. "You really are an idiot, bells. The world tree is the most populated spot on campus. What possible reason could you have for thinking that we could hide there for the night?!"

"Three reasons", Asuna stated confidently. "One, most of the students and staff are preparing for summer break tomorrow, so not many people will be here to see us or hear us early in the morning. Two, because of the places we all grew, which were all close to the plaza itself, the school will have to close down the plaza for the time being. And three, the plaza is the only place where we can all fit and talk about a way to fix ourselves." For possibly the first time in either of their lives Ayaka couldn't find a hole large enough to shoot Asuna's plan down through. It was a good one and she, as well as everyone in the class, knew it was their best and possibly only bet.

"Fine", a very reluctant Ayaka admitted. "We will stay the night at the plaza." With that the whole class stood and walked the short distance to the world tree ,which they almost could see over the top of, and soon fell fast asleep.

A FEW HOURS LATER

Negi woke up in an incredibly uncomfortable position. Not knowing where he was, he climbed in the position he thought was up. He was beaten up and still badly bruised despite Konoka's healing spell. He soon reached the top of whatever fabric prison he was trapped in to find his entire class sprawled in random places on the ground, their now enormos bodies making slight indentations and cracks in the weakened tiles. Negi looked around at them solemly. He knew that once he told them they would rush to tell someone. Even if it was by accident and even if he did return them to their normal sizes, he realized they would talk. He decided it would be best to tell the proffesionals and turn himself in. He knew what this meant. It meant he was finally giving up. That he was to be an ermine for a few years and after that never be allowed to practice magic ever again. He left a note scratched where it was easy to see. It read:

"To my pupils and friends,

I can't live with the fact that I have done this to you all. Yes, Asuna-san was right. I did cause you all to grow. The reason is something I can't explain in writing but I am pleading that the select few of you that know the reason, share it with the others. I am going to turn myself in so please don't attempt to follow me. A team will be here in a short while to resolve this mess I've created. I won't be seeing any of you for a long time, so I'm very sorry that we had such a short time together. Despite that, I had fun and would like to thank each and every one of you for the help you have given me.
Goodbye, and once again I'm sorry.

Your former teacher,
Negi Springfield"

Each girl cried giant tears after Asuna finished reading, Asuna herself probably crying the most. When a few girls got up the courage to ask Asuna what he meant by 'the reason he couldn't explain', she shook her head slowly in disbelief. Then came a clap on Asuna's shoulder, and she twirled around to stare face to face with the tear-stained swordsman.

"Asuna-san," Setsuna stammered. "I-I-I-I don't c-c-care what he said in that note. We have to find him."

"You're right. Negi wouldn't listen to us if we told him to stay here, so we have to do the same! Who's with me?!" All the girls (even Evangeline) cried 'aye!' to the heavens as they rushed out to find their teacher, turning over every roof and boulder until Evangeline told them that she knew where he went. After feeling a little silly about going hog wild with the search, they followed the vampire soundlessly. But do they arrive in time?
1333322222222222222222222121.title: Hiding in plain sight... And a final good bye?!

13333222222222222222222221211.content:
Negi was walking slowly, dragging his feet, dreading what fate awaited him at his destination. As he neared the large building, currently teaming with the majority of the mage teachers and students, he couldn't keep from collapsing onto his hands and knees, mid-stride, and breaking out into the tears of the frightened child he was.

"I've failed", he said shakely. "Asuna-san, Master, Konoka-san, and Setsuna-san too. Everyone in the class believed in me and now I've failed. I'm sorry everybody...please forgive me."

A hand gentle enough to be a cloud swooped down and picked up the sniveling boy. Negi stared at the girl standing before him and started to cry yet again. Asuna softly patted the top of his head and carefully hugged him close to her crying with him.

"Negi," his student said softly. "Why would you run off like that? If it was my fault please tell me. I know I can get a bit out of control sometimes, but that's just how I am. I don't really mean to hurt you even when it seems like it. You shouldn't be the one to be saying sorry." The giantess hugged him closer and, with tears still rolling down her cheeks, kissed his forehead as best as she could.

"You need to trust us, Negi", She told him in the same soft voice. "I know you thought we would tell, but none of us will. Everyone of us in the class loves you, even those who seem like they don't." Negi knew that she was talking about herself and he finally stood wearily on her palm.

"Asuna-san", he said, drying his face with the back of his sleeve. "Have you told the rest of the class yet?"

"No. I was waiting for you to do it. After all, you're our teacher. So educate us", she added with a smile. Negi then looked to his students and, with Asuna's help, explained what happened, what he had done. To his surprise, not one angry or disapproving face was seen. Once he was done he heard a massive chorus of voices scream out;

"WE LOVE YOU, NEGI-SENSEI!!!"

Negi soon felt the hand underneath him becoming smaller. His platform was shrinking, as was its owner. Soon the other girls began to shrink down as well. At the last second Negi jumped onto Asuna, as she returned to her normal height, hugging her as she twirled around, hugging him back. The other girls took their turns as well of either hugging or kissing their teacher, and he did the same back. Asuna walked over to him once he was finished and she clasped his hand in her own.

"I guess a little love really is the true magic", she said as she kissed his forehead. With that, all of them returned to the campus with their teacher, happy to know that there were all a part of his life

Later that day, Chamo was in Negi's coat, counting all the money he would get if all the girls just decided to make one more kiss with Negi. Asuna threw the small animal out the window of the dorm when he voiced this question aloud.
13333222222222222222222221211.title: The truth in fairytales

choices: tries to find a way to return him to normal.
tries to find a way to fix it, but they can't. (Leads to end of path story.)
13333222222222222222222221212.content:
Negi had tears in his eyes when he entered the large building with the majority of the mage teachers and students. One of them looked over at him.

"Oh hello Negi-kun. Is there something you want?" the teacher asked.

Negi was about to tell him when he felt the ground start to shake. 'They followed me? I told them it's my fault and I will accept the punishment.' Negi thought to himself. He ignored it as he continued, "Yes. I accidentally turned my whole class into giants, exposing magic to the ones in my class that didn't already know," Negi told him.

The teacher was shocked to hear this and he told Negi,

"I'm sorry to hear that...but I'm sure you know what's going to happen. Come."

Negi nodded and they walked towards the backroom.

"Hello. Why did you bring Negi-kun back here?" one of the higher up mages asked. Negi explained to him what happened and the teacher looked at him sadly.

"I know it was an accident, but you still exposed magic. I'm sorry Negi-kun, but you know the punishment. Oushi-san, Sachi-san, go and turn the girls back to normal. Negi-kun, stand there." Negi's senior mage teacher then began to chant a spell..

Negi just closed his eyes and stood there. Finally, Negi heard him finish the spell and he instantly felt the effect. His body shrank to about a foot and a half, fur started to spurt out of his body, his arms turned into front legs, and he grew paws. He basically turned into Chamo, except he still he still had his hair and small glasses (and he wasn't a pervert).

At that very second, Class 3/A ran in, the teachers shrunk them, and saw ermine Negi.

" No!" they all yelled. Even Evangeline was surprised as they ran all over to their ermine teacher.

"Why did you do this Negi?!" Asuna yelled with tears streaming down her face.

"Because..I exposed magic and almost ruined all of the class's lives, including yours. I don't deserve to be a mage any way. I know I will stay like this for a few years and when I turn back, I will not be allowed to use magic. I'm sorry," Negi explained as he started to walk away sadly.

Asuna instantly grabbed him and hugged him to her chest.

"No! I will not accept this! Negi, you are turning back to normal!" she yelled.

Negi squeezed out of her hug, looked at her sadly, and said,"I'm sorry everyone. I hope we meet again. Their former teacher left with everyone watching him. Right after he left the building, his whole class ran out and picked him up while saying,

"Negi, you are going nowhere! Even if you ARE an ermine, you're staying with us!"

Asuna picked him up and hugged him to her chest, smothering him in the process. The class then...
13333222222222222222222221212.title: Simultaneous arrival

info.brief_description: A spell mishap leaves Negi's class larger/smaller than before.
info.description:
Update 2/1/20: This stiory reached a milestone with 200 chapters and over 4,900 views to its name! The updates have slowed down in recent months, but thank you all for reading this story. I would like to especially thank Sarlen Raine and Shakemaker for their contributions, which have been a very big help in rounding up more reader interest.

I should warn you now that this story requires the reader to have knowledge somewhat of the events of the manga. Please be advised that spoilers might be present.

Anyways, rules / other info:

- Characters may grow or shrink to any height you wish, but each story must start off with growth. All chapters must also at least be one paragraph long.

- Negi can die, but he must be brought back to life by story's end.

- I will edit any chapters for spelling, so don't get too wrangled up about it.

I look forward to submissions.
